translated_text:
This world-famous university is really worth a visit. For 12$ you can take a student-led tour. These start at a kiosk in front of the university not far from the metro station. Highly recommended to get more information.
Otherwise, you can also explore the grounds without any problems.

title: √Ä visiter!
text: Tr√®s belle universit√©. Super int√©ressant de s'y promener. Il y a les plus vieux b√¢timents, dont la biblioth√®ques. De plus, il y a un c√¥t√© plus moderne de l'universit√© avec des immeubles plus neufs. Un beau m√©lange! Faites un tour dans une des coops de l'universit√©!
translated_text: Beautiful university. Very interesting to walk around. There are the oldest buildings, including the library. There's also a more modern side to the university, with newer buildings. A great mix! Take a tour of one of the university's coops!

title: Enriquecedora Visita
text:
Tomando el metro desde el centro puedes parar en Kendall  para ver la zona de Cambridge o sigues en el tren para llegar directo a Harvard. 
Impresionante Universidad con edificios y Monumentos hist√≥ricos. 
Coincidimos en un dia de graduacion que aunque no permitia visitar algunas Facultades podia verse algunas ceremonias.
translated_text:
Taking the subway from downtown you can stop at Kendall to see the Cambridge area or continue on the train to get directly to Harvard.
Impressive University with historic buildings and monuments.
We coincided in a graduation day that although not allowed to visit some faculties could see some ceremonies.

title: Un lugar al que debes ir
text:
Al estar en Harvard square te transportas a la vida estudiantil y sientes ganas de volvr a la universidad. Recomiendo conprer souvenir en The coop, la comida vegetariana de The clover y los pastries de Tatt√© caf√©.

Si te hospedas cerca de lichmeere en east cambridge puedes tomar el bus 69 para llegar
translated_text:
Being in Harvard square transports you to student life and makes you want to go back to college. I recommend buying souvenirs at The coop, the vegetarian food at The clover and the pastries at Tatt√© caf√©.

If you are staying near lichmeere in east cambridge you can take the 69 bus to get there.

title: Muy linda experiencia
text: Un lugar para estudiar de donde se formaron personas muy importantes de la pol√≠tica, m√©dicos, abogados.
translated_text: A place to study from where very important people in politics, doctors, lawyers were formed.

title: Ê≠¥Âè≤„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ≠¶Ê†°„Å®Âª∫Áâ©
text: „ÇÑ„ÅØ„Çä‰∏ÄÂ∫¶„ÅØË°å„Åì„ÅÜ„Åã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„ÄÅ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„Å´Êù•„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ‰∫àÊÉ≥‰ª•‰∏ä„Å´„Åì„ÅÆÁÖâÁì¶„Åß‰Ωú„Çâ„Çå„ÅüÊ†°Ëàé„Å´Ê≠¥Âè≤„ÇíÊÑü„Åò„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„ÄÅÈ¢®Ê†º„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÊôÇÈñì„Åå„ÅÇ„Çå„Å∞„Åú„Å≤„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„ÇπÂÜÖ„ÇíÊï£Á≠ñ„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Çí„Åä„Åô„Åô„ÇÅ„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: I knew I should go there at least once, so I came to the campus. I could feel the history in this school building made of bricks, which was more stately than I expected. If you have time, I highly recommend taking a walk around the campus.

title: Una delle pi√π rinomate universit√† del mondo
text: Campus impressionante da esplorare e visitare e dove si respira l'aria di un ateneo che ha visto passare di qui Premi Nobel, CEO, Presidenti, etc... Merita la visita a breve distanza dal centro di Boston.
translated_text: Impressive campus to explore and visit and where you can breathe the air of a university that has seen Nobel Prize winners, CEOs, Presidents, etc. pass through here. Well worth the visit a short distance from downtown Boston.

title: RESPEITO
text: Respeito √© o que mais se observa ao visitar a milenar Universidade, circulando entre os seus predios, cruzando com universit√°rios ou estudantes em gradua√ß√£o,Parece mais uma cidade universit√°ria, em raz√£o de sua grandiosidade. Cada pr√©dio tem a sua utilidade, seja a biblioteca , capela, local de formaturas, dormit√≥rios lanchonete √°reas comum de estudo ou lazer.  Visitar Boston √© uma obrigatoriedade conhecer a Universidade
translated_text: Respect is what you see most when you visit the ancient university, walking around its buildings, meeting university students or undergraduates. It looks more like a university town because of its grandeur. Each building has its own use, be it a library, chapel, graduation venue, dormitories, cafeteria, common areas for study or leisure.  A visit to Boston is a must if you want to see the University

title: Juste wow !
text: Harvard c'est Harvard ! On se croit dans un film am√©ricain ! J'ai vraiment ador√© mon exp√©rience. Si vous vous promenez dans ce coin, Harvard vaut le d√©tour ! Le cachet des batiments est absolument magnifique. Belle sortie de couple √† faire !
translated_text: Harvard is Harvard! It's like being in an American movie! I really loved my experience. If you're ever in the area, Harvard is well worth a visit! The character of the buildings is absolutely magnificent. A great couple's day out!

title: Visita a Boston
text: Gostei demais de Boston. A visita √† Universidade de Harvard, na vizinha cidade de Cambridge, desperta um desejo de voltar a estudar!
translated_text: I really enjoyed Boston. A visit to Harvard University in nearby Cambridge makes me want to go back to school!

title: Linda Harvard
text:
Visitar Harvard √© uma experi√™ncia fant√°stica. Essa Universidade super conceituada e famosa no mundo todo, que sempre me gerou muita curiosidade de visitar o campus, fica em Cambridge, cidade anexa a Boston. E d√° pra chegar de metr√¥ em alguns minutos.
A √°rea de Harvard √© muito grande e pode-se fazer passeios guiados em ingl√™s. Fizemos o tour sozinhos mesmo seguindo informa√ß√µes que buscamos na internet.
√â um lugar bem bonito, cuidado, com pr√©dios bem antigos e imponentes! O pr√©dio da biblioteca √© lindo... pena n√£o ser permitido entrada para visita√ß√£o.
No entorno da faculdade a cidade √© muito bonita, limpa e muito organizada. 
Tem muitas lojinhas de gifts de Harvard pela redodeza.
translated_text:
Visiting Harvard is a fantastic experience. This highly regarded and world-famous university, which has always made me very curious to visit its campus, is located in Cambridge, a city next to Boston. You can get there by subway in a few minutes.
The Harvard area is very large and you can take guided tours in English. We did the tour on our own, following information we found on the internet.
It's a beautiful, well-kept place, with very old and imposing buildings! The library building is beautiful... pity it's not open to the public.
Around the college, the city is very beautiful, clean and organized.
There are lots of little Harvard gift shops around.

title: Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ ÌïÑÏàò ÏΩîÏä§!
text: Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ÏôÄÏÑú Ï†úÏùº Ï≤òÏùå Îì§Î•∏ Í≥≥Ïù¥ÎÑ§Ïöî „Öé„Öé„ÖéÎ™ÖÏÑ±ÎãµÍ∏∞ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ùÎì§Ïù¥ ÎßéÍ∏¥ ÌñàÏßÄÎßå ÏÇ¨ÏßÑ Ï∞çÏùÑ Í≥≥Îì§ÎèÑ Î®æÍ≥† Ï£ºÎ≥ÄÏóê ÎßõÏßëÎèÑ ÎßéÍ≥†~ ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìúÏÉùÎì§ Íµ¨Í≤ΩÏùÄ Îç§~  ÏãúÎÇ¥Ïóê ÏûàÏúºÎãà Íº≠ Îì§Î†§Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïö©
translated_text: It's the first place I stopped by after coming to Boston üòâ There were a lot of tourists, but there are many places to take pictures and there are many restaurants around~ Harvard students are a bonus~ It's in the city, so be sure to stop by.

title: Leuk om even te zien maar meer ook niet...
text:
Leuk om even te zien en een stuk te wandelen. Verder vonden wij het erg tegenvallen. Je mag vrijwel nergens naar binnen en daardoor kun je ook niet echt een juiste indruk krijgen. 
Parkeren onder het informatie centrum is trouwens echt belachelijk duur...wij betaalde voor nog geen 2 uur parkeren (in een parkeergarage waar je amper je kont kunt draaien zo klein) 21 dollar! 
Dus niet snel weer voor ons.
translated_text:
Nice to see briefly and walk a bit. Furthermore, we found it very disappointing. You can hardly go inside and therefore you can't really get a good impression.
Parking under the information center is really ridiculously expensive...we paid 21 dollars for less than 2 hours parking (in a parking garage where you can barely turn your ass so small)!
So not soon again for us.

title: Viele Touristen, aber wieso?
text: Hier wimmelt es von Touristen, auf dem Gel√§nde der Uni genauso wie auf den Pl√§tzen rundherum. Wieso, ist eigentlich nicht ganz klar. Es hat viele L√§den, und die Uni ist weltber√ºhmt, es handelt sich aber um ganz normale Geb√§ude. Das dazugeh√∂rige Museum war leider geschlossen; eventuell w√§re das sehenswert.
translated_text: The university grounds are teeming with tourists, as are the surrounding squares. It's not really clear why. There are lots of stores and the university is world-famous, but these are just normal buildings. Unfortunately, the associated museum was closed; it might be worth a visit.

title: University Fabulosa
text: Uma universidade de tirar o f√¥lego. Com v√°rios pr√©dios milenares, apartamentos para os universit√°rios e uma infraestrutura organizada. Um modelo a ser seguido.
translated_text: A breathtaking university. With several ancient buildings, apartments for university students and an organized infrastructure. A model to be followed.

title: Atmosfera universitaria bostoniana
text: E' una visita che non pu√≤ mancare per chi si trova a Boston. Percorrere i vialetti di Harvard, un luogo mitico dal quale sono venuti fuori intellettuali, scienziati, politici, incrociare studenti da tutto il mondo d√† una bella sensazione. Ho fatto il giro senza la guida studentesca ed √® stato comunque soddisfacente, numerosi i negozi nei dintorni con gadget e magliette harvardiane. Una realt√† un p√≤ diversa dalle nostre universit√†.
translated_text: It is a must-visit for those in Boston. Walking down the alleys of Harvard, a mythical place from which intellectuals, scientists, politicians have emerged, crossing students from all over the world gives a good feeling. I took the tour without the student guide and it was still satisfying, numerous stores around with Harvard gadgets and T-shirts. A somewhat different reality from our universities.

title: Incre√≠ble
text: Un √°rea enorme dedicada exclusivamente al estudio donde los estudiantes de primer a√±o deben vivir. Una posibilidad de recursos insuperable
translated_text: A huge area dedicated exclusively to study where freshmen must live. An unsurpassed resource opportunity

title: Ë¶≥ÂÖâÂú∞Âåñ„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã

translated_text: We visited on a Sunday and the area around the college was full of people who appeared to be tourists. It was not easy to just walk around and see the buildings on the grounds. I think it would have been more enjoyable if we had taken a tour. I think I could have enjoyed it a little more if I had taken a tour. There are many historical buildings, so I think it would have been better to get information about the buildings beforehand. There is a COOP right outside the building where you can buy various goods from Harvard University. There are also clothes and goods for children, and I think this was the most fun part of the Harvard sightseeing tour (laugh).

title: Campus universitario.
text: Campus de la universidad. Merece la pena acercarse por conocerlo, pero no es algo espectacular. Mejor visitar entre diario y no en vacaciones, para disfrutar el ambiente universitario.
translated_text: University campus. It is worth a visit, but it is not spectacular. It is better to visit between days and not on vacation, to enjoy the university atmosphere.

title: „Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„Å´„ÅØÂ≠¶Áîü„Åå„ÅÑ„Å£„Å±„ÅÑ
text: È°åÂêç„ÅÆÈÄö„Çä„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅË¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÇÇ„ÅÑ„Å£„Å±„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÅåËß£Êîæ„Åï„Çå„Å¶„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇMIT„Åã„ÇâÊ≠©„Åë„Åù„ÅÜ„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Ç¶„Éº„Éê„Å´„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Åì„Åì„ÇÇË®òÂøµÂÜôÁúü„Å®„Å™„Çã„É©„É≥„Éâ„Éû„Éº„ÇØ„ÇíÊé¢„Åó„Å¶Ê≠©„ÅÑ„Å¶ÊúÄÈ´ò„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÁµêÂ±Ä„ÄÅÂ≠¶Áîü„Åï„Çì„Å´ÂÜôÁúü„ÇíË¶ã„Åõ„Å¶ËÅû„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂçíÊ•≠„Å®Ë®Ä„Åà„Çã„Å®„Ç´„ÉÉ„Ç≥„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
translated_text: As the title suggests, it is full of tourists. The campus is open to the public; you could walk from MIT, but we decided to go to Uva. It was great walking here too, looking for landmarks to take souvenir photos. I ended up showing the photos to the students and asking them about them. It is cool to be able to say I graduated from Harvard.

title: Bonito el paseo por sus jardines
text: No es la opulencia de las grandes universidades cl√°sicas europeas, sin embargo resulta bonito pasear por sus jardines y respirar un poco el ambiente Universitario. Hay algunos edificios que bien merecen una foto
translated_text: It is not the opulence of the great classical European universities, however it is nice to walk through its gardens and breathe a little of the University atmosphere. There are some buildings that are well worth a photo

title: LUGAR DE ESTUDIOS HIST√ìRICO
text: Se llega en tren desde la ciudad. Se puede contratar un tour pago o hacer la recorrida por cuenta propia con el folleto guia. Arquitect√≥nica e hist√≥ricamente increibles edificios de la biblioteca y cada facultad, tambi√©n el  memorial de los estudiantes destacados. Visitar la librer√≠a y el shop.
translated_text: It is reached by train from the city. You can hire a paid tour or do the tour on your own with the guide booklet. Architecturally and historically incredible buildings of the library and each faculty, also the memorial of outstanding students. Visit the bookstore and the shop.

title: PAS BEAUCOUP D'EMOTION
text:
On a fait Harvard, on est content mais on reste un peu sur notre faim. On ne ressent pas d'√©motions particuli√®res quand on visite cet endroit mythique. Il n'y a pas d'√¢me √† l'inverse de Yale √† New Haven. Peu de b√¢timents sont accessibles au grand public. Le jour de notre pr√©sence, il y avait peu de guide √† disposition. Pour info, il y a un parking √† proximit√© (22$ les 2 heures!!).
Je conseille quand m√™me de s'y rendre car le parc et les b√¢timents sont beaux mais c'est tout.
translated_text:
We've been to Harvard, we're happy, but we're still a little hungry. You don't feel any particular emotion when you visit this mythical place. There's no soul, unlike Yale in New Haven. Few buildings are accessible to the general public. The day we were there, there were few guides available. For the record, there is parking nearby ($22 for 2 hours!!).
I still recommend going there, as the park and buildings are beautiful, but that's about it.

title: Mooi om te zijn
text: Fantastisch om daar te zijn en te ervaren wat het is om daar te studeren. Verder bijzonder mooie panden en veel geschiedenis! Zeker het bezoeken waard. Je kunt veel gebouwen gewoon inlopen en  bekijken.
translated_text: Fantastic to be there and experience what it's like to study there. Also particularly beautiful buildings and lots of history! Definitely worth visiting. You can just walk into many of the buildings and see them.

title: Gran experiencia
text:
Es toda una experiencia pasear por sus jardines y admirar los m√∫ltiples edificios que componen esta Universidad. Todo est√° muy bien cuidado y limpio. Toda la zona es muy animada con todo tipo de gente de todos los lugares del mundo.
Pensar en todos los personajes que han estudiado o pasado por all√≠.....
Simplemente ir all√≠ a pasear me parece una experiencia interesante. Una buena opci√≥n si vas con tiempo es hacer un tour guiado realizado por los estudiantes del Campus.
Lo √∫nico que me parece malo es la dificultad para aparcar el coche, y mucho m√°s dificil hacerlo a buen precio. Es recomendable llegar hasta all√≠ en metro, o dejar el coche al otro lado del r√≠o Charles, pasado el puente. En todo Cambridge es dificil aparcar.
translated_text:
It is quite an experience to walk through its gardens and admire the many buildings that make up this University. Everything is very well kept and clean. The whole area is very lively with all kinds of people from all over the world.
Think of all the people who have studied or passed through there......
Just going there to walk around seems to me an interesting experience. A good option if you have time is to take a guided tour given by the students of the Campus.
The only thing that seems bad to me is the difficulty to park the car, and much more difficult to do it at a good price. It is advisable to get there by subway, or leave the car on the other side of the Charles River, past the bridge. In all of Cambridge it is difficult to park.

title: Wow
text: No s√≥lo por lo hermoso de la zona y la historia de la universidad como tal, tambi√©n resulta encantador el ambiente con el que cuentan los que all√≠ estudian. Recorrido obligado, genial de ver.
translated_text: Not only because of the beauty of the area and the history of the university as such, but also because of the charming atmosphere of those who study there. A must see, great to see.

title: bella esperienza con una guida-studente
text:
Credo che il valore aggiunto di una visita di Harvard sia quella di partecipare ad una visita guidata, accompagnata da uno studente dell'universit√† (ci sono anche ragazzi che parlano italiano) che ti racconta la vita del campus, la sua affascinante storia e anche tanti segreti.
Beh sul campus nulla da dire, √® uno dei miti americani, luogo da dove escono le menti migliori, un vero insegnamento ed una lezione di vita per un sistema scolastico traballante e sempre precario come il nostro!
E' prevalentemente un giro all'aperto, ma grazie alla spiegazione della guida, si comprende tutto il mondo di Harvard.
Ve lo consiglio!
translated_text:
I think the added value of a visit to Harvard is to participate in a guided tour, accompanied by a student from the university (there are also guys who speak Italian) who tells you about campus life, its fascinating history and also many secrets.
Well about the campus nothing to say, it is one of the American myths, a place where the best minds come out, a real teaching and a life lesson for a shaky and always precarious school system like ours!
It is mostly an outdoor tour, but thanks to the guide's explanation, you understand the whole world of Harvard.
I recommend it!

title: Universidad m√≠tica
text: Universidad de universidades, aqu√≠ estudiaron algunos de los m√°s grandes. Es privada por lo cual hay que pagar por estudiar y bastante a no ser tengas beca. Ver la Universidad y la  zona en vale la pena. Hay sitios que salen en pel√≠culas, novelas....
translated_text: University of universities, here studied some of the greatest. It is private so you have to pay to study and quite a lot unless you have a scholarship. Seeing the University and the area is worthwhile. There are places that appear in movies, novels, etc. ....

title: H√≠res egyetem
text: Szen√°torok √©s gazdag amerikaiak gyerekeinek egyeteme. Ez√©rt tartj√°k a vil√°g (egyik) legjobb egyetem√©nek. Az eur√≥paiak t√∂bbs√©ge fenntart√°sokkal kezeli ezt a hitet, mivel az eur√≥pai egyetemek (Sorbonne, Bochumi, BME, ELTE, Sote stb.) di√°kjai nagys√°grendekkel jobbak, nagyobb tud√°ssal rendelkeznek, de vitatkozni nem √≥hajtunk ezzel. Az egyetem parkj√°ban l√°thatjuk Harvard szobr√°t. A l√°togat√≥ k√≠v√ºlr≈ël megn√©zheti hatalmas k√∂nyvt√°r√°nak √©p√ºlet√©t, vagy az √©tterem √©p√ºlet√©ben tal√°lhat√≥ eml√©kt√°bl√°kat, de az egyetem oktat√°si ter√ºlet√©re is bel√©phet√ºnk. J√≥l felszerelt informatikai termeket l√°ttam ott t√∂bbek k√∂z√∂tt. √ârdemes megn√©zni, ha Bostonban j√°r az ember.
translated_text: A university for the children of senators and rich Americans. That's why it's considered (one of) the best universities in the world. The majority of Europeans have reservations about this belief, as the students of European universities (Sorbonne, Bochum, BME, ELTE, Sote, etc.) are orders of magnitude better and have more knowledge, but we don't want to argue with that. You can see the statue of Harvard in the university park. From the outside, you can see the huge library building or the plaques in the restaurant building, but you can also enter the university's teaching area. I saw well-equipped computer labs, among other things. It's worth a visit if you're in Boston.

title: Lindo paseo, hermosos edificios
text: Llegamos con el subte y apenas baj√°s ya te encontr√°s con el predio de la universidad. Recorrimos los jardines, no pudimos ingresar a los edificios antiguos, s√≥lo a uno m√°s moderno y a una iglesia. Nos alejamos luego unas cuadras por la ciudad hasta el r√≠o Charles y vimos el puente de la Universidad que lo cruza. La zona es en s√≠ muy hermosa, con sus edificios estilo ingl√©s. Hay negocios en la zona donde comprar los buzos de la universidad y otros recuerdos.
translated_text: We took the subway and as soon as you get off you find the university grounds. We toured the gardens, we could not enter the old buildings, only a more modern one and a church. We then walked a few blocks through the city to the Charles River and saw the University bridge that crosses it. The area itself is very beautiful, with its English style buildings. There are stores in the area where you can buy the university overalls and other souvenirs.

title: „Åô„Åî„ÅèÈõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶Ë¶≥ÂÖâÂú∞Âåñ„Åï„Çå„ÅüÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: Â§ö„Åè„ÅÆ„ÉÑ„Ç¢„Éº„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„ÅåÈ†ÜÁï™„Å´„Ç∞„É´„Éº„Éó„ÇíË™òÂ∞é„Åó„Å¶Â§ßÂ≠¶ÂÜÖ„ÇíË™¨Êòé„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂßø„ÅåÁâπÂæ¥ÁöÑ„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÊ≠¥Âè≤„ÇíÂ´å„Åß„ÇÇÊÑü„Åò„Åï„Åõ„Çâ„Çå„Çã„Åè„Çâ„ÅÑÂé≥„Åã„Å™Èõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„Åå„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®„Åì„Çç„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅËá™ÁÑ∂„ÇÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÅÇ„Çä„Å®„Å¶„ÇÇÈ≠ÖÊÉë„ÅÆÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: It was unique in that many tour guides took turns leading groups and explaining the university. The place was so austere that you could feel the history even if you didn't want to, but there was also a lot of nature and it was a very enchanting place.

title: È¢®Ê†º„ÅÇ„Çã‰Ωá„Åæ„ÅÑ
text: Ë∂ÖÊúâÂêçÂ§ßÂ≠¶„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑ„Ç¢„Ç´„Éá„Éü„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Å™È¢®Ê†ºÊºÇ„ÅÜ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÄÇË¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÇÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÄÅ„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„ÉÑ„Ç¢„Éº„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Âßø„ÇÇÂ§ßÂã¢„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: The campus has the academic stature of a very famous university. There were many tourists and many guided tours.

title: Magnifique
text: Nous avons visit√© le campus de l'universit√© la plus ancienne et la plus prestigieuse des Etats-Unis. Harvard est situ√© √† Cambridge et doit son nom au Presbyter John Harvard, dont la statue se trouve au milieu du campus universitaire. Nous avons visit√© l'√©cole de droit, o√π nous avons partag√© le d√©jeuner avec les √©tudiants de la cantine universitaire !
translated_text: We visited the campus of the oldest and most prestigious university in the United States. Harvard is located in Cambridge and owes its name to Presbyter John Harvard, whose statue stands in the middle of the university campus. We visited the law school, where we shared lunch with students from the university canteen!

title: Leuk, maar valt tegen
text: Ik heb de tour gedaan die door studenten wordt gegeven. Ze doen dit op een leuke manier, maar verder dan een paar "inside stories" kom je niet. Je mag nergens naar binnen, wat voor mij toch een grote tegenvaller was. Campussen zoals deze zijn er namelijk overal.
translated_text: I did the tour given by students. They do this in a nice way, but you don't get beyond a few "inside stories." You don't get to go in anywhere, which was a big setback for me anyway. After all, campuses like this are everywhere.

title: Recorrido por el campus de la universidad y Cambridge
text:
Sin duda es una de las mejores y reconocidas universidades el mundo.
El campus esta formado por diversos edificios, algunos residencia de estudiantes, bibliotecas o edificios de la administraci√≥n.
En el patio central, donde la estatua de su fundador, es una agradable √°rea de descanso y esparcimiento.
Pero el campus tambi√©n se extiendo en algunos edificios en calles anexas al campus.
translated_text:
It is undoubtedly one of the best and recognized universities in the world.
The campus is made up of several buildings, some of which are student residences, libraries or administration buildings.
In the central courtyard, where the statue of its founder, is a pleasant area of rest and relaxation.
But the campus also extends into some buildings on streets attached to the campus.

title: Interesante
text: Para satisfacer la curiosidad. Realmente una vez all√≠ la cosa no es para tanto. Los edificios est√°n bien, se puede entrar en alguno, en verano solo turistas, pero yo ir√≠a si sobra media ma√±ana. Hay cosas mejores que hacer en Boston.
translated_text: To satisfy curiosity. Actually once there the thing is not so much. The buildings are fine, you can enter some of them, in summer only tourists, but I would go if you have half a morning to spare. There are better things to do in Boston.

title: Super int√©ressant avec notre guide Frank
text: Une visite de une heure du campus de Harvard pour comprendre l‚Äôhistoire du lieux, ses rites, son √©volution √† travers 380 ans, les personnages c√©l√®bres. Notre guide, Frank, est √©tudiant en science √† Harvard et √©tait super sympa et super brillant. Une visite tr√®s int√©ressante √† faire avec les enfants. 12$ par adulte, gratuit pour -15 ans
translated_text: A one-hour tour of the Harvard campus to understand the history of the place, its rituals, its evolution through 380 years, the famous people. Our guide, Frank, is a science student at Harvard and was super nice and super bright. A very interesting tour to do with the kids. 12 per adult, free for children under 15.

title: EL CAMPUS POR EXCELENCIA
text: Un campus muy bonito y m√≠tico, que la verdad es que llama mucho la atenci√≥n por lo cuidado y lo bien hecho que est√°. Tiene una gran cantidad de rincones preciosos en los que detenerse y cuenta adem√°s con muchas zonas verdes donde poder sentarse un rato. Merece bastante la pena su visita y darse un paseo tranquilamente por todo el campus, admirando sus edificios, sus estatuas y el ambiente universitario que se respira. Estudiar en Harvard debe de ser sin duda un enorme priviliegio.
translated_text: A very beautiful and mythical campus, which is really striking for how well cared for and well done it is. It has a lot of beautiful corners in which to stop and also has many green areas where you can sit for a while. It is well worth a visit to take a leisurely stroll around the campus, admiring its buildings, statues and the university atmosphere. Studying at Harvard must be an enormous privilege.

title: Immancabile
text: Interessante poter visitare la fucina dei premi Nobel e respirare l'aria del college, mezza giornata basta, comoda la metro.
translated_text: Interesting to be able to visit the Nobel Prize forge and breathe the college air, half a day is enough, convenient subway.

title: Prestigiosa universit√† mondiale.
text: Non ho trovato la visita particolarmente interessante. Certo, una volta a Boston rappresenta un must. Sicuramente un luogo che ha il suo fascino. Non dimentichiamo peraltro che Boston √® citt√† universitaria, ricca di eccellenze in questo contesto. Una citt√† quindi giovane, di bella giovent√π come si dice. Ad Harvard si sono laureati premi Nobel e presidenti degli Stati Uniti d'America. In questo senso immancabile nel vostro tour. Solo per questo. E forse abbastanza.
translated_text: I did not find the visit particularly interesting. Certainly, once in Boston it represents a must-see. Definitely a place that has its own charm. Moreover, let us not forget that Boston is a university city, full of excellence in this context. A city therefore of youth, of beautiful youth as they say. Harvard has graduated Nobel laureates and presidents of the United States of America. In this sense unmissable on your tour. For that reason alone. And perhaps enough.

title: voglia di tornare a studiare
text: L'aria che si respira in questo campus, i ragazzi e le ragazze da ogni parte del pianeta, la biblioteca immensa, la pace nei suoi giardini...tutto questo mi ha fatto venire la voglia di tornare indietro nel tempo e di tornare a studiare, magari proprio in questa universit√†
translated_text: The air you breathe on this campus, the boys and girls from all over the planet, the immense library, the peace in its gardens...all of this made me want to go back in time and go back to study, perhaps at this very university

title: Inspirador
text: A visita a famosa Universidade de Harvard √© no m√≠nimo inspiradora. A organiza√ß√£o de uma das mais conceituadas faculdades do mundo merece ser vista e admirada por todos que passam por Boston. Vale muito a pena.
translated_text: A visit to the famous Harvard University is inspiring, to say the least. The organization of one of the most prestigious colleges in the world deserves to be seen and admired by everyone who passes through Boston. It's well worth it.

title: Ÿáÿßÿ±ŸÅÿßÿØ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßŸÑŸÖŸäÿ©
text: ÿßÿ≠ÿØŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ¨ÿßŸÖÿπÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπÿ±ŸäŸÇÿ© ŸÅŸä ŸÉÿßŸÖÿ®ÿ±ŸäÿØÿ¨ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿ™ŸàŸä ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸÉÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿ™ Ÿàÿ£ŸÖÿßŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿßÿ°ÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÑÿßÿπ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿ™ŸàŸä ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÉŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ∑ÿ® ŸàÿßŸÑŸáŸÜÿØÿ≥ÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ±ÿ®Ÿäÿ© Ÿàÿ•ÿØÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿßÿπŸÖÿßŸÑ Ÿàÿ∫Ÿäÿ±Ÿáÿß ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ®ŸàŸÑ ÿ®Ÿáÿß ŸÑŸäÿ≥ ÿ≥ŸáŸÑÿß ŸàŸÑŸÉŸÜ ŸÖŸÜ ŸÇÿ®ŸÑ ŸÅŸáŸà ŸÖÿ≠ÿ∏Ÿàÿ∏ ŸàŸÖÿ™ŸÖŸäÿ≤ .ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿßÿ∂ÿßŸÅÿ©ŸÑŸàÿ¨ŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≠ŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµÿ© ÿ®Ÿáÿß
translated_text: One of the prestigious universities in Cambridge contains libraries and places to read and read, containing the faculties of medicine, engineering, education, business administration and others, admission is not easy, but whoever accepted is lucky and distinguished.

title: Zeker bezoeken
text: Historische plaats die het bezoeken zeker waard is. Je kan bij het Harvard Information Center gratis een tour boeken. Hiervoor moet je een uur voor de tour aanwezig zijn om te reserveren. Niet heel handig. Wij hebben met de kaart van $ 2,‚Äî de tour zelf gelopen. Leuk om deze beroemde universiteit zo te zien.
translated_text: Historic place well worth visiting. You can book a free tour at the Harvard Information Center. For this, you have to be there an hour before the tour to make a reservation. Not very convenient. We used the $2 card to walk the tour ourselves. Nice to see this famous university this way.

title: Vale a pena
text:
Adorei conhecer o campus. √â arejado, lindo e n√£o √© t√£o grande. O espa√ßo de conviv√™ncia √© √≥timo e tem v√°rias op√ß√µes de jogos. H√° visitas guiadas, por√©m optamos por n√£o faz√™-lo
porque est√°vamos com crian√ßas pequenas.
translated_text:
I loved visiting the campus. It's airy, beautiful and not too big. The living space is great and there are lots of games on offer. There are guided tours, but we opted not to take one
because we had small children.

title: Magnifique !
text:
C‚Äôest la facult√© de l‚Äô√©lite am√©ricaine et, partant, de celle du monde.
Les b√¢timents sont mythiques et tous plus beaux les uns que les autres.
Par contre, aucun n‚Äôest accessible au public. Rassurez-vous, les ext√©rieurs suffiront √† vous ravir.
translated_text:
This is the college of the American elite and, by extension, of the world's elite.
The buildings are mythical, each more beautiful than the last.
However, none of them are open to the public. Don't worry, you'll be delighted by the outside.

title: Tour guid√©
text: Avons pris le tour guid√© pour avoir une meilleure id√©e.  Pour $12.00 par personne on a droit a une balade dans le parc avec une historique de certaines b√¢tisses. Aucune visite a l'int√©rieur
translated_text: We took the guided tour to get a better idea.  For $12.00 per person you get a stroll through the park with a history of some of the buildings. No tour inside

title: Jolie, typique
text:
Nous nous sommes cru √† Oxford...
Le tour du campus et de ses b√¢timents est agr√©ables.
La boutique Harward est juste en face !
Mythique..
translated_text:
We thought we were in Oxford...
The tour of the campus and its buildings is pleasant.
The Harward boutique is just across the street!
Mythical.

title: no vale la pena si uno va a MIT!
text: pagamos un tour guiado y la verdad me decepciono. simplemente se recorre el campus, no se puede entrar ni a una biblioteca. todo lo comentado son como chismes del lugar. muy estadounidense. realmente luego fuimos al MIT y me arrepenti de haber ido a Harvard. no tiene mayor sentido.
translated_text: we paid for a guided tour and i was really disappointed. you just walk around the campus, you can't even go into a library. all the talk is like gossip about the place. very american. we actually went to MIT afterwards and i regretted going to Harvard. it makes no sense.

title: Harvard
text: ŒàŒΩŒ± Œ±œÄœå œÑŒ± Œ∫Œ±ŒªœçœÑŒµœÅŒ± œÄŒ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒÆŒºŒπŒ± œÑŒøœÖ Œ∫œåœÉŒºŒøœÖ. ŒúŒ±œÇ ŒæŒµŒΩŒ¨Œ≥Œ∑œÉŒ±ŒΩ œÉœÑŒø campus Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÉœÑŒø ŒµœÉœâœÑŒµœÅŒπŒ∫œå (Œ≤ŒπŒ≤ŒªŒπŒøŒ∏ŒÆŒ∫ŒµœÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ±ŒØŒ∏ŒøœÖœÉŒµœÇ). ŒòŒ± Œ¥ŒµŒØœÑŒµ œÖœÄŒøŒ¥ŒøŒºŒ≠œÇ œÄœÅœâœÑœåŒ≥ŒΩœâœÅŒµœÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒ± ŒïŒªŒªŒ∑ŒΩŒπŒ∫Œ¨ Œ¥ŒµŒ¥ŒøŒºŒ≠ŒΩŒ±.
translated_text: One of the best universities in the world. We were shown around the campus and inside (libraries and classrooms). You will see infrastructure unprecedented for Greek standards.

title: Impresionante complejo
text:
Es la universidad mas antigua de Estados Unidos. Es un complejo inmenso donde hay escuelas, institutos, casas para los estudiantes y una mega biblioteca que por o visto esta entre las mas grandes del mundo (no dejan entrar tienes que tener carnet).
Las instalaciones son curiosas por el tipo de edificio,la mayor√≠a, todos de ladrillo visto rojizo.
Hay zonas muy bonitas, muchas zonas verdes y tranquilas. 
Es de las universidades mas famosas as√≠ que no puedes pasar por aqui sin echar un vistazo a la zona.
translated_text:
It is the oldest university in the United States. It is a huge complex where there are schools, institutes, houses for students and a mega library that apparently is among the largest in the world (they do not let you enter you have to have a library card).
The facilities are curious because of the type of buildings, most of them are made of reddish brick.
There are very nice areas, many green and quiet areas.
It is one of the most famous universities so you can not pass by without taking a look at the area.

title: Incontournablement connu
text:
En prenant le bus on aper√ßoit assez rapidement les couleurs typiques Bordeaux sublimes qui pars√®ment l'universit√©.
En elle m√™me, l'universit√© est extr√™mement gigantesque üòÉ avec diff√©rents √Ælots s√©par√©s par des parcs.
Le seul b√©mol c'est de ne pas pouvoir rentrer dans tous les b√¢timents.
C'est quand m√™me impressionnant
translated_text:
As you board the bus, you soon notice the typical Bordeaux colors dotting the university.
In itself, the university is extremely gigantic üòÉ with different blocks separated by parks.
The only downside is that you can't get into all the buildings.
Still, it's impressive.

title: Harvard impacta
text: Llegar a Boston es una gran experiencia y visitar esta Universidad m√°s a√∫n. Sabemos lo dif√≠cil que resulta estudiar all√≠ y el reconocimiento que eso supone a todo egresado. Los nombres de personas que all√≠ estudiaron lo confirman. Por eso caminar por all√≠ e imaginar tantos que vivieron en esos edificios hace la visita m√°s impactante a√∫n. Imagino tanta gente de diversos pa√≠ses encontr√°ndose en este sitio. Debe ser muy enriquecedor.
translated_text: Arriving in Boston is a great experience and visiting this University even more so. We know how difficult it is to study there and the recognition it brings to every graduate. The names of people who studied there confirm it. That is why walking around and imagining so many people who lived in those buildings makes the visit even more impressive. I imagine so many people from different countries meeting in this place. It must be very enriching.

title: Lovely walking in the gardens
text:
Una passeggiata fra i vialetti di una delle pi√∫ famose Universit√† del mondo √© assolutamente un "must" se capitate a Boston sia per lavoro sia per turismo.
L'atmosfera √® molto bella, studenti di tutto il mondo sono nei dintorni della scuola  che √© uno dei posti pi√π visitati.

Un passaggio alla Coop la libreria dell' universit√† vi permetter√† di acquistare sia libri sia gadget dell'ateneo: un business nel business.
translated_text:
A walk through the alleys of one of the most famous universities in the world is absolutely a "must" if you happen to be in Boston either for business or pleasure.
The atmosphere is very nice, students from all over the world are around the school which is one of the most visited places.

A trip to the Coop the bookstore of the university will allow you to buy both books and gadgets of the university: a business within a business.

title: Lugar a visitar en una gran ciudad
text: Todas las escuelas est√°n regadas por la ciudad y la historia alrededor de la universidad es muy interesante. Las calles son bonitas y los parques muy buenos. Gran lugar para caminar y pasear solo o con amigos.
translated_text: All the schools are scattered around the city and the history around the university is very interesting. The streets are nice and the parks are very good. Great place to walk and stroll alone or with friends.

title: Creo que es una visita que se debe hacer.
text: Estar en un centro del conocimiento y educaci√≥n como es Harvard es casi, dir√≠a yo, obligatorio se se esta en Boston. Sus jardines, sus edificios, sus museos son una experiencia √∫nica. Yo aconsejo dedicar un d√≠a entero a esta visita. A mi me gusto mucho el Peabody, pero que cada cual elija seg√∫n sus intereses.
translated_text: Being in a center of knowledge and education such as Harvard is almost, I would say, mandatory if you are in Boston. Its gardens, its buildings, its museums are a unique experience. I recommend to dedicate a whole day to this visit. I really liked the Peabody, but everyone can choose according to their interests.

title: No dejar de ir.
text: Impresionante Campus Universitario. Edificios antiquisimos  super bien mantenidos , parques impecables , y una historia √∫nica. Caminar entre esos edificios y jardines ,  y escuchar historias y anecdotas es impresionante.
translated_text: Impressive University Campus. Super well maintained antique buildings, impeccable parks, and a unique history. Walking among these buildings and gardens, and listening to stories and anecdotes is impressive.

title: Una gran EXPERIENCIA!!
text: Es muy genial poder conocer este lugares. Yo fui por cuenta de un tour contratado desde NYC, no tiene ning√∫n costo y hay la oportunidad de conocer el campus. Hay tiendas donde venden muchos souvenirs (Mi paraiso) con camisetas, hoodies, llaveros etc etc de Harvard. Muy muy bonito
translated_text: It is very cool to be able to see this place. I went on a tour hired from NYC, there is no cost and there is the opportunity to see the campus. There are stores where they sell many souvenirs (My paradise) with Harvard t-shirts, hoodies, key chains, etc etc. Very nice

title: Incr√≠vel, por√©m faltou mais um pouquinho...
text: Ao chegar a Harvard square (esta√ß√£o de metr√¥) j√° vimos alguns alunos de Harvard (com chap√©u) que se disp√µe a fazer uma visita a p√© contando a hist√≥ria de umas das universidade mais famosa do mundo! O valor do passeio por adulto √© de $12.00 d√≥lares e crian√ßa n√£o paga (mapa √© gr√°tis). √â muito interessante, pois junto com as antigas hist√≥rias o aluno conta sobre suas experi√™ncias na universidade... Precisa ter uma boa no√ß√£o de Ingl√™s, caso contr√°rio se tornar√° chata este passeio. Dura em torno de 1h. Pena que Harvard √© gigante, e diversas faculdades ficam espalhadas... o passeio gira entorno dos pr√©dios mais antigos... ap√≥s o passeio aproveite o mapa e v√° do outro lado do Rio onde tem a parte esportiva... muito legal ver o est√°dio de futebol americano e outros gin√°sios, cada um para seu esporte!
translated_text: When we arrived at Harvard square (subway station) we already saw some Harvard students (with hats) who were willing to give us a walking tour telling us about the history of one of the most famous universities in the world! The price of the tour per adult is $12.00 and children don't pay (the map is free). It's very interesting, because along with the old stories, the student tells you about his experiences at the university... You need to have a good command of English, otherwise the tour will be boring. It lasts around 1 hour. It's a pity that Harvard is huge, and several colleges are spread out... the tour revolves around the oldest buildings... after the tour, take advantage of the map and go to the other side of the river where there is the sports area... it's very cool to see the American soccer stadium and other gyms, each one for its own sport!

title: Imperdible
text: Para disfrutar a pleno el campus de la universidad ,tomar las visitas guiadas y ver las muestras y exposiciones, el recorrido se empieza a apreciar al entrar al barrio de Cambridge
translated_text: To fully enjoy the university campus, take the guided tours and see the exhibits and exhibitions, the tour begins to be appreciated when entering the Cambridge neighborhood.

title: Passeio bem interessante.
text: O campus da Universidade √© enorme. S√£o v√°rios pr√©dios em estilo cl√°ssico. A visita √© interessante. Estacionamento aos domingos nas ruas √© gratuito. Tudo muito limpo e bem sinalizado.
translated_text: The university campus is huge. There are several classical-style buildings. The visit is interesting. Parking in the streets is free on Sundays. Everything is very clean and well signposted.

title: Armonioso, bonito, visitas guiadas.
text:
Edificios sobrios ajardinados y amplios paseos, elegante todo muy armonioso. 1500 d√≥lares m√°s o menos para prueba admisi√≥n si tus notas nivel estudio son mediocres. 3000 d√≥lares mensuales para estudiar aqu√≠. Treinta a√±os para pagar carrera si estudias becado cr√©dito con un banco. Este caso fue el de Barack Obama.
M√°s de 150 premios noveles salieron de aqu√≠. Se busca y apoya la excelencia. En capilla appleton se ve tras la ventana al fundador. La madre sabidur√≠a sujeta su cabeza. Desde aqu√≠ se entregan las licenciaturas y la cl√°sica imagen de los estudiantes que lanzan al aire sus gorras negras. Cuando muri√≥ John Harvard Oxford reclam√≥ los libros que trajo Harvard de su colecci√≥n privada. La universidad se neg√≥. Poco despu√©s se quemaron.  Hay visitas guiadas para conocer mejor todos los aspectos.
translated_text:
Sober landscaped buildings and wide promenades, elegant and very harmonious. 1500 dollars more or less for admission test if your grades are mediocre. 3000 dollars a month to study here. Thirty years to pay for your studies if you study with a bank credit scholarship. This was the case of Barack Obama.
More than 150 first prizes came out of here. Excellence is sought and supported. In appleton chapel the founder is seen behind the window. Mother Wisdom holds his head. From here bachelor's degrees are awarded and the classic image of students tossing their black caps in the air. When John Harvard died Oxford claimed the books Harvard brought from his private collection. The university refused. Shortly thereafter they were burned.  Guided tours are available to learn more about all aspects.

title: „É°„Ç§„É≥„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÅÆ„Åø„Å™„Çâ„ÅöHBS„Å∏
text: „Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Çπ„ÇØ„Ç¶„Çß„Ç¢„Åã„ÇâÊ≠©„ÅÑ„Å¶Â∑ù„ÅÆÂêë„Åì„ÅÜÂÅ¥„Å´Ë°å„Åè„Å®„ÄÇÊúâÂêç„Å™HBSÔºà„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Éì„Ç∏„Éç„Çπ„Çπ„ÇØ„Éº„É´Ôºâ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊ•ΩÂ§©„ÅÆÁ§æÈï∑„ÇÑÊó•Êú¨„Åß„ÇÇÊúâÂêç„Å™ÁµåÂñ∂ËÄÖ„Åå„Åì„Åì„ÅßÂ≠¶„Çì„Åß„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊ†°Ëàé„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Å©„Çå„ÇÇÂ∞è„Å∂„Çä„ÅÆ„Ç§„ÇÆ„É™„ÇπË™ø„ÄÅ„Å∂„Çâ„Çä„Å®Êï£Á≠ñ„Åô„Çã„ÅÆ„ÇÇ„Çà„Åó„ÄÇ„Åü„Å†„Åó„ÄÅÂπ¥ÈñìÊéàÊ•≠Êñô„ÇÇ„Åπ„Çâ„Åº„ÅÜ„Å´È´ò„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„Åå„Éª
translated_text: Walk across the river from Harvard Square. You will find the famous HBS (Harvard Business School). The president of Rakuten and other famous Japanese executives have studied here. The school buildings are all small and English style, and it is good to stroll around. However, the annual tuition fee is very expensive.

title: Visita cultural inolvidable
text:
Visitar la ciudad de Boston y su actividad cultural a trav√©s de su historia y el avance en la investigaci√≥n de las ciencias para la humanidad, claramente vale la pena conocer. 
Adem√°s en nuestra excursi√≥n por un d√≠a tuvimos la experiencia de conocer las universidades m√°s importantes del mundo, con sus hermosos edificios y √°reas verdes con algunos estudiantes en sus alrededores. 
Ciudad muy hermosa !!
translated_text:
Visiting the city of Boston and its cultural activity through its history and advancement in science research for humanity is clearly worthwhile.
Also in our day trip we had the experience of visiting the most important universities in the world, with its beautiful buildings and green areas with some students in the surroundings.
Very beautiful city!

title: Interesante!
text: Es una visita que no te quita mucho tiempo y es interesante toda la villa universitaria. Recomendable visitar.
translated_text: It is a visit that does not take much time and the whole university village is interesting. Recommended to visit.

title: Andateci
text: Fare un giro nel campus di Harvard √® cosa assolutamente da fare facilmente raggiungibile con la metro vi ritroverete in questo splendido campus dove la voglia di tornare all‚Äôuniversit√† vi assalir√† inesorabilmente
translated_text: Taking a tour of the Harvard campus is a must-do easily accessible by subway you will find yourself on this beautiful campus where the urge to return to the university will inexorably assault you

title: Harvard University
text: Harvard ist definitiv einen Besuch wert! Ich w√ºrde dabei empfehlen an einer von Studenten geleiteten F√ºhrung (Preis: 12$ pro Person) teilzunehmen, da alle Geb√§ude auf dem Campus nicht f√ºr die √ñffentlichkeit zug√§nglich sind. Unser F√ºhrer, Alex, war ein charmanter junger Mann mit viel Humor, der sehr offen alle Fragen beantwortet hat und gut √ºber seine Universit√§t Bescheid wusste.
translated_text: Harvard is definitely worth a visit! I would recommend taking part in a student-led tour (price: 12$ per person), as all the buildings on campus are not open to the public. Our guide, Alex, was a charming young man with a great sense of humor who answered all questions very openly and knew a lot about his university.

title: Emocionante estar en este sitio!!!.
text:
Muy cerca de Boston, cruzando el r√≠o Charles, se puede disfrutar este lugar de trascendencia mundial. Dentro de un espacio cerrado, se pueden apreciar sus jardines, edificios principales, antiguas residencias estudiantiles y el monumento a su fundador, el que se ha transformado en un hito para los turistas: tocar su pie es un rito que lo cumplen la mayor√≠a de √©stos, pese a la cola que deben hacer para lograrlo.
Se recomienda visitar en las inmediaciones una cooperativa que vende todo tipo de productos vinculados a la Universidad (recuerdos de todo tipo, gorros, mochilas, etc., etc).
translated_text:
Very close to Boston, across the Charles River, you can enjoy this place of worldwide transcendence. Within an enclosed space, you can appreciate its gardens, main buildings, old student residences and the monument to its founder, which has become a landmark for tourists: touching its foot is a rite that most of them fulfill, despite the queue they have to wait in line to do so.
It is recommended to visit a nearby cooperative that sells all kinds of products related to the University (souvenirs of all kinds, hats, backpacks, etc., etc.).

title: Imperdible visita cuando estas en Boston o Cambridge
text: La visita a la Universidad de Harvard es muy agradable, ya que hay muchos restaurantes, tiendas, Harvard Square es muy pintoresca, y se puede caminar dentro de la universidad por los jardines y conocer los edificios. Igualmente se pueden visitar algunos museos por la zona. Esta muy cerca de Boston, se puede llegar en metro, y se puede tambien tomar un tour guiado por el lugar.
translated_text: The visit to Harvard University is very nice, as there are many restaurants, stores, Harvard Square is very picturesque, and you can walk inside the university through the gardens and see the buildings. You can also visit some museums in the area. It is very close to Boston, you can get there by subway, and you can also take a guided tour of the place.

title: Elite-Uni in H√§usern aus Backstein
text: Diese f√ºr New England typischen Backsteinh√§user, die verteilt auf einer gro√üen Rasenfl√§che stehen beherbergt die weltber√ºhmte Uni Harvard. Ein absolutes Muss, wenn man schon in Boston ist. Im Februar wird es hier ganz sch√∂n kalt und zugig, also auf jeden Fall M√ºtze + Handschuhe mitnehmen!
translated_text: These brick buildings, typical of New England, are spread out on a large lawn and are home to the world-famous Harvard University. An absolute must if you are already in Boston. It gets pretty cold and draughty here in February, so be sure to bring a hat and gloves!

title: Bonito, antiguo y famoso Campus
text: Hay un interesante recorrido para conocer el antiguo campus de Harvard. Recinto cerrado y ajardinado, bordeado por las antiguas residencias de estudiantes. Permite conocer unos cuantos edificios de facultades universitarias, la biblioteca, o la antigua casa del rector.
translated_text: There is an interesting tour of the old Harvard campus. It is an enclosed and landscaped area, bordered by the old student residences. It allows to know a few buildings of university faculties, the library, or the old rector's house.

title: Experi√™ncia encantadora
text:
O local √© lindo e cheio de hist√≥ria fiz a visita guiada por um estudante o que deixou tudo ainda mais interessante, eu estava muito empolgada para conhecer a Universidade mais famosa do mundo onde grandes personalidades e mentes estudaram. 
Ap√≥s o tour guiado voltei nos locais onde estive para aproveitar um pouco mais e tirar mais algumas fotos. Apesar de Dezembro com certeza foi uma √≥tima visita.
translated_text:
The place is beautiful and full of history. I was given a guided tour by a student, which made it even more interesting. I was very excited to see the most famous university in the world, where great personalities and minds have studied.
After the guided tour I went back to the places I had been to enjoy a bit more and take some more photos. Although it was December, it was certainly a great visit.

title: Centro de excelencia formador de grandes personalidades!
text: A poca distancia de Boston, y en un entorno de plena naturaleza, se alza este olimpo del saber, con innumerables bibliotecas, de donde han salido varios presidentes norteamericanos, premios Nobel, cient√≠ficos y profesionales de todas las ramas!
translated_text: A short distance from Boston, and in a natural environment, stands this olympus of knowledge, with countless libraries, from which several American presidents, Nobel Prize winners, scientists and professionals from all fields have emerged!

title: Cantik dan. Kerennn
text: Salah satu program tour kami dari AVIA tour adalah mengunjungi Universitas Harvard di Boston, Massachusetts. Kompleks universitas di dominasi dengan warna bata merah. Bangunan bangunan yang ada di tata dengan asri dan bersih. Disini juga ada patung  J Harvard, dan banyak orang mengelus sepatunya. Pokoknya kalau ke Boston harus singgah ke universitas ini.
translated_text: One of our tour programs from AVIA tours was to visit Harvard University in Boston, Massachusetts. The university complex is dominated by the color of red brick. The buildings are beautifully arranged and clean. There is also a statue of J Harvard, and many people are stroking his shoes. Anyway, if you go to Boston, you must stop by this university.

title: Harvard √© Harvard
text: Talvez a universidade mais famosa do mundo. Estar neste campus passear por ele √© espetacular. O lugar √© lindo e realmente transmite a magia de Harvard. Vale muito o passeio.
translated_text: Perhaps the most famous university in the world. Being on this campus and walking around it is spectacular. The place is beautiful and really conveys the magic of Harvard. It's well worth a stroll.

title: Klein dorp binnen Boston
text: Misschien dat ons idee te romantisch was/is. We hebben reeds vele campussen in de wereld gezien maar Harvard. ...? Ja de naam is er en er staan enkele historische gebouwen rond de yard, maar de rest is een afknapper. Schreeuwend duur, geen betaalbare parkeerplaatsen. Wij waren er 2 uur en betaalden 29 dollar parkeerkosten. Alles is tot de laatste m2 volgebouwd en op vele plaatsen is er een bouwput. Je mag nergens in of bij als je geen Harvardcard hebt. Jammer.. gemiste kans om aan Harvard-promotie te werken.
translated_text: Maybe our idea was/is too romantic. We have already seen many campuses around the world but Harvard. ...? Yes the name is there and there are some historic buildings around the yard, but the rest is a letdown. Screamingly expensive, no affordable parking. We were there for 2 hours and paid a $29 parking fee. Everything is built up to the last m2 and there is a construction site in many places. You can't get in or near anything if you don't have a Harvard card. Too bad. Missed opportunity to work on Harvard promotion.

title: Um sonho realizado!
text: O Campus de Harvard possui v√°rios pr√©dios espalhados por toda cidade, embora sejam similares, a energia do local √© contagiante. Estive l√° no final de semestre e pude ver todos os preparativos para as formaturas e festas finais. Vale muito a pena visitar, uma boa caminhada e cerca de 4 horas √© o suficiente para ver os principais locais.
translated_text: The Harvard campus has several buildings scattered throughout the city, although they are similar, the energy of the place is contagious. I was there at the end of the semester and saw all the preparations for the graduations and final parties. It's well worth a visit, a good walk and about 4 hours is enough to see the main sites.

title: Visite de la plus vieille universit√© d'Am√©rique du Nord
text: Nous avons effectuer une visite guid√©e √† pied du campus, dans une p√©riode d'examens, juste avant la remise annuelle des dipl√¥mes. Cr√©√©e en 1636 c'est une visite dans l'histoire et le prestige.
translated_text: We took a guided walking tour of the campus during exam time, just before the annual graduation ceremony. Founded in 1636, it's a visit steeped in history and prestige.

title: Um sonho conhecer Harvard University!
text: Apesar da neve e do frio, pudemos visitar todo o campo da Universidade. Como vemos em filmes, grandiosa!
translated_text: Despite the snow and the cold, we were able to visit the entire campus. Just like you see in the movies, grand!

title: Un incontournable
text: Harvard est √† faire si vous aller √† Boston, assurez vous de prendre un tour guid√© pour profitez de l'histoire qui se cache derri√®re Harvard! Les lieux sont splendides et l'histoire associ√©e tr√®s int√©ressante par rapport aux monuments.
translated_text: Harvard is a must-see if you're going to Boston, so be sure to take a guided tour to enjoy the history behind Harvard! The grounds are splendid and the associated history very interesting in relation to the monuments.

title: WOUA
text: ce lieu plein d'histoire et qui fourmille d'endroits plus joli les un que les autres est a decouvrir absolument petit bemol cependant nous ne pouvons pas entrer dans les b√¢timents et c'est bien dommage n√©anmoins le lieu est sublime
translated_text: this place, full of history and teeming with places, each more beautiful than the last, is an absolute must-see small drawback: we can't enter the buildings, which is a real shame, but the place is sublime.

title: Vale a pena conhecer!!
text: Para que √© ligado aos estudos como eu, Harvard √© um passeio imperd√≠vel! F√°cil acesso de metr√¥ e com disponibilidade de tour guiado ($ 12,00). Pr√©dios lindos e hist√≥ria!! Adorei
translated_text: For students like me, Harvard is a must-see! Easy access by subway and guided tours available ($ 12.00). Beautiful buildings and history! I loved it

title: Un dia para recorrer
text:
Recomiendo visitar con amigos o familia, amplios parques, poca gente .
Recorrer su Biblioteca,  Museo,  Iglesia, pensionado de los alumnos, facultades, casino, etc.
Nada que decir sobre su Arquitectura clasica
En la plaza puedes  almorzar, se instalan uno camiones  con comida.
Uno de ellos tiene pizza, con un horno de " Le√±o " como en Italia, realmente exquisita, nos repetimos, y a muy  buen precio.
translated_text:
I recommend visiting with friends or family, large parks, few people.
Visit its library, museum, church, students' boarding school, faculties, casino, etc.
Nothing to say about its classical architecture.
In the square you can have lunch, there are food trucks.
One of them has pizza, with an oven of "Le√±o" as in Italy, really exquisite, we repeat, and at a very good price.

title: Un pedacito de un sue√±o
text: Para cualquier profesional del mundo, estudiar en Harvard es un poco como un sue√±o. De hecho, es quizas una de las tres universidades m√°s ic√≥nicas del mundo. Caminamos por el campus y los alrededores, y realmente es bonito, aunque para mi gusto, la universidad de Northwestern en Chicago tiene un campus m√°s bonito.
translated_text: For any professional in the world, studying at Harvard is a bit of a dream. In fact, it is perhaps one of the three most iconic universities in the world. We walked around the campus and the surrounding area, and it really is beautiful, although for my taste, Northwestern University in Chicago has a nicer campus.

title: Wereldberoemd en past in de sfeer van de stad
text: Een bezoek zeker waard! De wereldberoemde universiteit past perfect in de sfeer van de stad Boston. Uniek!
translated_text: Well worth a visit! The world-famous university fits perfectly into the atmosphere of the city of Boston. Unique!

title: PASSEIO SEM GRA√áA!!
text: Passeio sem gra√ßa!! Pr√©dios todos iguais, sem interatividade, no centro da cidade de Cambridge, MA. O CAMPUS DA USP da Cidade Universit√°ria, em S√£o Paulo, SP √© infinitamente melhor para um passeio tur√≠stico.
translated_text: No fun! All the same buildings, with no interactivity, in downtown Cambridge, MA. The USP CAMPUS in Cidade Universit√°ria, S√£o Paulo, SP is infinitely better for sightseeing.

title: Espectacular
text: Creo que Harvard es lo m√°s icono de Massachusetts y sin duda es una visita obligada. Los edificios son alucinantes (claro que no se puede entrar a ninguno si no sos estudiante) pero vale la pena recorrerlo. Yo no tuve gu√≠a y es algo de lo que me arrepiento porque sinceramente lo merece.
translated_text: I think Harvard is the most iconic thing in Massachusetts and it is definitely a must visit. The buildings are amazing (of course you can't enter any of them if you're not a student) but it's worth the walk. I didn't have a guide and it's something I regret because it's honestly worth it.

title: Decepcionante
text: Siempre oyes que vale la pena visitar Harvard si visitas Boston, pero no deja de ser una universidad m√°s, sobretodo teniendo en cuenta la cantidad de universidades que hay en Boston. Puedes ver los jardines y poca cosa m√°s.
translated_text: You always hear that Harvard is worth visiting if you visit Boston, but it is just another university, especially considering the number of universities in Boston. You can see the gardens and little else.

title: Una visita imperdible.
text:
Visitar este lugar me produjo la sensaci√≥n de estar en la cuna de la ense√±anza contempor√°nea, debo confesar tambi√©n sent√≠ alguna sana envidia hacia los estudiantes con los cuales nos cruz√°bamos en nuestro camino.
Las instalaciones son realmente magn√≠ficas, los jardines excelentes. 
Debo confesar que yo cre√≠a que hab√≠a sido fundada por el cl√©rigo J.Harvard y no era as√≠ fue su primer benefactor. No dejen de visitarla si anda por all√≠
translated_text:
Visiting this place gave me the feeling of being in the cradle of contemporary education, I must confess I also felt some healthy envy towards the students with whom we crossed our path.
The facilities are truly magnificent, the gardens excellent.
I must confess that I thought it had been founded by the clergyman J. Harvard and he was its first benefactor. Be sure to visit it if you are in the area.

title: ÁÖâÁì¶ÈÄ†„Çä„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: ÂåªÂ≠¶ÈÉ®Á≥ª„ÅØ„Ç∞„É™„Éº„É≥„É©„Ç§„É≥EÁ∑ö„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå‰ª•Â§ñ„ÅÆÂ≠¶ÈÉ®„ÅØ„É¨„ÉÉ„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„Åß„Åì„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éé„Éº„Éô„É´Ë≥ûÂèóË≥ûËÄÖ„ÇíÂ§ö„ÅèËº©Âá∫„Åô„Çã„Å™„Å©‰∏ñÁïåÊúÄÈ´òÂ≥∞„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÅßÂ∏´„Çâ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÅØË¶≥ÂÖâ„Åß„ÇÇÂÖ•„Çå„ÄÅÊïô‰ºö„ÇÇÂÖ•„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊ†°Ëàé„ÅåÁÖâÁì¶ÈÄ†„Çä„ÅßË∂£„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅÊ≠£ÈñÄ„Åã„ÇâÂÖ•„Çã„Å®Âè≥Ë∂≥„ÅÆÂÖà„ÇíËß¶„Çã„Å®Âπ∏ÈÅã„Çí„ÇÇ„Åü„Çâ„Åô„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆÂÉè„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÇÇ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„ÇπÂÜÖ„Å´ÁµêÊßã„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: The medical school is on the E line of the Green Line, but all other faculties are on the Red Line. The campus is open to tourists, and the church is open to visitors. The brick buildings are quaint, and as you enter through the main gate, you will see a statue of Harvard, which brings good luck if you touch the tip of its right foot. There are quite a few tourists on campus.

title: Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ÏóêÏÑú Íº≠ Í∞ÄÎ≥ºÎßåÌïú Í≥≥ !
text: ÎÇ®Ìé∏Í≥º Ìï®Íªò Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ÏúºÎ°ú Ïó¨ÌñâÏùÑ Í∞îÏùÑ Îïå ÏïÑÎ¨¥ÎûòÎèÑ Í∞ÄÏû• ÏÜêÏóê ÍºΩÍ≤å Í∞ÄÍ≥†Ïã∂ÏùÄ Í≥≥ Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÏòÄÏñ¥Ïöî :) ÏïÑÏπ® ÏùºÏ∞ç Í∞îÎäîÎç∞ÎèÑ Î∂àÍµ¨ÌïòÍ≥† Ï°¥ ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìú ÎèôÏÉÅ Í∞ôÏùÄ Í≤ΩÏö∞Îäî Ïù¥ÎØ∏ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ùÎì§Î°ú Î∞úÎîîÎîú ÌãàÏù¥ ÏóÜÎçîÎùºÍµ¨Ïöî. Î™ÖÎ¨∏ Ï§ëÏóê Î™ÖÎ¨∏Ïù∏ ÎåÄÌïôÍµêÎùº Í∑∏Îü∞ÏßÄ ÌïôÏÉùÎ≥¥Îã§ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ùÏù¥ Îçî ÎßéÏùÄÍ≤É Í∞ôÏïÑ Î≥¥Ïù¥Í∏∞ÎèÑ ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Í∑∏ÎûòÎèÑ Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥Ïóê Îì§Î•∏Îã§Î©¥ ÌïúÎ≤àÏØ§ÏùÄ Í∞ÄÎ≥ºÎßåÌïú Í≥≥ Í∞ôÏïÑÏöî !
translated_text: When I traveled to Boston with my husband, it was one of my favorite places to visit :) Even though we went there early in the morning, the statue of John Harvard was already crowded with tourists. It seems like there are more tourists than students because it's a prestigious university, but it's still worth a visit if you're in Boston!

title: Con gu√≠a o sin ella deben IR!
text:
Es muy lindo ir a conocer la universidad y su historia! Una pena que no se pueda entrar a la biblioteca sin credencial.
Vale mucho la pena!
translated_text:
It is very nice to get to know the university and its history! Too bad you can't enter the library without a credential.
It is well worth it!

title: Bra organisation, utm√§rkta l√§rare och bra kringservice
text: Trevlig milj√∂. Harry Potterk√§nsla. Historisk milj√∂.  H√∂g klass p√• undervisning och  organisation. Inspirrande!
translated_text: Pleasant environment. Harry Potter feel. Historic setting.  High class teaching and organization. Inspiring!

title: Vale conhecer o campus mais famoso de US
text: A universidade √© realmente pitoresca. √â um passeio agrad√°vel tanto dentro do campus como nas ruas pr√≥ximas. Do lado de fora tem uma √°rea de lazer onde os estudantes ficam estudando ou descansando. Nessa √°rea a universidade  oferece algumas atividades como Ping Pong e outras para crian√ßas.
translated_text: The university is really picturesque. It's a pleasant walk both inside the campus and in the surrounding streets. Outside there is a leisure area where students can study or rest. In this area the university offers some activities such as Ping Pong and others for children.

title: Prestige Universit√©
text: Universit√© John Harvard  reconnu mondiale gigantesque en plien centre ville de Boston  les b√¢timents en briques rouges  architecture inpresionnante et  la statue de John Harvard   l'entr√©e n'est pas autoris√©  dans un quartier chic promener dans un immence parc pliens  d' √©cureuil et des sculptures des canards
translated_text: John Harvard University world-renowned gigantic in plien downtown Boston red brick buildings inpresionnante architecture and statue of John Harvard entry is not allowed in a chic neighborhood walk in a huge park pliens of squirrels and sculptures of ducks

title: –†–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É—é –∫ –ø–æ—Å–µ—â–µ–Ω–∏—é
translated_text: Very curious to see an American college town. Especially since they often appear in movies. I got there on a day off, there were no students, but some student, obviously inebriated, led a tour for future students (it was in some movie). Getting there is not difficult, the subway station is called Harvard. The subway in Boston is simple, it's not hard to figure out. Nearby is the Harvard Museum and several old buildings.

title: Inolvidable
text: Es un lugar tranquilo, cerrado al tr√°fico por lo que se respira un ambiente muy peculiar. Tiene mucha vida y siempre hay estudiantes de un lado a otro. Los edificios son una maravilla y las bibliotecas impresionantes. No desmerece en absoluto respecto a lo que uno ha imaginado. Mucho mejor si alguien te cuenta las historias de cada edificio y de cada rinc√≥n.
translated_text: It is a quiet place, closed to traffic so it has a very peculiar atmosphere. It has a lot of life and there are always students from one side to the other. The buildings are wonderful and the libraries are impressive. It does not detract at all from what one has imagined. Much better if someone tells you the stories of each building and each corner.

title: ÊôÆÈÄö„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÅÆ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÊÑü„Åò
text: „Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„ÇπÂÜÖ„Å´Ë¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„Åß„ÇÇË™∞„Åß„ÇÇÂÖ•„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„ÇπÂÜÖ„Çí„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„É≠„Ç¥„ÅÆÊúç„ÇíÁùÄ„Å¶Ê≠©„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ≠¶Áîü„Åå„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: Anyone can enter the campus, even tourists. There were students walking around the campus wearing Harvard logo clothing.

title: Recorriendo Harvard
text:
Recorrimos Harvard en una tarde, conociendo los diferentes pabellones y facultades.
Puedes conectarte gratis a wifi.
Es un lugar amplio, con muchos espacios que visitar.
translated_text:
We toured Harvard in an afternoon, seeing the different halls and faculties.
You can connect for free to wifi.
It is a large place, with many spaces to visit.

title: Rondleiding op Harvard
text: Vandaag hebben we -samen met een nichtje dat hier een jaar au pair is. - Harvard bezocht. We haan een rondleiding door Boris, die het erg leuk deed. Veel info over hoe het is om er te studeren! Veel gezien, daarna nog rondgelopen, mooi!
translated_text: Today we -together with a niece who is an au pair here for a year. - visited Harvard. We haan a tour by Boris, who did a very nice job. Lots of info about what it's like to study there! Saw a lot, then walked around, beautiful!

title: Interesante visita
text: Nos tomamos la linea roja desde Boston por 2.75 por cabeza. Esta dos estaciones despues del MIT. Entrar al campus es entrar a un conjunto de edificios que aglutinan dormis y edificios con aulas. Impresiona la biblioteca y el rectorado. Fuimos un dia soleado en el que los estudiantes disfrutaban de los espacios verdes . Hay una plaza donde comen los estudiantes que compran en un conjuntos de foodtruck a aprox 8/9 uss el plato donde habia juegos.
translated_text: We took the red line from Boston for 2.75 per head. It is two stations after MIT. Entering the campus is to enter a complex of buildings with dorms and classroom buildings. The library and the chancellor's office are impressive. We went on a sunny day when the students were enjoying the green spaces. There is a square where students eat and buy from a set of food trucks at about 8/9 uss a plate where there were games.

title: Sonho
text: Voltar a este lugar foi maravilhoso. Sentir a atmosfera de sapi√™ncia e estudo que circunda Harvard √© renovador. Passar pelo seus caminhos e desejar ser um de seus alunos. Ir a Harvard √© inspirar-se na busca do conhecimento. Fui, voltei, recomendo e voltarei.
translated_text: Returning to this place was wonderful. To feel the atmosphere of wisdom and study that surrounds Harvard is refreshing. Passing through it and wishing you were one of its students. To go to Harvard is to be inspired in the pursuit of knowledge. I've been, I've been back, I recommend it and I'll be back.

title: ENTRETENIDO
text: Una de las mejores universidades del mundo, es bueno poder conocerla y saber la historia de ella.No toqu√© la bota de la estatua pero tiene una historia graciosa y es un lugar tranquilo para visitar.
translated_text: One of the best universities in the world, it is good to be able to know it and know the history of it.I did not touch the boot of the statue but it has a funny story and it is a quiet place to visit.

title: No se puede dejar de ir!
text: Se llega en metro y te deja justo en frente. EL campus en realidad es bastante bonito y tranquilo. Los edifcicios se pueden visitar por fuera, ya que casi todos requieren de ID para poder entrar. Es un paseo agradable y si est√°s en Boston creo que es una visita obligatoria ir a la una de las universidades m√°s prestigiosas.
translated_text: You can get there by subway and it leaves you right in front of the campus. The campus is actually quite nice and quiet. The buildings can be visited from the outside, since almost all of them require ID to enter. It is a nice walk and if you are in Boston I think it is a must to visit one of the most prestigious universities.

title: Fant√°stico
text: O complexo universit√°rio de Harvard University √© simplesmente incr√≠vel. √â um lugar memor√°vel e um dos grandes √≠cones da educa√ß√£o mundial. A arquitetura complementa o ar intelectual que h√° no local. Simplesmente incr√≠vel.
translated_text: The Harvard University complex is simply incredible. It is a memorable place and one of the great icons of world education. The architecture complements the intellectual air of the place. Simply incredible.

title: Lambida Lambida Lambida
text: Eu n√£o sei se vc gostava de assistir os Nerds e ver as comunidades tal... mas para mim estar em Harvard foi relembrar um pouco disso do passado e dos revolucion√°rios do presente como Zunkenberg. √â gostoso demais caminhar pelas alamedas de uma das melhores universidades do mundo e sentir o clima de sucesso no ar!
translated_text: I don't know if you liked watching the nerds and seeing the communities... but for me, being at Harvard was a reminder of the past and the revolutionaries of the present, like Zunkenberg. It's so nice to walk along the avenues of one of the best universities in the world and feel the atmosphere of success in the air!

title: Informarse sobre los tours guiados
text: Los mismos estudiantes hacen tours y visitas para grupos, la arquitectura es muy hermosa y se la puede apreciar sin absoluta necesidad de un gu√≠a pero enriquece mucho saber las historias de los edificios, eso s√≠, los tours son dados en ingl√©s.
translated_text: The students themselves make tours and visits for groups, the architecture is very beautiful and can be appreciated without the absolute need of a guide but it is very enriching to know the history of the buildings, yes, the tours are given in English.

title: Universit√§t
text: Wir haben an einem Samstag die Harvard Universit√§t besucht. Man kann sich frei (ohne gro√üe Kontrolle) auf dem Gel√§nde bewegen. Einfach erreichbar mit der roten Linie. Um die Uni sind viele Caf√©s.
translated_text: We visited Harvard University on a Saturday. You can move around the grounds freely (without much control). Easy to reach with the red line. There are lots of caf√©s around the university.

translated_text: Harvard University, one of the best universities in the United States and perhaps the world, is a university that everyone wants to go to. It's located in the city of Cambridge, but think of it as Boston.

text: Vi passade p√• att √•ka ut med tunnelbanan som gick mycket smidigt. Gick runt o nj√∂t av milj√∂n. V√§rt ett bes√∂k bara f√∂r att och mycket fint att promenera runt.

translated_text: Surrounded by trees, the plaza overlooked Harvard Memorial Church, Seber Hall (a classroom that seats about 200 people), and the Widener Memorial Library. We climbed the stone steps and opened the library doors, but the public was not allowed inside.

title: Visita √† Harvard
text: Fui no inverno ent√£o tenho pouco a comentar pois a visita foi super r√°pida devido ao frio. S√≥ consegui ver a est√°tua de bronze de John Harvard, fundador, e claro beijar seus p√©s. Caminhar na Universidade de Harvard √© diferente, pelo que pude perceber, do MIT. Harvard est√° distribuida na cidade de Massachusetts em v√°rios pr√©dios.
translated_text: I went in winter, so I have little to say as the visit was very quick due to the cold. I only managed to see the bronze statue of John Harvard, the founder, and of course kiss his feet. Walking around Harvard University is different, as far as I could tell, from MIT. Harvard is spread over the city of Massachusetts in several buildings.

title: Universidade de Harvard
text: Uma das mais prestigiadas universidades do mundo, fundada em 1636. Uma institui√ß√£o de tamanha import√¢ncia, que haveria muito para se falar, mas √© bom esclarecer que esta avalia√ß√£o √© apenas da Universidade como ponto tur√≠stico. O campus da Universidade √© lindo, e tem como ponto alto a est√°tua de bronze de John Harvard, um pastor ingl√™s e que foi viver em Massachusetts, tendo feito uma importante doa√ß√£o √† institui√ß√£o que hoje tem o seu nome. O turista pode caminhar entre os alunos, pelos jardins e apreciar os bel√≠ssimos pr√©dios da universidade, com destaque para a Biblioteca. H√° muito o que se ver, ent√£o recomendo dedicar pelo menos duas horas para passear pelo local. A universidade √© acess√≠vel facilmente por metr√¥ e fica no centro da cidade de Cambridge, apenas 3 km de Boston.
translated_text: One of the most prestigious universities in the world, founded in 1636. It's such an important institution that there's a lot to talk about, but it's worth pointing out that this review is only about the university as a tourist attraction. The university campus is beautiful and its highlight is the bronze statue of John Harvard, an English pastor who went to live in Massachusetts and made an important donation to the institution that today bears his name. Tourists can walk among the students, through the gardens and appreciate the university's beautiful buildings, especially the Library. There is a lot to see, so I recommend spending at least two hours wandering around. The university is easily accessible by subway and is located in Cambridge city center, just 3 km from Boston.

title: Tr√®s bien
text: Tr√®s bien, tr√®s grand, on peu se perdre. Petit food-truck pr√®s du parc central, excellente bouffe.  Une visite √† en pas manquer

title: Vale la pena la visita
text: Vale la pena totalmente la visita. No se puede recorrer mucho m√°s que el campus y los edificios por fuera, pero si estas en Boston hay que ir. Quiz√°s hacerlos con gu√≠a (de los mismos estudiantes) es mejor para poder conocer mejor
translated_text: It is totally worth the visit. You can't tour much more than the campus and the buildings on the outside, but if you are in Boston you have to go. Maybe doing it with a guide (from the students themselves) is better to get to know it better.

title: Le cose le piu importante non si vedono, pero...
text: La vita intellettuale di una universita non √® visibile al visitatore... Pero, l'ambiente del'Harvard Yard √® eccezionale, e vale la pena di visitarlo. Senza, ovviamente, dimenticare i musei di arte (Fogg), di antropologia (Peabody), di paleontologia e geologia (Harvard Museum of Natural History).
translated_text: The intellectual life of a university is not visible to the visitor.... Pero, the environment of the Harvard Yard is exceptional, and well worth a visit. Without, of course, forgetting the museums of art (Fogg), anthropology (Peabody), paleontology and geology (Harvard Museum of Natural History).

title: Valore alle scuole.
text: Siamo stati sia nel campus del College in zona Cambridge che alla Harvard Medical School che si trova in un‚Äôaltra zona della citt√†.
translated_text: We stayed both at the College campus in the Cambridge area and at Harvard Medical School, which is in another part of the city.

title: Super visite
text: Visite guid√©e avec guide fran√ßais Manuel par le site Boston le nez en l air de Mathilde.  Malgr√© une temp√©rature ext√©rieure de -10, nous √©tions gel√©s , visite tr√®s int√©ressante avec un guide √† notre √©coute.  super agr√©able et chaleureux.  A ne pas manquer !!
translated_text: Guided tour with French guide Manuel by Mathilde's site Boston le nez en l'air.  Despite an outside temperature of -10, we were freezing, very interesting visit with a guide who listened to us. super pleasant and warm.  Not to be missed!

title: Un peu tristounette
text: Les b√¢timents sont en brique et un peu triste. La neige et le froid √† rendu la visite assez difficile. J'ai trouv√© l'endroit sans grand int√©r√™t malheureusement.
translated_text: The buildings are brick and a bit sad. The snow and cold made the visit rather difficult. Unfortunately, I didn't find the place very interesting.

title: Campus lindo, passeio muito agradavel
text: O Campus √© enorme e muito lindo. √â um passeio super agradavel e vale muito conhecer. D√° uma paz enorme.
translated_text: The campus is huge and very beautiful. It's a very pleasant walk and well worth seeing. It gives you enormous peace.

title: Universit√§t
text:
Waren zu Fuss unterwegs und haben das Gel√§nde besucht. Sieht so aus wie in den Filmen.
Alte und neue Geb√§ude erg√§nzen sich im Gel√§nde.
