We went on foot and visited the site. It looks just like in the movies.
Old and new buildings complement each other on the site.

title: Vorlesung gehalten
text: Oulisse hielt im Freien vor der Bibliothek eine Vorlesung √ºber Irrfahrten der Philosophie. Bei Temperaturen unter -1 Grad wollte aber keiner zuh√∂ren. So brach man die Lesung vorzeitig ab. Die Statue eines John Havard r√ºhrte sich hingegen nicht vom Fleck. Nach dem Zustand seines linken Schuhs ist der Mann Reibung gew√∂hnt. Ob die Kinder kl√ºger werden, wenn sie den anfassen? Aberglaube macht jedenfalls eher dumm. √úber den Campus schlendern ist interessant, Cambridge ist auch besuchenswert! Eine gef√ºhrte Tour bringt am meisten. Die H√∂rnchen all√ºberall wollen im Winter ein bischen Futter, dann kommen sie n√§her. Es gibt schwarze und hellere, merkw√ºrdig in USA?
translated_text: Oulisse gave a lecture on the odysseys of philosophy outside the library. But with temperatures below -1 degrees, nobody wanted to listen. So the lecture was stopped early. The statue of John Havard, on the other hand, didn't budge. Judging by the condition of his left shoe, the man is used to friction. Will the children get smarter if they touch it? In any case, superstition tends to make people stupid. Strolling around the campus is interesting, Cambridge is also worth a visit! A guided tour is best. The squirrels everywhere want a bit of food in winter, then they come closer. There are black ones and lighter ones, strange in the USA?

title: Encantadora
text: Eu adoro esta university todas as vezes que vou para Boston n√£o me canso de dar uma passadinha l√°. Ela √© uma cidade, sua hist√≥ria √© maravilhosa tudo nela √© encantador... recomendo e voltarei com certeza...
translated_text: I love this university and every time I go to Boston I never tire of stopping by. It's a city, its history is wonderful, everything about it is enchanting... I recommend it and I'll definitely be back...

title: Áæé„Åó„ÅÑ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ
text: Áü•„ÇäÂêà„ÅÑ„ÅÆfaculty„ÇíË®™„Å≠„Å´„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Å∏„ÄÇÁæé„Åó„ÅèÊï¥ÂÇô„Åï„Çå„Åü„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„Åß„ÄÅ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆË≥áÈáëÂäõ„ÇíË¶ã„Åõ„Å§„Åë„Çâ„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÁèæÂú®„ÅØ„Ç§„ÇÆ„É™„Çπ„ÄÅ„É≠„É≥„Éâ„É≥„ÅÆÈÉΩÂ∏ÇÂûã„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶Èô¢„Å´„ÅÑ„Çã„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Â∫ÉÂ§ß„Å™„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÅØÊú¨ÂΩì„Å´Áæ®„Åæ„Åó„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
translated_text: I went to Harvard to visit a FACULTY I know. The beautifully maintained campus showed me how well funded Harvard is. Since I am currently in a graduate school in London, England, on an urban campus, I really envy a sprawling campus like Harvard's.

title: Lindo Campus!
text: O campis da Harvard University √© muito bonito, com pr√©dios antigos e diferentes arquiteturas. Vale a pena passar l√° e apreciar o espa√ßo, al√©m valer boas fotos.
translated_text: The Harvard University campus is very beautiful, with old buildings and different architectures. It's worth stopping by and enjoying the space, as well as taking some great photos.

title: Intelecto Arquitectonico
text: Para llegar ahi esta aproximadamente a 20 min. de Boston Common en carro, recomiendo que lleguen antes de que caiga la noche pues podr√°s disfrutar mejor el lugar, se puede admirar edificios que constituyen  la universidad mas famosa del mundo, por cierto no olvides tocar el pie de la estatura de Harvard (Aunque no sea el)
translated_text: To get there is approximately 20 min. from Boston Common by car, I recommend that you arrive before nightfall because you can better enjoy the place, you can admire buildings that make up the most famous university in the world, by the way do not forget to touch the foot of the stature of Harvard (although not him).

title: Una visita obligada cuando se anda por Boston.
text: Ciertamente, cuando uno va a Boston, tiene que dedicarle al menos medio d√≠a para visitar la Universidad de Harvard. Se puede llegar v√≠a metro desde el centro de Boston, y justo saliendo de la estaci√≥n se encuentra la entrada al campus central. Recomendar√≠a ampliamente tomar un tour para conocer el mismo; nosotros no lo tomamos, y lo lamentamos un poco. No obstante, uno puede deambular por el campus y admirar los edificios sin ning√∫n problema.
translated_text: Certainly, when you go to Boston, you have to dedicate at least half a day to visit Harvard University. It can be reached via subway from downtown Boston, and just outside the station is the entrance to the central campus. I would highly recommend taking a tour to see it; we did not, and regretted it somewhat. However, one can wander around the campus and admire the buildings without any problem.

title: Prestigieuse universit√© am√©ricaine
text:
Un grand parc et d'aust√®res b√¢timents de briques rouges qui l'entoure le tout donnant une impression de qui√©tude reposante.
Un flux continu d'√©tudiants et de touristes traverse lentement le parc et fl√¢ne autour des pelouses avant de converger vers la statue de John Harvard pour √™tre pris en photo avec une main sur le pied en bronze qui luit √† force de frottements.
translated_text:
A large park and austere red-brick buildings surround it, giving an impression of restful tranquility.
A steady stream of students and tourists slowly crosses the park and strolls around the lawns before converging on the statue of John Harvard to have their photo taken with a hand on the bronze foot, which gleams with friction.

translated_text:
Beautifully maintained buildings.Historic Harvard grand and stately.

text: Nous avons visit√© le site le jour de la Graduation et c'√©tait m√©morable! Les divers fanions des "Halls" √©taient visibles partout sur le site et tout autour de la place de la c√©r√©monie...
translated_text: We visited the site on Graduation Day and it was memorable! The various "Halls" pennants were visible all over the site and all around the ceremony square...

text: Pra quem est√° no MIT, √© um bom passeio. A universidade √© gigantesca e √© muito legal entender e absorver um pouco da cultura.

text: Sollte man auf jeden Fall gesehen haben, wenn man schon mal in Boston ist. Sch√∂ne Anlage mit Flair..

title: Linda no outono
text: Harvard √© um local que vale a pena visitar quando estiver em Boston. Tocar os p√©s de John Harvard, ver a natureza nos belos jardins, ver as principais escolas e fazer uma visita guiada pelos pr√≥prios alunos de Harvard, s√£o atra√ß√µes deste passeio.
translated_text: Harvard is well worth a visit when you're in Boston. Touching the feet of John Harvard, seeing nature in the beautiful gardens, seeing the main schools and taking a guided tour by Harvard students themselves are all attractions on this tour.

title: Boston, Cambridge et Salem pour l‚ÄôHalloween
text: J‚Äôai fait un circuit guid√© de 3 jours √† Boston et Salem.  Wow l‚Äôarchitecture est magnifique.  Le mus√©e de Boston est un incontournable et le Prudential Tower pour sa vue sur Boston.  Il ne faut pas oublier le House seven g√¢bles  et ses secrets.   Que dire de Harvard.  De toute beaut√©.  Je recommande cette aventure
translated_text: I took a 3-day guided tour of Boston and Salem.  Wow, the architecture is magnificent.  The Museum of Boston is a must, and the Prudential Tower for its view of Boston.  And don't forget House Seven Gables and its secrets.   And Harvard.  It's a thing of beauty.  I recommend this adventure

title: La pi√π antica Universit√† degli Stati Uniti d‚ÄôAmerica.
text:
Harvard √® rinomata e conosciuta in tutto il mondo per avere accolto grandi economisti e personaggi politici oltre ad aver ospitato parecchi premi Nobel tra i suoi banchi....
Insomma assolutamente da visitare se siete a Cambridge.
Il Campus ruota intorno ad Harvard Yard, un pratone incoronato dalla splendida Widener library e dalla Memorial Church. Sedetevi comodamente nel verde e contemplate quest‚Äôoasi di cultura.
translated_text:
Harvard is renowned and known worldwide for having welcomed great economists and political figures as well as hosting several Nobel laureates among its desks....
In short, absolutely a must-visit if you are in Cambridge.
The campus revolves around Harvard Yard, a lawn crowned by the beautiful Widener library and Memorial Church. Sit comfortably in the greenery and contemplate this oasis of culture.

title: Tr√®s belle visite
text: Nous nous sommes balad√©s dans le parc et ensuite sous conseil de l'office de tourisme (kiosque qui se trouve √† c√¥t√© de la sortie de metro) nous nous sommes dirig√© vers le centre informations de harvard  (il se trouve en dehors du cempus) pour faire une visite guid√©e gratuite en anglais (pour 2‚Ç¨ vous pouvez avoir la traduction en fran√ßais sur un document  papier) visite effectu√©e par un √©tudiant .
translated_text: We strolled through the park and then, on the advice of the tourist office (kiosk next to the metro exit), headed for the Harvard information center (outside the cempus) for a free guided tour in English (for ‚Ç¨2 you can get a French translation on paper) led by a student.

title: –ö—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–æ
translated_text: Very beautiful and luxurious university. Huge buildings. It is immediately noticeable that this is the oldest university in America. There are both old buildings and brand new ones.

title: Reposant
text: Reposant , les lieux sont calmes et ils se d√©gage quelques chose qu'on ne peut d√©crire. Remarquer comment vous vous sentirez lors de votre visite. Nous avons jamais vu les √©tudiants pour les tours guid√©s ( nous √©tions un vendredi vers 15 h ) peut √™tre pour cette raison. Je m'attendait √† quelques choses de tr√®s gros mais c'est tout petit mais d√©gage beaucoup au risque de me r√©p√©ter.
translated_text: Reposant, the place is calm and there's something about it that can't be described. Notice how you feel during your visit. We never saw the students for the guided tours ( we were on a Friday around 3 pm ) maybe for this reason. I was expecting something very big, but it's very small and gives off a lot, at the risk of repeating myself.

title: ‰∏ñÁïå„ÅÆÂêçÈñÄÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: 2017Âπ¥5Êúà„Éú„Çπ„Éà„É≥ÊóÖË°å„ÅÆÈöõ„Å´Ë®™„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„ÅÇ„ÅÑ„Å´„Åè„ÅÆÈõ®„Å†„Å£„Åü„ÅÆ„ÅåÊÆãÂøµ„Åß„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÂ∫É„ÅÑÊ†°ÂÜÖ„Å´„ÅØÁ∑ë„ÅåÂ§ö„Åè„ÄÅ„É¨„É≥„Ç¨ÈÄ†„Çä„ÅÆÁ¥†Êïµ„Å™Âª∫Áâ©„ÅåÁ´ã„Å°‰∏¶„Å≥„ÄÅÊô¥„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Çâ„ÇÇ„Å£„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑÊï£Á≠ñ„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åü„Å†„Çç„ÅÜ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇcoop„Åß„Ç∞„ÉÉ„Ç∫„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅÊóÖ„ÅÆÊÄù„ÅÑÂá∫„Å´„Ç≠„É£„ÉÉ„Éó„ÇÑT„Ç∑„É£„ÉÑ„ÇíË≥ºÂÖ•„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: We visited during our trip to Boston in May 2017. Unfortunately, it was raining, but the spacious campus is full of greenery and nice brick buildings, and it would have been a better walk if it had been sunny. coop had merchandise, and we bought caps and t-shirts to remember our trip.

title: Inesquec√≠vel
text: O campus principal de Harvard √© enorme. Muitas pessoas pensam que Harvard √© formada apelas pelos pr√©dios em volta da est√°tua de John Harvard, mas ela √© muito maior, √© praticamente uma mini cidade. O curioso √© que os pr√©dios dos cursos e dormit√≥rios se mesclam com outros estabelecimentos como supermercados e restaurantes, de forma que fica dif√≠cil delimitar o campus. Claro que o campus principal √©  o da est√°tua. O visitante pode circular livremente, mas n√£o √© permitido entrar nas instala√ß√µes. Recomendo fazer o tour guiado pelos alunos (custa 12 U$ por pessoa e dura cerca de 2hs e/ou baixar o aplicativo Harvard Yard Tour para ouvir sobre cada uma das constru√ß√µes. Se voc√™ curte correr, vale a pena tamb√©m correr pelo campus do outro lado do rio, perto do Est√°dio. Fiz isso porque queria conhecer as instala√ß√µes da Universidade voltadas para neg√≥cio e gest√£o. Enfim, se voc√™ √© acad√™mico ou apenas um admirador dessa que √© uma das mais ricas, antigas e influentes universidades do mundo, vale a pena reservar uma manh√£ ou tarde s√≥ para conhec√™-la.
translated_text: Harvard's main campus is huge. Many people think that Harvard is only made up of the buildings around the statue of John Harvard, but it's much bigger, it's practically a mini city. The curious thing is that the course buildings and dormitories are mixed in with other establishments such as supermarkets and restaurants, so that it is difficult to demarcate the campus. Of course, the main campus is the statue. Visitors can move around freely, but are not allowed to enter the facilities. I recommend taking the student-guided tour (it costs 12 U$ per person and lasts about 2 hours) and/or downloading the Harvard Yard Tour app to hear about each of the buildings. If you're into running, it's also worth taking a run around the campus on the other side of the river, near the stadium. I did this because I wanted to see the university's business and management facilities. Anyway, if you're an academic or just an admirer of one of the richest, oldest and most influential universities in the world, it's worth setting aside a morning or afternoon just to see it.

title: Un sue√±o
text:
Recorrer si campus, admirar sus edificios, sentir su historia, respirar paz y sabidur√≠a, as√≠ defino un paseo por Harvard.
Todo muy prolijo y ordenado.
Es grande pero se recorre con facilidad.
Ver edificios de 1600 recorridos por millennials felices es impactante.
translated_text:
To walk through its campus, to admire its buildings, to feel its history, to breathe peace and wisdom, this is how I define a walk through Harvard.
Everything is very neat and orderly.
It is big but it is easy to walk around.
Seeing 1600 buildings walked by happy millennials is impressive.

title: Harvard
text:
No creo que haya nadie en el mundo que no conozca de la existencia de esta universidad que tantas personalidades ha formado y a la que tantas pel√≠culas ha inspirado.

I don't think there is anyone in the world who doesn't know about the existence of this university that has formed so many personalities and inspired so many movies.
The truth is that it does not disappoint at all. Both the university campus and the surroundings.
From the center you can take the red line towards Alewife and get off at the station of the same name.

title: Universit√© mythique
text:
La fameuse universit√© de Harvard!!! Sympa! Les lieu y sont propre et paisible. Vous n'avez pas l'impression d'√™tre sur un campus c'est un peu bizarre la sensation.

translated_text:
The famous Harvard University!!! Nice! The place is clean and peaceful. You don't feel like you're on a campus, it's a bit weird feeling.
But very nice! Easy subway access from downtown Boston

title: Harvard
text: Desde la terminal o desde varios puntos hay un bus (n¬∞1) que te lleva hasta la puerta de la universidad. Es una visita de medio d√≠a ya que hay muchos puntos de inter√©s. Hay visitas guiadas que hacen los mismos estudiantes.

title: Ein Must Do!
text:
Wir haben uns eine gef√ºhrte Tour f√ºr ca. 10 Euro gebucht und waren im Nachhinein sehr gl√ºcklich es gemacht zu haben.

Der geschichtliche Hintergrund, Aktuelles, ber√ºhmte Pers√∂nlichkeiten und vieles mehr wurde in der F√ºhrung erkl√§rt bzw. erkl√§rt. 

An sich ist das Gel√§nde schon beeindruckend und einfach nur sch√∂n. Jeder der Urlaub in Boston macht, sollte sich auch die Harvard Universit√§t anschauen.
translated_text:
We booked a guided tour for around 10 euros and were very happy to have done it afterwards.

The historical background, current events, famous personalities and much more was explained during the tour.

The grounds themselves are impressive and simply beautiful. Anyone on vacation in Boston should also visit Harvard University.

title: Bonito Campus
text: Embora esperasse mais , achei impressionante o poder da tradi√ß√£o que exerce sobre o visitante .Predios enormes com arquitetura antiga .
translated_text: Although I expected more, I found the power of tradition that it exerts over the visitor impressive. Huge buildings with ancient architecture.

text: O campus √© bem arborizado e retratada in√∫meras cenas que j√° vi em filmes, vale muita a visita para ver e fotografar.

title: Impressionante!!
text: Un campus davvero bello e ben organizzato. Ci sono persino i tour che accompagnano i turisti a visitare tutti gli edifici e raccontano la storia dell'Universit√†. Assolutamente da vedere
translated_text: A really beautiful and well-organized campus. There are even tours that take tourists around all the buildings and tell the history of the University. Absolutely a must-see

title: Imperd√≠vel
text:
Realmente imperd√≠vel uma visita a Cambridge, vizinha a Boston, para conhecer Harvard e MIT, al√©m de toda atmosfera que os cerca.

Harvard square tem passeios guiados, apresenta√ß√µes e muitas op√ß√µes de restaurante.

Da pra ir √† p√© do centro de Boston (+_45minutos) e voltar no trem (T).
translated_text:
A visit to Cambridge, next door to Boston, to see Harvard and MIT, and all the atmosphere that surrounds them, is really not to be missed.

Harvard square has guided tours, presentations and many restaurant options.

You can walk from downtown Boston (+45 minutes) and take the train back (T).

title: TOP Bildungsadressen Weltweit
text:
Wenn man schon mal ein paar Tage in Boston ist, haben wir die Zeit genutzt und sind √ºber den Campus der wahrscheinlich mit Yale ber√ºhmtesten Universit√§t in den USA und neben Oxford und Cambridge in der Welt zuschl√§ndern.
Die Geb√§ude sind wirklich sehr beeindruckend und die gesamte Anlage wirkt sehr ordenlich und aufger√§umt. An den Eing√§ngen sind Aush√§nge, die ank√ºndigen welche Foodtrucks an diese Tag auf dem Campus Speisen anbieten. Die Area wo die Trucks stehen l√§d zum verweile, relaxen und Menschen beobachten ein.
Wir haben eine etwas ausgedehntere Tour √ºber das Gel√§nde und die umliegenden Stra√üen gemacht (ohne guide). In 2 std ist man aber gut durch und kann dann weiterziehen z.B. zum Havard Square, MIT oder zum Fenway Park.
translated_text:
If you're in Boston for a few days, we used the time to wander around the campus of what is probably the most famous university in the USA, along with Yale, Oxford and Cambridge.
The buildings are really impressive and the whole campus looks very neat and tidy. There are notices at the entrances announcing which food trucks are serving food on campus that day. The area where the trucks are located invites you to linger, relax and people-watch.
We took a slightly longer tour of the campus and the surrounding streets (without a guide). But you can do it in 2 hours and then move on to Havard Square, MIT or Fenway Park, for example.

title: Harvard tan Harvard
text: Desde el centro de Boston de llega en el Bus n√∫mero 1 ( imposible confundirse porque el destino es Harvard y llevan el cartel). Puede abonarse el ticket con cash en el bus. 2 U$S por persona. El viaje es de unos 20‚Äô. Puedes bajar antes en alg√∫n campus, o dirigirte al √°rea principal. Nosotros lo hicimos solos pero hay cositas guiadas si te interesa tener datos m√°s espec√≠ficos e historia. El paseo es por los jardines . Para ingresar a los buildings es necesaria la ID de estudiante. Impresiona su frialdad casi de gran hospital. Ah√≠ te das cuenta que en Harvard vas a estudiar duro. Tu mente no tendr√° distracci√≥n alguna. Edificios de cemento y √°rboles. No me impacto m√°s all√° de eso. Afuera est√°n los gift stores con lindas cosas. Caras. Y el infaltable Starbucks Coffee que nunca deja de ser tu compa√±ero de viaje.
translated_text: From downtown Boston you can take bus number 1 (impossible to get confused because the destination is Harvard and they have the sign). The ticket can be paid with cash on the bus. 2 U$S per person. The trip is about 20 minutes. You can get off before at a campus, or go to the main area. We did it alone but there are guided tours if you are interested in more specific facts and history. The tour is through the gardens. A student ID is required to enter the buildings. The coldness of the buildings is impressive, almost like a big hospital. There you realize that at Harvard you are going to study hard. Your mind will have no distractions. Concrete buildings and trees. I was not impressed beyond that. Outside are the gift stores with nice things. Expensive. And the ever-present Starbucks Coffee that never fails to be your travel companion.

title: Difficile d'imaginer que des √©tudiants vivent ici
text: B√¢timents en briques rouges, pelouses vertes, voitures de police, groupes et grappes de touristes, il est impossible de croire qu'on est sur un campus universitaire. Et pourtant ! Cette prestigieuse universit√© cach√© bien ses √©tudiants.
translated_text: Red brick buildings, green lawns, police cars, groups and clusters of tourists - it's impossible to believe you're on a university campus. And yet! This prestigious university hides its students well.

title: No decepciona
text:
Paseo recomendable, lleva aproximadamente medio d√≠a. Desde Bost√≥n, se puede ir en Metro o Bus, te dejan pr√°cticamente en la puerta, ser√°n entre 10-15 minutos desde el centro. Cada hora salen visitas guidas, gratis (propina a voluntad). Son en ingles. En nuestro caso, la persona que fue de gu√≠a no nos gust√≥ mucho, pero bueno, cuenta algunas historias, leyendas del lugar, etc. Creo que es bueno hacerlo, y de √∫ltima, si no les parece atractivo, se puede cortar a media visita.
De la universidad mucho no se puede decir... es muy conocida, hermosos sus edificios, parques, etc.... de pel√≠cula..

Visita recomendable.
translated_text:
Recommended tour, it takes about half a day. From Boston, you can go by Metro or Bus, they leave you practically at the door, it will be between 10-15 minutes from downtown. Guided tours depart every hour, free of charge (tip at will). They are in English. In our case, the person who was the guide did not like us much, but well, he tells some stories, legends of the place, etc.. I think it is good to do it, and lastly, if you don't find it attractive, you can cut it in the middle of the visit.
There is not much to say about the university... it is very well known, beautiful buildings, parks, etc. .... of film...
The atmosphere in the area is very nice, it is good to go in the morning and have lunch in the area, very lively.
Recommended visit.

title: De dar inveja
text: Uma visita a este lugar demonstra muito bem a raz√£o deste pa√≠s ser a primeira economia do mundo. Respira-se conhecimento, pessoas estudando em todos os lugares, simplesmente fant√°stico.
translated_text: A visit to this place really shows why this country is the world's leading economy. You can breathe knowledge, people studying everywhere, it's simply fantastic.

title: Bellissimo posto
text: Consiglio a tutti di visitare questa universit√†. √à un posto molto bello. L‚Äôarchitettura √® veramente stupenda. Peccato di non poter tornare indietro per poter riprendere gli studi in un posto cos√¨!
translated_text: I recommend everyone to visit this university. It is a very beautiful place. The architecture is really beautiful. Too bad I can't go back to resume my studies in such a place!

title: Impactante University
text: Harvard es una universidad privada ubicada en Cambridge Massachusetts. Fundada en 1636. Es una de las 8 universidades elite de EU Ivy League. Hay visitas guiadas o puedes pasear tu mismo y recorrerla!

title: E' un must ormai
text: Forse l'universit√† pi√π famose al mondo... come si pu√≤ visitare Boston senza fare un giro ad Harvard?! Il campus √® molto carino: prati, alberi, palazzi in mattoni. Definitely worth a walk. Better yet inquire about the tours organized by the students themselves, so you will get a lot of interesting information!

title: Harvard University
text: Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ Î∞©Î¨∏ÏãúÏóê Íº≠ Îì§Î†§ÏïºÌïòÎäîÍ≥≥Ïù¥ÎùºÍ≥† Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤†ÏßÄÏöî ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìú ÎåÄÌïôÎøêÏïÑÎãàÎùº Ï£ºÎ≥ÄÏóê ÏûëÏùÄ Í∞ÄÍ≤åÎì§Í≥º ÍπåÌéò/ÏùåÏãùÏ†êÎì§ÎèÑ Îì§Î¶¨Î©¥ Ï¢ãÍµ¨Ïöî Î¥ÑÏù¥ÎÇò Í∞ÄÏùÑÏóê Î∞©Î¨∏ÌïòÎ©¥ ÎÇ†Ïî®Í∞Ä Ï¢ãÍ≥† ÌïôÏÉùÎì§ÎèÑ ÎßéÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìúÏùò Î∂ÑÏúÑÍ∏∞Î•º Ï†úÎåÄÎ°ú ÎäêÎÇÑÏàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§ Í∞ÄÏù¥Îìú Ìà¨Ïñ¥ÎèÑ ÏûàÏúºÎãà ÏòÅÏñ¥Í∞Ä Ìé∏ÌïòÏã† Î∂ÑÎì§ÏóêÍ≤ê Ï∂îÏ≤úÌïòÍµ¨Ïöî ÏãúÍ∞Ñ Ïó¨Ïú†Í∞Ä ÏûàÏúºÏãúÎ©¥ Ï∞∞Ïä§ Í∞ïÍ∞ÄÏ™ΩÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ∞Ï±ÖÏùÑ Îã§ÎÖÄÏò§ÏãúÎäîÍ≤ÉÎèÑ Ï∂îÏ≤úÌï©ÎãàÎã§
translated_text: It is a must-see when visiting Boston, not only for Harvard University, but also for the small shops and cafes/restaurants around it. If you visit in spring or fall, the weather is nice and there are many students, so you can really feel the atmosphere of Harvard. There are also guided tours, so it is recommended for those who are comfortable with English, and if you have time, I recommend taking a walk along the Charles River.

title: Meines Erachtens in Boston ein Muss
text: Jeder Akademiker der sich in Borsten auff√§llt sollte sich zumindest mal in Harvard umgesehen haben. Die Parkplatz Situation ist katastrophal. So richtige Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten habe ich auch nicht erkennen k√∂nnen

title: Áæé„Åó„ÅÑÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: ÁÖâÁì¶ÈÄ†„Çä„ÅÆÁ¥†Êïµ„Å™Âª∫Áâ©„Å®Á∑ë„ÅåÂç∞Ë±°ÁöÑ„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÈÉ®Â§ñËÄÖ„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÂª∫Áâ©„ÅÆ‰∏≠„Å´„ÅØÂÖ•„Çå„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅåÂçÅÂàÜ„Å´Èõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„ÇíÂë≥„Çè„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇË¶ãÂ≠¶ËÄÖ„ÇÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÄÅ„Ç∏„Éß„É≥„Éª„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂÉè„ÅÆË∂≥„ÇíËß¶„Çã„Å´„ÅØË°åÂàó„ÅßÈ†ÜÁï™ÂæÖ„Å°„Çí„Åô„ÇãÂøÖË¶Å„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: The nice brick building and greenery were impressive. As an outsider, I was not allowed to enter the building, but I was able to fully appreciate the atmosphere. There were many visitors, and we had to wait in line to touch the feet of the statue of John Harvard.

title: vale una visita
text:

translated_text:
It is nice to walk around inside this great university that is perhaps the most famous in the U.S., Peculiar also to see the difference between this ancient university and the modern MIT university that is also located in Cambridge.
p.s. Harvard can be reached directly by subway while MIT does not have a subway stop nearby

title: Stupenda

title: Harvard
text:
Hermoso lugar, muy sobrio, muy cultural. Caro, pero es Harvard y se espera eso.
Buen medio de trasporte, accesible y c√≥modo para caminar y pasear en familia
translated_text:
Beautiful place, very sober, very cultural. Expensive, but it is Harvard and that is expected.
Good transportation, accessible and comfortable for walking and strolling with the family.

text: N√£o Utilizei o Guia fiz o passeio por conta e adorei passei pelas depend√™ncias, pelo lindo jardim e tomei um sorvete delicioso na Universidade.
translated_text: I didn't use the guide, I did the tour on my own and I loved it. I visited the premises, the beautiful garden and had a delicious ice cream at the University.

translated_text: It is the oldest and most difficult university in the United States. The buildings are majestic, and the campus is beautifully landscaped with lawns. I bought some souvenirs at COOP and was surprised at the wide variety. Unfortunately, there were many group tourists from China and Korea, and it was very noisy.

title: Mooie omgeving om rond te lopen
text: Je kan hier rondlopen en de universiteitsgebouwen bekijken. Mooie gebouwen en heel relaxed om hier te lopen. Leuk plein waar je met de lunch wat kan eten (foodtrucks) en (in juli/augustus) ook wat spelletjes voor kinderen staan. Met wat oudere kinderen of alleen volwassenen geeft een tour met toelichting een extra dimensie, dus zeker doen.
translated_text: You can walk around here and see the university buildings. Beautiful buildings and very relaxing to walk around here. Nice square where you can eat something at lunch (foodtrucks) and (in July/August) there are also some games for children. With some older kids or just adults a tour with explanations gives an extra dimension, so definitely do it.

title: Uma √≥tima experiencia de educa√ß√£o e hist√≥ria
text:
Fizemos o tour guiado pela Harvard University fornecido pelos pr√≥prios alunos da Universidade. O tour √© gratuito e deve-se agendar no pr√≥prio dia diretamente no information center da universidade.
Vale a pena o passeio, s√£o aprox. 1hr de aprendizado sobre a historia americana, da universidade e da regi√£o.
H√° outros tours guiados pagos mas acredito que ter um estudante contando a sua experi√™ncia em Harvard bem como a hist√≥ria √© muito mais legal al√©m de ser gratuito!!
Vale a pena!!
translated_text:
We took the guided tour of Harvard University provided by the university's own students. The tour is free and must be booked on the day directly at the university's information center.
It's worth the trip, it's about 1 hour of learning about American history, the university and the region.
There are other paid guided tours, but I think that having a student tell you about their experience at Harvard and the history is much cooler, as well as being free!!!
It's worth it!

title: Sehenswert
text: Die Universit√§t geh√∂rt zum Pflichtprogramm in Boston. Der ehrw√ºrdige Campus verbreitet Geschichte. Die zahlreichen Geb√§ude sind sehenswert. Studenten bieten entsprechend F√ºhrungen an.
translated_text: The university is a must-see in Boston. The venerable campus is steeped in history. The numerous buildings are worth seeing. Students offer guided tours.

title: Top of the top
text:
In piazza Harvard troverete un chiosco informazioni con indicazione degli uffici dell'universit√† da cui √® possibile per tre volte al giorno effettuare una visita per gruppi di non pi√π di 35 persone, visita effettuata da uno studente di Harvard. Per lo pi√π in lingua inglese se si ha la fortuna di trovare uno studente italiano la sia pu√≤ godere anche in tale lingua.
Il tour dura un'ora ed √® molto interessante. L'ambiente farebbe venire voglia di studiare anche a un somaro.
Bella la struttura bella l'atmosfera che si respira ottima l'intercultura che vi si vive.
Ha ampiamente mantenuto le aspettative. Raggiungibile facilmente con la linea rossa della metro.
translated_text:
In Harvard Square you will find an information kiosk indicating the offices of the university from which it is possible for three times a day to take a tour for groups of no more than 35 people, a tour conducted by a Harvard student. Mostly in English if you are lucky enough to find an Italian student you can enjoy it in that language as well.
The tour lasts one hour and is very interesting. The environment would make even a dunce want to study.
Beautiful structure beautiful atmosphere excellent intercultural experience there.
It has largely lived up to expectations. Easily accessible by the red line of the metro.

title: VISITA IRREPETIBLE
text: La visite en familia, con nuestros hijos en edad universitaria, y nos encant√≥. Volver√≠amos a visitarla sin dudas, es una ciudad dentro de otra ciudad. Estuvimos m√°s de 6 recorri√©ndola y no pudimos ni acercar a verla completa. Nos encant√≥ el ambiente, sus tiendas y restaurantes, pero sobre todo que est√° pensada para disfrutar de la vida universitaria, que maravilla de jardines y espacios para descansar y relajarse. Entramos en las instalaciones de alguna residencia, e incluso comimos en una de ellas y se nos ca√≠a la baba. Bibliotecas por todos sitios... y las instalaciones deportivas uffff. Creo que el precio merece la pena, un lujo.
translated_text: I visited it as a family, with our college-age children, and we loved it. We would definitely visit it again, it is a city within a city. We spent more than 6 hours touring it and we could not even come close to seeing it in its entirety. We loved the atmosphere, its stores and restaurants, but above all that it is designed to enjoy university life, what a wonderful gardens and spaces to rest and relax. We went into the facilities of some of the residence halls, and even ate in one of them and we were drooling. Libraries everywhere... and the sports facilities uffff. I think the price is worth it, a luxury.

text: „Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Åß‰ºöË≠∞„ÅÇ„Å£„Åü„ÅÆ„ÅßË°å„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ‰ºùÁµ±ÁöÑ„Å™Âª∫Áâ©„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇË¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÇÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÄÅÂ§è‰ºë„Åø„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶Â≠¶Áîü„ÅØÂ∞ë„Å™„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: I went there because I had a meeting at Harvard. There are many traditional buildings. There were many tourists and not many students because it was summer vacation.

title: Leuk om te zien
text: We gingen hierheen met free tours by foot. Zeer ervaren en enthousiaste gids die het echt heel boeiend kon brengen. We waren er precies op de dag dat alle nieuwe studenten met hun ouders aankwamen en dit zorgde voor mooie taferelen en een gezellige drukte. De universiteit ligt schitterend en dit kun je echt niet missen tijdens een bezoek aan Boston!
translated_text: We went here with free tours by foot. Very experienced and enthusiastic guide who could really bring it very fascinating. We were there exactly on the day all the new students arrived with their parents and this made for beautiful scenes and a nice crowd. The university is beautifully located and you really can't miss this while visiting Boston!

title: Il fascino dell'Eccellenza
text: Se si √® a Boston, immancabile √® la sua  visita nella vicinissima Cambridge. Tra gli altri hanno studiato JFK e Obama. √à una universit√† per ricchissimi ma soprattutto e PRIMA DI TUTTO per bravissimi(evviva la meritocrazia). Classica la foto toccando il piede(ormai)scolorito di J.Harvard.
translated_text: If one is in Boston, a visit to nearby Cambridge is not to be missed. Among others, JFK and Obama studied there. It is a university for the very rich but above all and FIRST of all for the very good(yay for meritocracy). Classic photo touching J.Harvard's(now)discolored foot.

title: Visite guid√©e gratuite
text: Nous nous sommes rendus au centre d'information touristique et ils proposaient des visites guid√©es gratuites. √Ä l'ext√©rieur, des √©tudiants proposent √©galement des tours mais pour 12$ par personne. Nous √©tions une trentaine de personnes, accompagn√© par une charmante guide, √©tudiante √† Harvard en th√©√¢tre et sociologie. La visite a √©t√© un peu √©court√©e car l'Universit√© recevait les nouveaux √©tudiants. Tr√®s int√©ressant.
translated_text: We went to the tourist information center and they offered free guided tours. Outside, students also offer tours, but for $12 per person. There were about thirty of us, accompanied by a charming guide, a Harvard student studying theater and sociology. The tour was cut a little short as the University was receiving new students. Very interesting.

title: Mehr zum Studieren als zum Besichtigen
text: Der Ruf der Universit√§t, was zumindest das Aussehen angeht, ist besser als es wirklich ist. Alles ist etwas weitl√§ufig, seltsam gemischte Baustile und alles irgendwie abgekapselt und eingeengt.
translated_text: The reputation of the university, at least in terms of appearance, is better than it really is. Everything is a bit sprawling, strangely mixed architectural styles and everything is somehow closed off and constricted.

title: Bisschen Gl√ºck muss man haben
text: Die gef√ºhrten Touren werden von Studenten der Universit√§t durchgef√ºhrt. Wie immer, muss man dann etwas Gl√ºck haben und an den richtigen geraten. Unser Student war etwas zu sehr durchgeknallt, aber es war sehr informativ und interessant. Keine Frage blieb unbeantwortet und wir erfuhren vieles Ungew√∂hnliche. Hat sich gelohnt!
translated_text: The guided tours are led by students from the university. As always, you have to be lucky and get the right person. Our student was a bit too crazy, but it was very informative and interesting. No question went unanswered and we learned a lot of unusual things. It was well worth it!

text: „Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„Åß„ÇÇÊúÄ„ÇÇÊúâÂêç„Å™Â§ßÂ≠¶„Åß„Åô„Åó„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÂ∫¶Ë¶ã„Å¶„Åø„Åü„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑË®™„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÂ§è‰ºë„Åø„Å™„ÅÆ„ÅßÈùô„Åã„Åã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂÜÖ„ÅÆ„ÉÑ„Ç¢„Éº„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅèÈñãÂÇ¨„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„ÄÅ„Åã„Å™„ÇäË≥ë„ÇÑ„Åã„Åß„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„ÅÜ„Å°ÂçäÊï∞‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅØ‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰∫∫„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„Å´‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰∫∫ÁïôÂ≠¶Áîü„ÅåÂ¢ó„Åà„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜË©±„ÅØËÅû„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÂ∞è„Åï„ÅÑÂ≠ê‰æõ„ÇÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÄÅ„Åì„ÅÜ„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶ÁïôÂ≠¶„Å∏„ÅÆÂãïÊ©ü„Å•„Åë„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÅÆ„Åã„Å®„ÄÅÊîπ„ÇÅ„Å¶‰∏≠ÂõΩ„ÅÆÊ¥ªÊ∞ó„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÇíÊÑü„Åò„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: It is one of the most famous universities in the U.S. and I wanted to visit it once. I thought it would be quiet since it was summer vacation, but it seemed that many tours of the university were being held, and it was quite lively, but more than half of them were Chinese. I had heard that the number of Chinese students at American universities was increasing, but there were many small children, and I wondered if this was how they were motivated to study abroad, and once again I felt the vitality of China.

title: Harvard er et must, n√•r i Boston.
text:
Historie og l√¶rdom emmer ud af de gamle bygninger. Mit andet bes√∏g, denne gang med guide. Absolut en fordel. 
Mange gode historier blev fortalt. 
Og s√• gjorde det jo ikke noget, at solen skinnende og at de nye studerende s√• sm√•t blev modtaget i festlig stemning.
translated_text:
History and learning emanate from the old buildings. My second visit, this time with a guide. Definitely an advantage.
Many good stories were told.
And it didn't matter that the sun was shining and the new students were welcomed in a festive atmosphere.

title: Vale a pena a visita!
text: Vale a pena fazer download do mapa, e tamb√©m do audio guia no pr√≥prio site da universidade! o √°udio te leva pelos principais pontos da universidade contando um pouco da hist√≥ria de cda pr√©dio.
translated_text: It's worth downloading the map, as well as the audio guide from the university's own website! The audio takes you around the main points of the university, telling you a little about the history of each building.

title: No os lo perd√°is
text:
La visita que hacen los propios estudiantes (en ingl√©s) ronda los 10 d√≥lares y dura aproximadamente 90 min. Adem√°s de repasar los lugares m√°s emblem√°ticos de la universidad, nos descubren algunos secretos decorados con chascarrillos.

Hay numerosas tiendas, incluida la oficial, donde se pueden comprar souvenirs de la universidad.

Adem√°s, hay una farmacia y varias tiendas de comida r√°pida, as√≠ como restaurantes. 

La parada de metro os deja enfrente de la puerta.

Visita indispensable sin duda.
translated_text:
The students' own tour (in English) costs about $10 and lasts about 90 minutes. In addition to reviewing the most emblematic places of the university, they reveal some secrets decorated with jokes.

There are numerous stores, including the official one, where you can buy souvenirs of the university.

In addition, there is a pharmacy and several fast food stores, as well as restaurants.

The subway stop is in front of the door.

A must-see without a doubt.

title: Fant√°stico lugar
text: Un lugar que te hace querer estudiar all√≠. Lleno de zonas verdes y edificios que impresionan. Un imprescindible de Cambridge.
translated_text: A place that makes you want to study there. Full of green areas and impressive buildings. A must in Cambridge.

translated_text: In the middle of summer, Harvard University probably attracts more tourists than students. The university grounds, known as Harvard Yard, have several gates, but are open to all. It is a beautiful area dotted with libraries, lecture halls, student dormitories, churches, and administrative buildings, surrounded by lush green trees and lawns. Harvard University is so large that it is hard to tell where the university ends and the town begins. It is so large that it is hard to tell where the university ends and the town begins.

title: Campus bel√≠ssimo
text: O campus de Harvard √© um dos mais belos. Para quem nunca esteve em uma universidade americana, vale muito a pena conhecer esse campus. A arquitetura do local √© de tirar o f√¥lego. Um passeio muito agrad√°vel por umas das univerdidades mais conhecidas do mundo.
translated_text: Harvard's campus is one of the most beautiful. If you've never been to an American university, it's well worth a visit. The architecture is breathtaking. A very pleasant tour of one of the world's best-known universities.

translated_text: To be done to appreciate this place where it is good to study. There are caf√©s and everything you need for that it would have been the place is very open very late I recommend you so

translated_text: A visit warmed by the beauty of the facilities and the history f3 one of the most celebrated universities in the world... the chapel is one of the highlights, almost obligatory a few minutes inside this place.

title: Un lugar muy interesante, se respira un aire especial
text: Hardvard es Hardvard. Un lugar muy interesante, su trayectoria, quienes han estudiado ah√≠, se respira un aire especia,  Hay que conocerlo.
translated_text: Hardvard is Hardvard. A very interesting place, its history, those who have studied there, you can breathe a special air, you have to know it.

title: Una meraviglia in una meravigliosa citt√†
text: Harvard non √® un'universit√† √® un posto magico in cui sembra che tutti i sogni possano realizzarsi. √à un lungo d'altri tempi, √® un viaggio nel tempo che fa cambiare la prospettiva di vita a chi le fa visita. Se andate a Boston, dovete andarci assolutamente.
translated_text: Harvard is not a university it is a magical place where it seems that all dreams can come true. It is a long time ago, it is a time travel that changes the perspective of life for those who visit it. If you go to Boston, you absolutely must go there.

title: Prachtige universiteit
text: Mooie universiteit. Mooie gebouwen. Heel veel mensen die rondgeleid werden. Alleen als je iets wilt drinken dan moet je goed zoeken!
translated_text: Beautiful university. Beautiful buildings. Lots of people being shown around. Only if you want something to drink you have to look carefully!

text: Si respira un'aria d'altri tempi, il campus √® molto carino con le aiuole curatissime e gli edifici a mattoni rossi. Una visita ne vale la pena
translated_text: There is an air of yesteryear, and the campus is very pretty with the manicured flower beds and red brick buildings. A visit is well worth it

title: Visita agrad√°vel
text:
Um passeio que vale a pena. 
Muito f√°cil de ir de metro.
A universidade √© linda, no jardim est√£o dispostas algumas cadeiras para sentar e contemplar.
A cidade em volta oferece muitos caf√©s e restaurantes.

Caminho agrad√°vel onde vc vai vendo as rep√∫blicas onde moram os alunos.
translated_text:
A worthwhile walk.
Very easy to get to by metro.
The university is beautiful and there are chairs in the garden where you can sit and contemplate.
The surrounding town offers many caf√©s and restaurants.
From there, you can walk for about 2 km in a straight line to MIT.
It's a pleasant walk where you'll see the dormitories where the students live.

title: Um cl√°ssico inspiracional
text: Nada como uma volta pelo campis de Harvard para se inspirar no local por onde circularam os fundadores da Microsoft, Facebook, 3G e dezenas de outros empreendedores e executivos que ajudaram a transformar nossa sociedade. Os edif√≠cios tradicionais e os jardins manicurados s√£o um descanso para nossos olhos e mentes, ao mesmo tempo que convidam para a medita√ß√£o e inspira√ß√£o.
translated_text: There's nothing like a stroll around the Harvard campus to be inspired by the place where the founders of Microsoft, Facebook, 3G and dozens of other entrepreneurs and executives who have helped transform our society have passed through. The traditional buildings and manicured gardens are a respite for our eyes and minds, while inviting meditation and inspiration.

title: Harvard merece una visita
text:
Estuvimos paseando por el campus de Harvard y pasamos unas buenas horas en el Museo de arte de la Universidad.
Recomendamos la visita porque nosotros la hemos disfrutado.
translated_text:
We were walking around the Harvard campus and spent a good few hours at the Harvard Art Museum.
We recommend the visit because we enjoyed it.

title: Historia med k√§nsla
text: Att vara i Boston utan att bes√∂ka Harvard √§r v√§l lite som att missa m√•let n√§r man f√•tt straff i fotboll. Ett m√•ste-bes√∂k.
translated_text: Being in Boston without visiting Harvard is a bit like missing the goal when you get a penalty in soccer. A must-visit.

title: Juste superbe!
text: Quel endroit absolument magistral. Campus gigantesque au coeur d'une ville tout √† fait charmante. On comprend imm√©diatement l'engouement pour cet √©tablissement mythique.

title: fabuloso
text: Recorrer esta universidad me encanto, me hubiera encantado conocer los salones de clase pero me tuve que conformar con recorrer los patios de la escuela

title: Campus enorme e lindo!!
text: Estudar num local como este deve ser um sonho!! Pr√©dios lindos, jardins, audit√≥rio, boblioteca, capela, tudo lembra um cen√°rio de filme. Vale a pena conhecer!

title: Apprendre un peu plus sur l'histoire de l'universit√© d'Havard.
text: Cette visite guid√©e par une guide francophone qui nous apprend plus de chose sur l'universit√© c'est tr√®s int√©ressant et mes enfants ont ador√©.√Ä part qu'il a donn√© 8 pr√©sident am√©ricain,on apprend aussi l'origine de cette fameuse biblioth√®que.Surtout combien de personnes qui ont commenc√© cet universit√© reconnu mondiale et leur origine.Un lieu formidable a visit√©.Et la disposition des b√¢timents sur le campus est √©tonnante.
translated_text: This guided tour by a French-speaking guide who teaches us more about the university is very interesting and my children loved it.apart from the fact that it gave 8 American presidents,we also learn about the origin of this famous library.especially how many people started this world-renowned university and where they came from.a great place to visit.and the layout of the buildings on campus is amazing.

title: Una joya
text: Recomiendo una visita a esta c√©lebre universidad de prestigio mundial. En lugares as√≠ uno comprende el por qu√© del progreso de este pa√≠s. Es sumamente interesante mezclarse entre turistas y estudiantes y caminar por el campus as√≠ como por el barrio que rodea la universidad, que est√° lleno de movida juvenil y de bares. Son muchas cuadras para caminar desde Boston, por lo que lo mejor es acercarse a trav√©s del subte o de colectivo.
translated_text: I recommend a visit to this world-renowned university. In places like this one understands why this country has progressed. It is extremely interesting to mingle among tourists and students and walk around the campus as well as the neighborhood surrounding the university, which is full of youth and bars. There are many blocks to walk from Boston, so the best way to get there is by subway or bus.

title: HBS curso
text: Incre√≠ble lugar, primero la ciudad es formidable, muchas cosas por hacer, este verano Clima incre√≠ble y luego las instalaciones y nivel de la universidad excelente

translated_text:
Of course there are students, but there are also many tourists. There is a line to touch the statue's feet, and the goods store (co-op) seems to be thriving.

Even in the campus, the area of the law school where "Cutie Blonde" was set was deserted, and there were only a few real students (or people who looked like students).

When I went to the Co-op, I bought a binder with the Harvard crest on it and a ring notebook to set it in. It is well made, and I have one that I bought many years ago with no wear on the corners. It's heavy, but that's just as cool.
I also bought a fancy pink tote bag. The stitching on this one is a little loose, but it works well.
It is different from common goods that break easily ^_^.

title: Eccellente e maestosa!
text:
Grazie alla grande opportunit√† di completare la tesi di laurea negli Usa, mi sono trovata dinanzi all'imponente ed enorme struttura dell'Universit√† di Harvard!
Un campus da sogno, parchi meravigliosi e ben tenuti, dipartimenti distribuiti in molteplici edifici! Per non parlare poi della biblioteca del Dipartimento di giurisprudenza, dove mi sono trovata a condurre le mie ricerche!! La maestosit√† delle forme architettoniche, i quadri, l'ambiente elegante lasciano senza fiato... e poi si gode del silenzio e della concentrazione necessari!
Il personale √® cordiale, disponibile, pronto ad aiutarti e guidarti in mezzo a labirinti di volumi!
√à stata un'esperienza oltremodo incantevole!!!!
translated_text:
Thanks to the great opportunity to complete my dissertation in the U.S., I found myself in front of the imposing and enormous structure of Harvard University!
A dream campus, wonderful and well-maintained parks, departments spread across multiple buildings! Not to mention the Law Department library, where I found myself conducting my research!!! The majesty of the architectural forms, the paintings, the elegant surroundings leave you breathless... and then you enjoy the necessary silence and concentration!
The staff is friendly, helpful, ready to help and guide you through the maze of volumes!
It was an exceedingly enchanting experience!!!!

title: Vivere in un film americano
text: Un universit√† che ti comunica la sua storia,il suo passato e presente,√® una fortissima emozione. Ci siamo seduti pure nel parco sotto un albero
translated_text: A university that communicates to you its history,its past and present,is a very strong emotion. We even sat in the park under a tree

title: Lugar lindo
text: Lugar  lindo, bem cuidado e muito grande. √â exatamente como vemos nos filmes. Imperd√≠vel para quem vai √† Boston.
translated_text: A beautiful, well-kept and very large place. It's exactly as we see it in the movies. A must-see for anyone going to Boston.

title: Magnifico
text: La sensazione che si prova quando si varcano i cancelli di questa prestigiosa universit√† √® quella di esser ritornati in un posto dopo molto tempo. Pare di esserci gi√† stati perch√© in effetti √® cos√¨, seppur attraverso libri, televisione e film. Tutto √® lindo e ordinato e fuori dai cancelli si trovano dei rivenditori ufficiali di merchandising.
translated_text: The feeling you get when you walk through the gates of this prestigious university is that of having returned to a place after a long time. It feels like you have been there before because indeed you have, albeit through books, television and movies. Everything is neat and tidy and outside the gates are official merchandise retailers.

title: Lindo
text: Lugar lindo e interesante para vistar. Algo diferente, esta abierto al publico. Es super grande para visitar.
translated_text: Nice and interesting place to visit. Something different, it is open to the public. It is great to visit.

title: Œ§Œø œåŒΩŒµŒπœÅŒø Œ∫Œ¨Œ∏Œµ ŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒÆŒºŒøŒΩŒ±.
text: ŒòŒµœâœÅŒµŒØœÑŒ±Œπ Œ±œÄœå œÑŒ± Œ∫Œ±ŒªœçœÑŒµœÅŒ± œÄŒ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒÆŒºŒπŒ± œÑŒøœÖ Œ∫œåœÉŒºŒøœÖ. ŒîŒµŒΩ ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ Œ¥œÖŒΩŒ±œÑœå ŒΩŒ± ŒµœÄŒπœÉŒ∫ŒµœÜŒ∏ŒµŒØ Œ∫Œ¨œÄŒøŒπŒøœÇ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ œåŒºŒøœÅœÜŒ∑ Œ±œÖœÑŒÆ œÄœåŒªŒ∑ œáœâœÅŒØœÇ ŒΩŒ± œÄŒ¨ŒµŒπ œÉœÑŒø Œ¥ŒπŒ¨œÉŒ∑ŒºŒø Œ±œÖœÑœå œÄŒ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒÆŒºŒπŒø.
translated_text: It is considered one of the best universities in the world. It is not possible to visit this beautiful city without going to this famous university.

title: Imperdible visita estando en Boston
text: Si est√°s en Boston, debes ir de visita al campus de la Universidad de Harvard. Se llega f√°cilmente con la l√≠nea roja del metro, descendiendo en la Harvard Square, justo enfrente de uno de los ingresos al campus, que es totalmente libre. Conviene hacer una visita guiada, previo paso por el centro de visitantes que se halla a 100 metros. Cuando estuvimos nosotros, estas visitas estaban algo restringidas, pero nos proveyeron de un folleto muy did√°ctico para autoguiarse. El campus principal es un lugar arbolado, tranquilo, de f√°cil caminata y que transmite un gran clima de estudio y conocimiento. Hay peque√±os rincones deliciosos con bancos, donde los alumnos leen o conversan. Algunos sitios s√≥lo est√°n reservados para estudiantes y personal, lo cual es l√≥gico para no entorpecer la vida cotidiana. Aconsejo salirse del campus antiguo y visitar la facultad de ciencias, al otro lado de la calle, un edificio moderno, en el que se pueden ver las aulas, de extra√±a simpleza, exenta de suntuosidad, que uno puede esperar encontrar en una de las universidades m√°s caras. En algunas es posible incluso ver la actividad de alumnos y docentes. Tambi√©n hay en el hall central una interesant√≠sima exhibici√≥n de la evoluci√≥n del ordenar, desde su origen hasta nuestros d√≠as. Por √∫ltimo, nos impresion√≥ la majestuosidad de la Memorial Church. Tambi√©n conviene recorrer algunas calles aleda√±as del barrio. Toda la actividad dura unas 3/4 horas.
translated_text: If you are in Boston, you must visit the Harvard University campus. It is easily reached on the red line of the subway, getting off at Harvard Square, right in front of one of the entrances to the campus, which is completely free. It is advisable to take a guided tour, after passing through the visitor center, which is 100 meters away. When we were there, these tours were somewhat restricted, but we were provided with a very didactic brochure for self-guiding. The main campus is wooded, quiet, easy to walk around, and conveys a great atmosphere of study and knowledge. There are delightful little nooks with benches, where students read or chat. Some places are reserved only for students and staff, which is logical so as not to hinder daily life. I recommend leaving the old campus and visiting the faculty of science, across the street, a modern building, where you can see the classrooms, of strange simplicity, devoid of sumptuousness, that one might expect to find in one of the most expensive universities. In some of them it is even possible to see the activity of students and teachers. In the central hall there is also a very interesting exhibition of the evolution of ordering, from its origin to the present day. Finally, we were impressed by the majesty of the Memorial Church. It is also a good idea to walk through some of the surrounding streets of the neighborhood. The whole activity lasts about 3/4 hours.

title: √Ä la bonne place... au bon moment!
text: Le meilleur moment pour vous y rendre... le samedi PM journ√©e de Graduation! L'endroit y est alors d√©cor√© de ses meilleurs atours! Les fanions des "Halls" y sont √† l'honneur. Un excellent samedi PM
translated_text: The best time to visit is Saturday PM, Graduation Day! The place is decked out in all its finery! Hall pennants take center stage. An excellent Saturday PM

title: Bello il campus
text: Il campus di Harvard molto bello. Si respira la sua storia, ti mette voglia di tornare a studiare. Bella

title: FABULOSA
text: Lugar imperdible de visitar si vas a Boston adem√°s de su prestigio y reconocimiento mundial su arquitectura es sin igual se respira un aire de tranquilidad y paz sin igual recorriendo sus instalaciones

title: SITIO MAGICO
text: Entrar a la Universidad es mucho m√°s que un Campus Universitario. Te llenas de energ√≠a con el ambiente estudiantil y edificios antiguos. Cuenta con jardines muy padres alrededor de sus escuelas. Una de las mejores universidades del mundo.

text: „Åç„Çå„ÅÑ„Å™Â∫≠„ÅåÂ∫É„Åå„Çä„ÄÅÂª∫Áâ©„ÅØ„Å©„Åì„Åã„É®„Éº„É≠„ÉÉ„Éë„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Èõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„ÇíÂá∫„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Éè„Éº„É¥„Ç°„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÇÊï∑Âú∞ÂÜÖ„Å´„ÅØËá™Áî±„Å´Âá∫ÂÖ•„Çä„Åå„Åß„Åç„ÄÅ„ÉÑ„Ç¢„ÉºÂÆ¢„ÇÇÂ§ö„ÅèË¶ã„Çâ„Çå„Åü„ÄÇ

The university is said to be the best in the world and has a lot of weight.

title: ciekawy obiekt

text: Mesmo numa visita r√°pida ficamos encantados com a estrutura da Universidade e dos espa√ßos de uso comum. Al√©m disso, a oferta de restaurantes e bares nos arredores √© muito boa.
translated_text: Even on a quick visit, we were delighted with the structure of the university and the common areas. In addition, the range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area is very good.

translated_text: A visit to a place that exudes excellence. Neat campus, full of boys/girls and represents the stereotype : classrooms, dorms and sports fields. Unmissable

translated_text: Harvard University, as it is known, is not only the highest university, but also a place to go as a spot to stimulate your meekness, since its fame is frequently seen in Hollywood movies and American dramas. The campus, where snow was still on the ground, was very atmospheric, with dead leaves and brick buildings matching each other.

title: Divertido
text: El tour realizado por alumnos de la universidad es muy divertido, la zona cercana ala universidad tiene mucho ambiente, tiendas y lugares para comer o tomar unos tragos.

text: Leuk om hier doorheen / overheen te lopen. Dit is toch de campus waar veel toonaangevende personen gestudeerd hebben. En dat voel je in de sfeer. Heel leuk. Ook aanbevelenswaardig de boekwinkel aan Harvardstreet.
translated_text: Nice to walk through/over this. After all, this is the campus where many leading figures have studied. And you can feel that in the atmosphere. Very nice. Also recommended the bookstore on Harvardstreet.

title: ‰∏ñÁïåÊúÄÈ´òÂ≥∞„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: ‰∏ñÁïåÊúÄÈ´ò„ÅÆÁü•ÁöÑÊ∞¥Ê∫ñ„ÇíË™á„Çã„Å†„Åë„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®„ÅåÂõΩÂÆ∂‰∫àÁÆó„É¨„Éô„É´„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜË™¨Êòé„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Å¶„ÄÅ„Åï„Åô„Åå„ÅØ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÊÑü„Åò„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË¶ã„ÅüÊÑü„Åò„ÅØÊôÆÈÄö„ÅÆ„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÅåËêΩ„Å°ÁùÄ„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅÊï£Ê≠©„Åô„Çã„ÅÆ„Å´ËâØ„ÅÑÊÑü„Åò„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÂõ≥Êõ∏È§®„ÇÇ„Éà„ÉÉ„Éó„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„ÅÆË¶èÊ®°„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Å†„Åë„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶Â§ß„Åç„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: The explanation that the cost of operation is at the level of the national budget, as it boasts of the world's highest intellectual standards, gives the impression that this is indeed Harvard. The campus looks like an ordinary campus, but it is calm and nice to stroll around. The library is also large, as it is said to be one of the largest in the world.

title: Sev√§rt
text: Det √§r ju onekligen n√•got speciellt med att  ta metron fr√•n downtown Boston ut till en av de mest beryktade utbildningsinstitutionerna i v√§rlden. √ñverhuvudtaget mysiga kvarter i Cambridge, men f√∂r att f√• n√•gon n√§rmare beh√•llning av sj√§lva campusomr√•det b√∂r man nog se till att komma med p√• en av de guidade, officiella (och gratis!) turerna som utg√•r varje timme fr√•n det officiella bes√∂kscenteret. Leds av studenter som sj√§lva pluggar d√§r, vilket ger en trevlig, personlig inramning.
translated_text: There's something special about taking the subway from downtown Boston to one of the most famous educational institutions in the world. Overall cozy neighborhoods in Cambridge, but to get any closer to the actual campus area, you should probably make sure to join one of the guided, official (and free!) tours that leave every hour from the official visitor center. They are led by students who study there themselves, which gives a nice, personal touch.

title: Donde la excelencia se hace presente
text: Solamente de pasear por sus jardines y parques se puede sentir la importancia de una educaci√≥n de excelencia
translated_text: Just by walking through its gardens and parks, one can feel the importance of an excellent education.

title: Maravilhoso passeio
text: Oque falar desta institui√ß√£o de ensino? Maravilhoso passeio conhecendo seus recintos por dentro do complexo todo. Gostamos muito dos arredores da faculdade com muitos restaurantes e lojas legais...recomendo o passeio num fim de semana
translated_text: What can I say about this educational institution? A wonderful tour of the whole complex. We really enjoyed the area around the college with lots of nice restaurants and stores... I recommend a weekend trip.

title: Interesante tour por una de las Universidades m√°s famosas del mundo
text:
HIcimos la visita guiada para los estudiantes, que es gratis. Empez√≥ en una de las salas m√°s impresionantes en las que he estado, (Rotunda). Los muebles, paredes y techo eran de madera tallada, todo antiguo. La ac√∫stica era p√©sima, por lo que casi no se entend√≠a lo que hablaban los presentadores.
El tour te lleva por los patios, pasillos y plazas. Los gu√≠as son estudiantes y lo hacen ameno. No est√° permitido ingresar a los edificios pero igual es interesante.
translated_text:
We took the guided tour for students, which is free. It started in one of the most impressive rooms I have ever been in, (Rotunda). The furniture, walls and ceiling were carved wood, all antique. The acoustics were terrible, so you could barely understand what the presenters were talking about.
The tour takes you through the courtyards, hallways and plazas. The guides are students and make it enjoyable. You are not allowed to enter the buildings but it is still interesting.

translated_text:
World-renowned Harvard University
If you're visiting Harvard University from Boston, you'll want to set aside a day in this direction, as it's quite a distance away.
In addition to the statues, natural history museums, and other attractions, there are real students studying inside Harvard University, so be careful not to disturb them.

title: L eccellenza, la storia, l'onore
text: Visitare L'eccellenza ed essere ospite dei suoi professori √® stata un'esperienza pazzesca ed incredibile. E pensare di tornare tra qualche mese a tenere delle lezioni mi riempie di orgoglio

We took a tour led by a Harvard University student.

Á©çÈõ™„ÅÆÊßãÂÜÖ„ÇíÈäÖÂÉèÊ®™ÁõÆ„Å´Ê≠©„ÅèÔΩ§ÔΩ§ÔΩ§‰Ωï„Å†„Åã„Åª„Çì„ÅÆÂ∞ë„Åó„Å†„ÅëË≥¢„Åè„Å™„Å£„ÅüÊ∞óÂàÜ„ÇíÂë≥„Çè„Åà„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔΩó
translated_text:
You know, one of the best universities in the world!„ÄÄI am a meek person who wants to visit Boston.
Unfortunately, the day I visited, it snowed (>œâ<)!„ÄÄIt was freezing, visibility was limited, and I couldn't walk around the campus as much as I would have liked. ...... It seemed that the place I went in for a break was a study room, and all the students were concentrating on their studies!
Walking through the snowy campus with the statue by my side, I felt a little bit smarter than before.

title: Mythique
text: Un lieu incontournable. Surpris pas l'√©tendu du campus qui se fonde dans la ville, avec des p√¥les distincts et √©loign√©s.
translated_text: A place not to be missed. Surprised by the sheer size of the campus, which blends into the city, with its distinct and distant poles.

title: Visita obligada
text: Es una de las universidades m√°s conocidas del mundo. El campus cinta de muchos edificios y sobresale la escalera en d√≥nde se hacen las graduaciones. Est√° la estatua de Harvard y la gente se fotograf√≠a tocando su pie.
translated_text: It is one of the best known universities in the world. The campus has many buildings and the staircase where graduations are held stands out. There is a statue of Harvard and people take pictures of themselves touching its foot.

title: Èõ™ÂêéÁæé‰∏ΩÁöÑÊ†°Âõ≠

title: Ok men inte mer
text: Tog tunnelbanan ut f√∂r titta p√• Harvard. det var v√§l ok men inte mer. En hel del byggnader men inte n√•gon som var det extra
translated_text: Took the subway out to look at Harvard. it was well ok but no more. A lot of buildings but not any that were that special

title: Interessante
text:
Conhecer est√° universidade , foi muito interessante . Existe um servi√ßo de guia feito pelos pr√≥prios estudantes. N√£o precisa agendar. Chegando  at√© as 16.00 h . A visita √© feita de hora em hora . Existe um ponto de
Informa√ß√£o , para o agendamento pr√≥ximo da universidade . Vale muito a pena .
translated_text:
Getting to know this university was very interesting. There is a guide service run by the students themselves. You don't need to book. Arrive by 4pm. The visit takes place every hour. There is an
information point near the university. It's very worthwhile.

title: Interesante y grandiosa
text: El Campus de la Universidad es asombroso, su extension semeja una ciudad, de hecho hay momentos en los que la ciudad se integra a los espacios de Harvard, es un recorrido de un d√≠a por la ma√±ana, se respira cultura, vale la pena adentrarse bien, te dan ganas de irse a estudiar ahi  o de pensar, como no estudie aqu√≠? Las diferentes Facultades, sus edificios hay que conocerlos, entrar en una aula, sentarse y dejar que tu imaginaci√≥n recorra. La biblioteca, todo vale la pena conocer.
translated_text: The University Campus is amazing, its extension resembles a city, in fact there are moments when the city is integrated into the spaces of Harvard, it is a day tour in the morning, you can breathe culture, it is worth going deep, it makes you want to go to study there or to think, how could I not study here? The different faculties, their buildings, you have to get to know them, enter a classroom, sit down and let your imagination run wild. The library, everything is worth seeing.

title: Lindo, cl√°ssico!
text: √â como entrar em algum filme que se passa em Harvard! Dei uma caminhada dentro da universidade para conhecer. Vi os pr√©dios todos por fora. A universidade fica linda com a neve ao redor! Vale a pena conhecer uma universidade t√£o antiga e famosa.
translated_text: It's like being in a movie set at Harvard! I took a walk inside the university to get to know it. I saw all the buildings from the outside. The university looks beautiful with the snow all around! It's worth seeing such an old and famous university.

title: Unique !
text:
Comment ne pas appr√©cier cette visite ? 
Le parc est tr√®s beau et les b√¢timents bien int√©gr√©s dans cette verdure o√π la connaissance croise le tourisme.
Laissez vous envahir par son histoire, par cette jeunesse allant et venant.
Un bel endroit sans aucun doute dans un quartier tr√®s agr√©able
translated_text:
What's not to like about this visit?
The park is beautiful and the buildings well integrated into the greenery, where knowledge meets tourism.
Let yourself be invaded by its history, by young people coming and going.
An undoubtedly beautiful place in a very pleasant neighborhood.

title: lindo
text: lindo, interessante e curioso, diferente do que eu imaginava. Destaque para o imponente pr√©dio da Biblioteca que tem o nome de um rapaz morto do naufragio Titanic. Sua m√£e construiu o enorme edificio e doou para a universidade com a condi√ßao de te levar o nome de seu filho.
translated_text: beautiful, interesting and curious, different from what I imagined. A highlight is the imposing library building named after a boy who died in the Titanic shipwreck. His mother built the huge building and donated it to the university on the condition that it would bear her son's name.

title: Un paseo recomendable
text:
Una ma√±ana decidimos ir a visitar Harvard University. Quer√≠amos conocer ese famoso campus universitario del que hab√≠amos o√≠do hablar desde siempre. As√≠ que luego de desayunar, una fr√≠a ma√±ana, salimos de nuestro hotel en cambridge y agarramos la calle. Preferimos ir caminando antes que hacerlo por otros medios y no nos arrepentimos. Tomamos la Cambridge St desde estaci√≥n Lechmere y (la verdad vali√≥ la pena) disfrutamos del paisaje urbano muy pintoresco.
El campus es un lugar muy bonito lleno de edificaciones de diverso dise√±o y tama√±o, en medio de grandes √°rboles y con muchos senderos por donde no dejan de pasar estudiantes y profesores. Se siente el ambiente estudiantil y, a la vez, se percibe un aire de tarde de domingo por lo silencioso del lugar. Adem√°s, tengo entendido, hay varios museos (historia natural, arte, etc.) que nosotros no visitamos.
Vale la pena visitar Harvard. Un paseo nada estruendoso, pero interesante por lo que representa, su historia y la belleza del lugar.
translated_text:
One morning we decided to visit Harvard University. We wanted to see this famous university campus that we had heard about forever. So after breakfast, one cold morning, we left our hotel in Cambridge and took the street. We preferred to walk rather than go by other means and we didn't regret it. We took Cambridge St from Lechmere station and (it was well worth it) enjoyed the very picturesque cityscape.
The campus is a very beautiful place full of buildings of different design and size, in the middle of big trees and with many paths where students and professors keep passing by. You can feel the student atmosphere and, at the same time, there is an air of a Sunday afternoon because of the quietness of the place. In addition, I understand there are several museums (natural history, art, etc.) that we did not visit.
Harvard is worth a visit. It is not a loud walk, but interesting for what it represents, its history and the beauty of the place.

title: Harvard Stupenda
text:
E' la prima visita che ho organizzato non appena arrivata a Boston che consiglio vivamente di visitare. Il campus √® bellissimo, pulito, ordinato, pieno di ragazzi e ragazze che corrono a destra e sinistra fra una lezione ed una conferenza. Per me √® stata una bella esperienza da ex universitaria questo √® un piccolo sogno che si avvera, almeno in parte, perch√© non √® possibile visitare l'interno delle aule o della famosissima biblioteca, peccato!
E' molto semplice raggiungere il campus basta prendere la linea rossa da Boston e scendere alla fermata omonima in circa 15 minuti di tragitto, la fermata √® proprio davanti all'entrata principale.
translated_text:
It is the first visit I arranged as soon as I arrived in Boston that I highly recommend visiting. The campus is beautiful, clean, orderly, full of boys and girls running around left and right between classes and lectures. For me it was a great experience as a former college student this is a little dream come true, at least partially, because you cannot visit the inside of the classrooms or the very famous library, too bad!
It is very easy to get to the campus just take the red line from Boston and get off at the stop of the same name in about a 15-minute ride, the stop is right in front of the main entrance.

translated_text:
Harvard and MIT are two universities worth visiting in Boston.
Both are conveniently located next to/in metered parking lots.
There are plenty of bookstores and souvenir shops on the main street, but prices vary slightly (smaller shops are slightly cheaper).
The campuses are gorgeous and the MIT campus makes for great photos with the river in the background.

title: super visite
text: par contre je voudrais vous pr√©venir que une de nos guide avait dis que les films harry potter avait etait tourn√© ici hors c'est faux. c'est √† londres mais n√©anmoins c'est une √©cole √† voir
translated_text: on the other hand, I'd like to warn you that one of our guides said that the harry potter films were shot here, but that's not true. it's in london, but nonetheless it's a school worth seeing.

title: Super visite !!
text:
Une visite incontournable dans la r√©gion de Boston, on ne se lasse pas de d√©ambuler sur ce campus de la taille d'un village. Nous en avons appr√©ci√© le charme et l'histoire qui s'en d√©gage. 
Quand vous arrivez rendez-vous au visitor center, vous pourrez vous inscrire pour suivre une visite guid√©e par un √©tudiant, √ßa doit √™tre tr√®s int√©ressant mais ce n'est qu'en anglais, donc nous avons choisi une autre option, on a achet√© une carte guide avec des explications en fran√ßais pour 2 dollars et avons fait la visite √† notre rythme ... comptez plus de 2h.
translated_text:
A must-see in the Boston area, we never tire of wandering around this village-sized campus. We loved its charm and history.
When you arrive at the visitor center, you can sign up for a guided tour by a student. It must be very interesting, but it's only in English, so we chose another option: we bought a guide card with explanations in French for 2 dollars and took the tour at our own pace... allow over 2 hours.

title: Me gustar√≠a estudiar all√≠...
text: En el 2016 tuve la oportunidad de visitar Boston, particularmente recorrer a pie el campus urbano de la Universidad de Harvard. Me impresion√≥ ver sus edificios hist√≥ricos, los parques interminables y sobre todo sus inmensas bibliotecas. ¬øC√≥mo me gustar√≠a estudiar all√≠? Como era la hora del almuerzo pudimos compartir ese tiempo en el comedor universitario junto a estudiantes de diferentes pa√≠ses. La pasamos muy bien y luego de caminar por los alrededores de Cambridge, seguimos viaje en metro al centro de Boston.
translated_text: In 2016 I had the opportunity to visit Boston, particularly to walk around the urban campus of Harvard University. I was impressed to see its historic buildings, the endless parks and especially its huge libraries. How would I like to study there? As it was lunch time we were able to share that time in the university dining hall with students from different countries. We had a great time and after walking around Cambridge, we took the subway to downtown Boston.

title: De pel√≠cula
text: La universidad de Harvard parece sacada de una pel√≠cula, con construcciones en ladrillo visto y un gran parque verde delantero que invitan a pasear y recorrerla completa
translated_text: Harvard University looks like something out of a movie, with exposed brick buildings and a large green park in front that invites you to walk around the entire campus.

title: Maravillosa experiencia
text: Visitar las distintas facultades, la escuela de gobierno John F Kennedy y sobre todo la Escuela de Negocios
translated_text: Visit the various faculties, the John F Kennedy School of Government and especially the School of Business.

title: Vontade de estudar l√°
text: Lugar maravilhoso, da muita vontade de estudar l√°. Nos arredores da universidade tem lanchonetes e lojinhas. Vale a pena conhecer e curtir a paz que o campus de Harvard oferece
translated_text: A wonderful place, it makes you want to study there. On the outskirts of the university there are snack bars and little shops. It's worth visiting and enjoying the peace that the Harvard campus offers

title: Una excelente universidad
text:
Una preciosa universidad, sus jardines y sus facultades, Harvard Square no te lo puedes perder jaja encontr√© unas buenas ofertas en GAP, hay diferentes tiendas. 
Llegar es muy f√°cil puedes tomar el metro l√≠nea roja y llegas a Harvard puedes entrar libremente y recorrerla una de las mejores universidades de EU
translated_text:
A beautiful university, its gardens and its faculties, Harvard Square you can not miss it haha I found some good deals at GAP, there are different stores.
Getting there is very easy, you can take the red line subway and get to Harvard, you can enter freely and tour one of the best universities in the US.

translated_text:
Boston has many famous landmarks, but Harvard University is probably the most well-known.
The campus is just an ordinary university, but there are many historic buildings made of brick and stone, so it is good to be intoxicated by the atmosphere of a world-class university. Squirrels are often seen here, so please take a photo.

Rushing in on the last day of the visit. The atmosphere. A sense of security. Big.
We gave up on trying to cover everything from the beginning and only went around the square. Still, it was enjoyable enough.
Red bricks or brick style. This suits me. Big scale buildings.
I don't feel Ivy League in particular. The atmosphere of the students who come and go. So-called students.
Well, I have to go there once.

title: tradizione
text: quando pensi a un'universit√† americana pensi a Yale, Stanford, o a Harvard. a pochi minuti da Boston, il campus universitario merita una visita soprattutto a livello emozionale. osservare gli edifici, con le aule, i dormitori, i playground ti riporta alla mente tanti film. la zona √® molto vivace, ricca di negozi, pube ristoranti. se siete a Boston merita una visita - anche veloce - sicuramente
translated_text: when you think of an american university you think of Yale, Stanford, or harvard. just a few minutes from Boston, the university campus is worth a visit especially on an emotional level. looking at the buildings, with the lecture halls, dorms, and playgrounds brings to mind so many movies. the area is very lively, full of stores, pubs, and restaurants. if you are in Boston it is worth a visit-even a quick one- definitely

title: T√£o Real Como Nos FIlmes!!!
text: Fui l√° com uma amiga americana que estudou l√°. Era um dia muito frio, com neve... E conhecemos todos os pr√©dios (exceto a biblioteca, pois a mesma n√£o √© aberta para turistas, e somente √† estudantes credenciados). O sal√£o principal tem a decora√ß√£o praticamente id√™ntica aos filmes de Harry Poter! Vale muito, muito apena andar por entre os pr√©dios!
translated_text: I went there with an American friend who studied there. It was a very cold, snowy day... We visited all the buildings (except the library, which is not open to tourists, but only to accredited students). The main hall is decorated almost identically to the Harry Potter films! It's really, really worth walking around the buildings!

title: Ha il suo fascino tutto americano. ..
text: Considerata la fama e l importanza forse vi arrivi con chiss√† quali aspettative... poi ci pensi e... realizzi essere soltanto un universit√†. .. na Americana... con docenti che insegnano nel parco esterno mentre tu fai il turista tra giovani americani con gli immancabili bicchieroni di cartone .... suggestiva... da senso di libert√†. ..
translated_text: Given the fame and importance perhaps you come to it with who knows what expectations... then you think about it and you realize it is just a university . .. na Americana... with faculty teaching in the park outside while you are sightseeing among young Americans with the inevitable cardboard cups .... suggestive... from a sense of freedom. ..

title: Exatamente como vimos nos filmes
text: Ir √† Harvard foi um dos passeios que nossos filhos mais gostaram de fazer durante nossa viagem. Adoraram ver os lugares que sempre veem nos filmes.
translated_text: Going to Harvard was one of the things our children most enjoyed during our trip. They loved seeing the places they always see in the movies.
