1ÂõûÂà∏„Åß„ÅØ2.75üí≤Ôºü„Å†„Åã„Å®Ââ≤È´ò„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ1Êó•Âà∏Âà∏„ÇíË≥ºÂÖ•„Åô„Çã„Å®20üí≤„Åè„Çâ„ÅÑ„Åß‰πó„ÇäÊîæÈ°å„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
„Éú„Çπ„Éà„É≥Âú∞‰∏ãÈâÑ„ÅÆÂáÑ„ÅÑ„Å®„Åì„Çç„ÅØÊó•Êú¨„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´1Êó•Âà∏ÔºàË≥ºÂÖ•„Åó„Åü„Åù„ÅÆÊó•„Å†„ÅëÔºâ„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„Åè„ÄÅË≥ºÂÖ•„Åó„ÅüÊôÇÈñì„Åã„Çâ24ÊôÇÈñìÊúâÂäπ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„ÄÅÊú¨ÂΩì„ÅÆ1Êó•Âà∏„Å™„Çì„Åß„ÅôÔºÅÁ¨ë
ÊòØÈùû„Éú„Çπ„Éà„É≥„Åß„ÅØ1Êó•Âà∏„ÅÆÂú∞‰∏ãÈâÑ„Ç≠„ÉÉ„Éó„ÅÆË≥ºÂÖ•„Çí„ÅäÂãß„ÇÅ„Åó„Åæ„ÅôÔºÅ
translated_text:
During a short overnight trip to Boston in May 2016, I went to the famous Harvard University on the word of a friend who recommended having lunch at a hamburger store in front of Harvard University and taking a walk around Harvard University.
Boston in May was warm and a little hot, so it was very comfortable and the scenery was so beautiful that I really hated to leave. LOL!
Harvard University was also very impressive with its lush greenery, blue sky, green, and beige school buildings.
The statue of Harvard University is open to the public, and there is a jinx that if you stroke the legs of the statue, you will be admitted to Harvard University. The statue is filled with young people who seem to be Harvard applicants.
However, there were also many Chinese and Korean people behaving in a vulgar and offensive manner.
However, Boston in May is still very beautiful, so why don't you go and touch the legs of the Harvard statue? (^ ^)
By the way, I recommend taking the subway because Boston's subway system is very accessible to major tourist attractions.
It is rather expensive (2.75üí≤ for a single ticket), but it is a good way to get to the main attractions. However, if you purchase a day pass, you can ride as much as you want for about 20üí≤.
The great thing about the Boston subway is that it is not a one-day pass like in Japan (only for the day you buy it), but a true one-day pass that is valid for 24 hours from the time you buy it! LOL!
I highly recommend purchasing a one-day subway ticket for Boston!

title: D√° muita vontade de estudar l√°
text:
Fiquei encantada com o lugar, de beleza arquitet√¥nica, belos pr√©dios de tijolinhos vermelhos em meio a pequenas pra√ßas e √°rvores . Fiquei imaginando o orgulho de se estudar l√°. √â uma pena n√£o poder visitar o interior destes edif√≠cios ( n√£o sei se √© sempre assim , mas no momento da nossa visita os alunos estavam em prova e n√£o nos permitiram o acesso ). Mesmo assim, valeu muito a pena , pois o lugar √© lindo, encantador, digno de belas fotos. Para aqueles que gostam de mais informa√ß√µes , h√° um tour guiado pelos pr√≥prios alunos que parte da Harvard Square. Ao redor do campus h√° muitas lojinhas com souvenirs da universidade.
N√£o  deixe de conhecer, de Boston o acesso √© f√°cil , linha vermelha do metr√¥ sentido Alewife, des√ßa na esta√ß√£o Harvard e voc√™ j√° sair√° na Harvard Square. Transporte curto e r√°pido. Na volta aproveite para conhecer o MIT, √© s√≥ descer na esta√ß√£o Kendall/MIT.
translated_text:
I was enchanted by the architectural beauty of the place, beautiful red brick buildings amidst small squares and trees. I could only imagine the pride of studying there. It's a shame we couldn't visit the inside of these buildings (I don't know if this is always the case, but at the time of our visit the students were taking exams and didn't allow us access). Even so, it was very worthwhile, as the place is beautiful, charming and worthy of beautiful photos. For those who want more information, there is a self-guided tour starting from Harvard Square. Around the campus there are many shops selling university souvenirs.
Don't miss it. It's easy to get to from Boston, the red subway line to Alewife, get off at Harvard station and you'll be in Harvard Square. Short and fast transportation. On your way back, take the opportunity to visit MIT, just get off at Kendall/MIT station.

title: Lindos parques, Lugar con una energ√≠a especial...
text: Conocer la universidad mas famosa del mundo no es poca cosa. Es lindo pasearse e imaginar todas las mentes Brillantes que por ah√≠ pasaron.
translated_text: Visiting the most famous university in the world is no small thing. It's nice to walk around and imagine all the brilliant minds that passed through there.

title: Um sonho de Universidade
text: Uma das mais famosas universidades do mundo, passeio imperd√≠vel. Sonhar n√£o custa nada! Bibliotecas lindas e lojinhas de souvenirs na rua da frente.
translated_text: One of the most famous universities in the world, a must-see. Dreaming costs nothing! Beautiful libraries and souvenir shops in the front street.

title: HARVARD √© HARVARD
text:
Representa a universidade mais antiga americana; campus lindo e limp√≠ssimo.
Vale a pena logo cedo pegar o metr√¥ at√© Harvard Square, sentar em uma das v√°rias cafeterias do local e ficar admirando a vista e o fluxo de estudantes
translated_text:
It is the oldest university in the United States, and the campus is beautiful and clean.
It's worth taking the subway to Harvard Square early in the morning, sitting in one of the many caf√©s there and admiring the view and the flow of students

title: Majestueux
text:
J'aurai aimer √™tre l'une de ces √©tudiantes o√π encore mieux avoir un enfant qui sera admis dans une universit√© pareille 
C'est vraiment √† voir

I would have loved to be one of those students, or even better, to have had a child admitted to a university like that.
It's really something to see

title: Harvard la mejor universidad de EEUU y del mundo
text: Visitamos el campus de la m√°s prestigiosa y antigua universidad de EEUU. Harvard se encuentran en Cambridge y debe su nombre al Presvitero John Harvard, cuya estatua se encuentra en medio del campus universitario. Visitamos espec√≠ficamente la escuela de derecho "school of Law", donde compartimos el almuerzo con los alumnos en el comedor universitario. Observamos  el nivel y prestigio de sus estudiantes. Con certeza  espero que de aqu√≠ a un tiempo poder enviar a mi hija Camila a estudiar en esta m√°s que tricentenaria universidad
translated_text: We visited the campus of the most prestigious and oldest university in the USA. Harvard is located in Cambridge and owes its name to the Presviter John Harvard, whose statue is in the middle of the university campus. We specifically visited the "school of Law", where we shared lunch with the students in the university dining room. We observed the level and prestige of its students. I certainly hope that in the near future I will be able to send my daughter Camila to study at this more than three-hundred year old university.

title: Surfait
text: Effectivement, le campus d'Harvard est une l√©gende et m√©rite tout de m√™me un arr√™t. Cependant, je trouve sa r√©putation surfaite, dans la mesure o√π mis √† part les quelques b√¢timents historiques qui sont effectivement magnifiques, il n'y a rien d'extraordinaire !
translated_text: Indeed, the Harvard campus is a legend and well worth a stop. However, I think its reputation is overrated, insofar as apart from the few historic buildings, which are indeed magnificent, there's nothing extraordinary about it!

title: Une Universit√© mythique
text: Avec une amie, nous avons fait le tour guid√© des √©tudiants, pas cher et qui vaut vraiment le coup ! Notre guide √©tait top et on a fait le tour du campus avec lui en √©coutant d'une oreille attentive toutes les anecdotes de l'universit√©. C'est un lieu vraiment magique et magnifique, on a la sensation d'avoir loup√© ses ann√©es universitaires en voyant tout √ßa (m√™me si $60 0000 l'ann√©e, √ßa fait mal !). Attention, il faut bien comprendre l'Anglais car la visite ne se fait que dans cette langue. Mais √ßa vaut vraiment le coup, alors n'h√©sitez pas !
translated_text: With a friend, we took the guided student tour, which is cheap and well worth it! Our guide was top-notch, and we toured the campus with him, listening attentively to all the anecdotes about the university. It's a truly magical and magnificent place, and you feel like you've missed your university years when you see all this (even if $60,0000 a year does hurt!). Mind you, you'll need to have a good grasp of English, as the tour is only available in that language. But it's really worth it, so don't hesitate!

title: passeio intelectual
text: Quem vai a Boston n√£o deve deixar de passar nesta universidade para conhecer as instala√ß√µes. Os pr√©dios s√£o bem conservados, al√©m de monumentos que valem algumas fotografias e selfies.
translated_text: If you're going to Boston, you shouldn't miss this university. The buildings are well-preserved, as well as monuments that are worth a few photographs and selfies.

title: Havard
text: A universidade √© tudo aquilo que imagin√°vamos: enorme, linda e organizada. √â um sonho! Vale a pena caminhar por l√°, tirar lindas fotos, sentir o clima universit√°rio pairando pelo ar e depois ir a harvard square
translated_text: The university is everything we imagined: huge, beautiful and organized. It's a dream! It's worth walking around, taking beautiful photos, feeling the university atmosphere hanging in the air and then going to harvard square

title: Man m√∂chte am liebsten nochmal studieren
text: Die Atmosph√§re ist toll. K√∂nnte man nochmal als Freshman einsteigen. Wir hatten einen Studenten, der uns kostenlos √ºber den Campus gef√ºhrt hat. Kann ich nur empfehlen.
translated_text: The atmosphere is great. You could come back as a freshman. We had a student who gave us a free tour of the campus. I can only recommend it.

title: Local para se conhecer...
text: Passamos muito rapidamente, mas deu para sentir o clima da universidade. Desmistifica o peso do nome, o local √© agrad√°vel, clima de universidade mesmo, cheio de estudantes de todos os tipos pela rua, √© um bairro enorme. Muito tr√¢nsito quando fomos. Gostamos do passeio.
translated_text: We passed through very quickly, but you could feel the university atmosphere. It demystifies the weight of the name, the place is pleasant, a real university atmosphere, full of students of all kinds on the streets, it's a huge neighborhood. There was a lot of traffic when we went. We enjoyed the walk.

title: Aunque no pertenezca a la academia pas√©ese por aqu√≠
text: Un lugar excelente para entender la historia del pa√≠s y su cultura. Edificios victorianos, peque√±os jardines, un mont√≥n de bibliotecas, aunque no todas de entrada libre, y sobretodo dos magn√≠ficos museos.
translated_text: An excellent place to understand the history of the country and its culture. Victorian buildings, small gardens, lots of libraries, although not all of them with free entrance, and above all two magnificent museums.

title: U Harvard
text:
Un campus universitario tranquilo, mucha movilidad de estudiantes

translated_text:
A quiet college campus, lots of student mobility
Harvard Square has restaurants and full bookstores.  There is a subway station

title: Preciosa universidad
text: es enorme , con unos jardines preciosos muy bien cuidados, est√° abierta para turistas todo el d√≠a, las construcciones de varios estilos pero todas muy imponentes, para llegar hay muy buena locomoci√≥n
translated_text: is huge, with beautiful gardens very well maintained, is open for tourists all day, the buildings of various styles but all very impressive, to get there is very good locomotion.

title: Esplendor y admiracion
text: Solo vi los paeques y alrededores con un guia quye generalmente son los mismos estudiantes que muestran los alrededores, el parque que circinda los edificios y la historia de esta universidad.

title: Curiosidade
text:
fomos visitar √† titulo de curiosidade por se tratar da melhor universidade do pa√≠s, e para que nossa filha conhecesse.
√© um lugar lindo, com jardins lindo, a biblioteca √© uma atra√ß√£o √† parte, e a cidadezinha tb, vale √† pena
translated_text:
we went there out of curiosity because it's the best university in the country, and so that our daughter could get to know it.
it's a beautiful place, with beautiful gardens, the library is an attraction in its own right, and the little town is well worth a visit.

title: Recomendable!
text: Un lugar inmenso, para recorrerlo y poder ver todos los edificios y parques. Adem√°s de la estatua en la que todo el mundo se saca la foto aunque no sea Jhon Harvard
translated_text: A huge place to walk around and see all the buildings and parks. In addition to the statue where everyone takes a picture even if it is not John Harvard.

title: Da non perdere se si √® a Boston
text: Bellissima mattinata passata all'interno di questa universit√†. Proprio come me la aspettavo. Tutto curatissimo con prati perfettamente tagliati passeggiando tra le stradine in mezzo alle strutture costruite in mattoncini rossi. Immancabile la foto toccando il piede (scolorito) di J. Harvard. Da non perdere se si √® a Boston

Everything manicured with perfectly trimmed lawns walking through the narrow streets amidst the structures built of red bricks. Unmissable photo touching the (discolored) foot of J. Harvard. Not to be missed if you are in Boston

title: ÊßãÂÜÖ„ÅØ„Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„ÅÆÂÖ∏ÂûãÁöÑ„Å™Â§ßÂ≠¶„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
text: „Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„Åß„ÅØÂ§ßÂ≠¶„Åå„ÄÅÂª∫Áâ©„ÇÇÂê´„ÇÅ„Å¶Ê≠¥Âè≤„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅË¶≥ÂÖâ„Ç≥„Éº„Çπ„Å®„Åó„Å¶‰∫∫Ê∞ó„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„ÇÇ„Åù„ÅÆ‰∏Ä„Å§„Åß„ÄÅËµ§„É¨„É≥„Ç¨„ÅÆÂª∫Áâ©„Å™„Å©Ë¶ã„Åî„Åü„Åà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊßãÂÜÖ„ÅÆÂ∫É„Åï„ÇÇÈÅ©Â∫¶„Åß„Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„ÇíÊÑü„Åò„ÇãÊï£Á≠ñ„Å´„ÅØ„Å¥„Å£„Åü„Çä„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÁßÅ„ÅåË°å„Å£„ÅüÂΩìÊó•„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ≠¶Áîü„ÅÆÂÆ∂Êóè„ÅÆÂèÇË¶≥Êó•„Åø„Åü„ÅÑ„Å™Êó•„Å†„Å£„Åü„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çπ„ÇØ„Éº„É´„Ç´„É©„Éº„Å´P20„Å®„Éû„Éº„ÇØ„ÅåÂÖ•„Å£„Åü„Ç≠„É£„ÉÉ„Éó„ÇíË¢´„Å£„Åü„Åî‰∏°Ë¶™„Åå„Åü„Åå„Åü„Åè„Åï„Çì„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Åª„Çì„Å®„Å´„ÅÜ„Çâ„ÇÑ„Åæ„Åó„ÅÑÈôê„Çä„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ
translated_text: In the U.S., universities are popular as sightseeing courses because of their history, including their buildings. Harvard is one of them, and its red brick buildings are a sight to behold. The campus is a reasonable size and perfect for a stroll to feel America. On the day I visited Harvard, it seemed to be a family visit day for students, and there were many parents wearing caps with the P20 logo in the school colors. I was really envious.

title: √Ä d√©couvrir
text:
Endroit mythique, souvent repr√©sent√© dans des films, pensons √† Will Hunting, Patch Adam...
Bien que la balade sur les lieux ext√©rieurs fut hautement agr√©able, y retourner je tenterais de trouver un moyen d'avoir acc√®s √† l'int√©rieur, il doit y avoir des tours guid√©s accessibles au public?
translated_text:
Mythical place, often portrayed in films, think Will Hunting, Patch Adam...
Although the walk around the exterior was highly enjoyable, going back I'd try to find a way to access the interior, there must be guided tours available to the public?

title: De uma forma ou de outra... cheguei a Harvard!
text:
Como a Universidade de Harvard possui um dos mais criteriosos processos seletivos do mundo, √© imposs√≠vel voc√™ circular pelo campus sem se dar conta de que voc√™ est√° rodeado de pessoas brilhantes, extremamente inteligentes, talentosas e por que n√£o dizer, poss√≠veis futuros l√≠deres mundiais (afinal de contas, a universidade j√° formou 25 chefes de Estado, 8 presidentes americanos e cerca de 40 vencedores de pr√™mio Nobel!).

Logo de cara, al√©m de todo seu prest√≠gio, a universidade se destaca pelas grandiosas estruturas em tijolinhos vermelhos (que ali√°s, √© bem t√≠pico de toda a regi√£o de Massachusetts), e que tem grandes chances de lhe parecer bem familiar por j√° ter sido cen√°rio de diversos filmes como Garoto Indom√°vel, O Amor de um Pai e o √≥bvio A Rede Social, que conta a hist√≥ria de Mark Zuckerberg e a cria√ß√£o do Facebook ali mesmo, dentro daquelas paredes de tijolinhos!

Al√©m de Zuckerberg e grandes figuras hist√≥rias, outras personalidades ainda atuantes nos dias de hoje tamb√©m estudaram por ali: Barack Obama, George W. Bush, Bill Gates, os atores Tommy Lee Jones e Matt Damon e a atriz Natalie Portman. (Curiosamente nem Hillary Clinton nem Donald Trump est√£o nessa prestigiada lista!) #abafa :-)
translated_text:
As Harvard University has one of the most rigorous selection processes in the world, it's impossible to walk around the campus without realizing that you're surrounded by brilliant, extremely intelligent, talented people and, why not say it, possible future world leaders (after all, the university has graduated 25 heads of state, 8 American presidents and around 40 Nobel Prize winners!)

From the outset, in addition to all its prestige, the university stands out for its grandiose red brick structures (which, by the way, are very typical of the entire Massachusetts region), and which are likely to look very familiar to you because they have been the setting for several films such as Indomitable Boy, A Father's Love and the obvious The Social Network, which tells the story of Mark Zuckerberg and the creation of Facebook right there, inside those brick walls!

In addition to Zuckerberg and other great figures from history, other personalities still active today also studied there: Barack Obama, George W. Bush, Bill Gates, actors Tommy Lee Jones and Matt Damon and actress Natalie Portman. (Curiously, neither Hillary Clinton nor Donald Trump are on this prestigious list!) #abafa :-)

title: Emblem√°tica e impresionante
text: M√°s all√° de los edificios que componen el gran conjunto de la universidad de Harvard, el ambiente estudiantil y la gran actividad de cada uno de las escuelas y centros de investigaci√≥n, hacen que este sea un lugar de visita obligatoria. Muy recomendable pasar por la tienda de la cooperativa de Harvard a ver los souvenirs de todos tipos.
translated_text: Beyond the buildings that make up the great set of Harvard University, the student atmosphere and the great activity of each of the schools and research centers, make this a must-see place. It is highly recommended to stop by the Harvard Co-op store to see the souvenirs of all kinds.

title: Super Tour, f√ºr meinen Geschmack etwas kurz
text: Die Tour ist sehr interessant und unser Guide (Harvard Studentin) war sehr nett und lustig. Man erf√§hrt einiges neues, was noch nicht so bekannt ist neben den √ºblichen Informationen. Leider kommt auch mit dem Guide nicht in den gro√üen Speisesaal der Uni. Der gro√üe Vorteil ist das man nicht alleine auf dem Campus rumirrt und unsere Tour war richtig sch√∂n und lustig.
translated_text: The tour is very interesting and our guide (Harvard student) was very nice and funny. You learn a lot of new things that are not so well known apart from the usual information. Unfortunately, the guide doesn't take you into the university's large dining hall. The big advantage is that you don't wander around the campus on your own and our tour was really nice and fun.

title: Visita Obligada en Boston
text: Ir a conocer la Universidad de Harvard si vas a Boston es algo que no te puedes perder, es hermosa y llena de historia, la recomiendo ampliamente!üòéüëåüëåüëåüëåüëå

title: Bella esperienza
text: Se ne sente parlare molto spesso e a sproposito, in particolar modo in radio quando i deejay di turno raccontano storie assurde su ricerche scentifiche di varia e bizzarra natura... immergetevi nel campus e lasciatevi stupire da ogni cosa ma mi raccomando NON TOCCATE il piede della statua di John Harvard...diciamo che gli studenti si divertono a scapito dei turisti!
translated_text: You hear about it very often and out of turn, especially on the radio when the deejays on duty tell absurd stories about scholarly research of various and bizarre natures...immerse yourself in the campus and be amazed by everything but be sure NOT to touch the foot of John Harvard's statue...let's just say the students have fun at the expense of the tourists!

title: merece tu atencion
text: Boston es muy lindo y en particular el barrio de Harvard es muy lindo de conocer, y no te olvides de tocarle el pie izquierdo al monumento de J. Harvard que trae suerte, eso dicen :)
translated_text: Boston is very nice and in particular the Harvard neighborhood is very nice to know, and don't forget to touch your left foot to the monument of J. Harvard that brings luck, so they say :)

title: Muy lindo !
text: Viaje con mi familia en marzo y es un lugar muy lindo. Las instalaciones los museos, la historia, etc

title: So Harvard
text: A voir pour l ambiance, les collections. Un plus pour la collection consacr√©e aux plantes avec des reproductions en verre!!
translated_text: A must-see for the atmosphere and the collections. A plus for the plant collection with glass reproductions!

title: Harvard of Hahvahd: leuk om te doen
text: Nadat er een rondje over Harvard Yard hadden gelopen, besloten we toch om de tour te doen. Volgens Lonely Planet & internet is de tour gratis, maar dat klopt niet. Het kost $12 p.p. Gewoon doen, het is leuk. Je hoort allerlei weetjes, grapjes en de tour gaat ook een stukje buiten Harvard Yard. Wij vonden het de moeite waard.
translated_text: After walking around Harvard Yard, we decided to do the tour after all. According to Lonely Planet & the Internet, the tour is free, but that's not true. It costs $12 p.p. Just do it, it's fun. You'll hear all kinds of facts, jokes and the tour also goes a bit outside Harvard Yard. We thought it was worth it.

title: ÁßÄÊâç„ÅåÈõÜ„ÅÜ„Éú„Çπ„Éà„É≥„ÅÆÊúÄÈ´òÂ≠¶Â∫ú

translated_text: Located in Cambridge across the Charles River, it is a magnificent building arranged in a spacious setting. I visited there after the graduation ceremony, so it was quiet, but I was impressed by the scenery that I had longed to see during the heyday of Ivy fashion (old fashioned?). I was impressed by the scenery that I had longed to see in the heyday of Ivy fashion (old fashioned?). Visitors are free to tour the campus, but are not allowed to enter the school buildings. The Harvard Square, where the subway station is located, is lined with restaurants, stores, the university's tourist information center, and COOP, where you can buy goods with the HARVARD logo as souvenirs of Boston.

title: HARVARD ES MUYYYYYY INTERESANTE
text: Todo es lindo para caminar y recorrer. Muy limpio, ordenado y para y por los estudiantes. Comodidad, tecnolog√≠a, estudiar alli resular√≠a un placer.
translated_text: Everything is nice to walk around. Very clean, tidy and for and by the students. Comfort, technology, studying there would be a pleasure.

title: Genial
text: Es un t√≠pico lugar para visitar entre los turistas que van a Boston. Esta muy buena la arquitectura y la historia del lugar
translated_text: It is a typical place to visit among tourists who go to Boston. The architecture and the history of the place is very good.

title: Quasi come uno studente
text: Non vicina al centro in quanto raggiungibile con un buon tragitto in metro, Harvard merita sicuramente una visita se si √® a Boston. E' davvero una sorta di quartiere a s√® stante incastonato nella citt√†, intriso di cultura e di una magica atmosfera. Camminare tra gli edifici in mattoni rossi ed i verdi prati in perfetto stile inglese ti fa sentire quasi uno studente universitario.
translated_text: Not close to downtown as it can be reached by a good subway ride, Harvard is definitely worth a visit if you are in Boston. It really is a kind of neighborhood unto itself embedded in the city, steeped in culture and a magical atmosphere. Walking among the red brick buildings and green lawns in perfect English style makes you feel almost like a college student.

title: A voir
text:
Comme pour le MIT il faut se promener absolument sur le campus d Harvard pour admirer les b√¢timents des diff√©rentes √©poques mais aussi les parcs et jardins et se rendre ainsi compte de l √©tendue du domaine 
Tout cela a quelques kilom√®tres du centre!
translated_text:
As with MIT, a walk around the Harvard campus is a must, not only to admire the buildings from different eras, but also the parks and gardens, so you can appreciate the sheer size of the estate.
All this just a few kilometers from the center of town!

title: Imperdible
text:
El campus es gigante pero hermoso para caminar. Se puede respirar el aire a universidad entre los edificios. Todos los edificios parecen de la pelicula de Harry Potter. Algunos solo son para ingreso permitido para alumnos.
En el campus hay sillas repartidas en las cuales te puedes sentar y descansar mientras observas pasar a los estudiantes.
Hay tours que realizan los mismos alumnos por el campus, debes averiguar antes ya que hay horarios determinados.
Puedes llegar en el metro tranquilamente, hay una parada en el medio de Harvard.
Alrededor del campus encuentras locales para comprar recuerdos, y tambi√©n para almorzar o cenar
translated_text:
The campus is gigantic but beautiful to walk around. You can breathe the air of a university among the buildings. All the buildings look like from the Harry Potter movie. Some of the buildings are only for students to enter.
There are chairs scattered around the campus where you can sit and rest while you watch the students walk by.
There are tours of the campus by the students themselves, you should find out beforehand as there are specific schedules.
You can take the subway, there is a stop in the middle of Harvard.
Around the campus you can find places to buy souvenirs, and also to have lunch or dinner.

title: Un cl√°sico
text: No puedes ir a Massachussets sin visitar una de las universidades mas famosas del mundo. Los edificios son de arquitectura cl√°sica inglesa, muy grande. ideal para una tarde de oto√±o

title: Bom passeio
text: Bom passeio, a universidade √© realmente muito linda, mas fui em um dia com chuva entao tudo ficou feio pois nao h√° espa√ßos cobertos. Uma pena a universidade nao deixar turistas entrar apenas para dar o gostinho de estudar la, nao podemos entrar nos predios, apenas olhar da parte de fora do campos.
translated_text: Nice tour, the university is really very beautiful, but I went on a rainy day so everything was ugly because there are no covered spaces. It's a shame the university doesn't let tourists in just to get a taste of what it's like to study there, you can't enter the buildings, you can only look at them from the outside.

title: Maravilhosa!!
text: Harvard √© maravilhosa. Fiquei emocionada quando cheguei l√°. Al√©m de ser considerada uma das melhores faculdades do mundo, os maiores g√™nios estudaram l√° e o campus √© lindo, muito bem cuidado. Me encantei com o lugar. Vale muito √† pena a visita.

title: Á∂∫È∫ó„Å™ÊôØË¶≥„Å®„Å®„ÇÇ„Å´Âõ≥Êõ∏È§®ÔºÅ

translated_text: It was only one train ride from downtown between business trips. As you can see from the picture, it was a beautiful day and there were only a few students there during the summer vacation. There are many things to see in addition to Harvard University, such as a nearby COOP, Starbucks, and a deep bar that only locals go to, so I think it would be a good idea to spend half a day there. I bought a stuffed bear wearing Harvard uniform as a souvenir for my niece.

title: Um local inesquecivel
text: Como j√° disse anteriormente eu j√° fui para os USA diversas vezes para estudar. Em todas as vezes eu fico em Cambridge, Massachusetts. Porque √© um local encantador. Hoje falo da visita √† Universidade de Harvard. pra mim foi como ir pro mundo de Harry Porter. Que local charmoso, cheio de vida, que pessoas educadas. Tem visitas guiadas e s√£o √≥timas (se voc√™ falar ingl√™s). Recomendo visitar a biblioteca e entrar em todos os pr√©dios onde for poss√≠vel. N√£o deixe ce ir.
translated_text: As I've said before, I've been to the USA several times to study. Each time I stay in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Because it's a lovely place. Today I'm talking about visiting Harvard University. For me it was like going to Harry Porter's world. What a charming place, full of life, what polite people. There are guided tours and they're great (if you speak English). I recommend visiting the library and going into every building you can. Don't miss it.

title: Top - unbedingt mit Studentenf√ºhrung!
text: Sehr interessant und unbedingt mit der kostenlosen einst√ºndigen Studentenf√ºhrung verbinden. Hierzu einfach ins Harvard Information Center in 30 Dunster Street gehen und zur Tour anmelden (findet st√ºndlich ab 10Uhr statt). Gutes Wetter w√§r von Vorteil, weil 90% der Tour drau√üen statt findet. Bei Unikosten von ca. 65.000 $ !!! ist das Studieren sicherlich f√ºr jeden erschwinglich ...
translated_text: Very interesting and must be combined with the free one-hour student tour. Simply go to the Harvard Information Center at 30 Dunster Street and register for the tour (takes place every hour from 10am). Good weather would be an advantage because 90% of the tour takes place outside. With university costs of approx. 65,000 $ !!! studying is certainly affordable for everyone ...

title: Une legende
text: Une des meilleures universit√© du monde,  on ne la pr√©sente plus. Cadre majestueux et campus "ambiance british".

It's a school vacation and I visited on a Sunday.
It was largely deserted, and maps are available around the subway stations.

title: Von aussen nicht das, was wir erwartet haben
text: Ich bin als Tourist nicht interessiert daran, wie effektiv eine Uni ist. Von einer der √§ltesten und vielleicht der elit√§rsten Universit√§ten der USA erwarte ich aber eine gute Au√üendarstellung. Hier lag √ºberall M√ºll herum, die Geb√§ude wirken eher wie Kasernen. translated_text: As a tourist, I am not interested in how effective a university is. But I expect one of the oldest and perhaps most elite universities in the USA to have a good external image. There was garbage everywhere and the buildings looked more like barracks. Yale was much more impressive.

title: Incontournable
text:

Harvard is a must when visiting Boston

text: D√° pra fazer um bate-e-volta de Boston. Fui pro almo√ßo e em 1 hora conheci a parte mais famosa do Campus de uma das universidades mais famosas. N√£o peguei o tour guiado, mas acho que vale mais a pena, j√° que passa a ter mais informa√ß√µes do locais.

title: Lindo!
text: Chega at√© a ser emocionante visitar um lugar que simboliza a excel√™ncia do conhecimento. Al√©m de ser um local muito bonito, agrad√°vel, com jardins muito bem cuidados... Vale muito a pena visitar
translated_text: It's even exciting to visit a place that symbolizes the excellence of knowledge. In addition to being a very beautiful, pleasant place with well-kept gardens... It's well worth a visit

title: Visite d'Harvard
text:
Magnifique campus (avec wifi gratuit) √† voir absolument si vous visitez Boston. C'est d√©finitivement un Must Do! Vous ne le regretterez pas.
Visite gratuite du campus possible par les √©tudiants, attention, ils sont proches du kiosque d'information en dehors de la fac, √† la sortie du m√©tro.
translated_text:
Magnificent campus (with free wifi) a must-see if you're visiting Boston. Definitely a Must Do! You won't regret it.
Students can take a free tour of the campus, but beware: they're near the information booth outside the college, just off the subway.

title: –ú–∏—Ä –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π
translated_text: A historical place where one of the best universities in the world was and still is located. The red brick buildings look solid and dignified. There are monuments and a beautiful temple on the territory.

title: Êúù„ÅÆÊï£Ê≠©„ÅåÂø´ÈÅ©
text: Êúù„ÅÆÊï£Ê≠©„Å´‰∏ÅÂ∫¶ËâØ„ÅÑÂ∫É„Åï„ÄÇÁ¥†Êô¥„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑÂª∫ÁØâ„Å®ËäùÁîü„Å®Ê®π„ÄÖ„ÅÆÊè∫„Çâ„Åé„ÇíÁú∫„ÇÅ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å†„Åë„ÅßÂπ∏„Åõ„Å™Ê∞óÂàÜ„Å´„Å™„Çå„Çã„ÄÇ„Éô„É≥„ÉÅ„ÇÑ„ÄÅÂ£≤Â∫ó„ÄÅÂçöÁâ©È§®„ÄÅÁæéË°ìÈ§®„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅ1Êó•„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇÊ•Ω„Åó„ÇÅ„Çã„ÄÇ
translated_text: Just the right size for a morning walk. Just looking at the wonderful architecture, lawn, and swaying trees makes me happy. There are benches, stores, a museum, and an art museum, so you can spend a whole day here.

title: tr√©s int√©ressant
text: Nous vous conseillons de r√©server une visite guid√©e avec un √©tudiant. Des anecdotes amusantes et historiques.
translated_text: We recommend booking a guided tour with a student. Fun and historical anecdotes.

title: Um passeio pelas universidades que aparecem nos filmes
text: Harvard √© um passeio muito legal, seu jardins, seus alunos, tudo √© muito atraente. Pode estar nesta universidade de ponta foi uma honra. E esteticamente √© muito bonita. Parece que voc√™ est√° passeando nas universidades dos filmes de Hollywood.
translated_text: Harvard is a very cool place, its gardens, its students, everything is very attractive. Being able to be at this top university was an honor. And aesthetically it's very beautiful. It looks like you're walking around the universities in Hollywood movies.

title: Superbe endroit
text: Lieu mythique √† visiter si vous passez par Boston ! Prenez le metro (red line) et Harvard n'est qu'√† 4 stations. Arriv√©s sur place (en face de ma bouche de m√©tro) vous pourrez circuler librement dans Harvard et vous impregnier de l'endroit. Sachez que vous devrez quand m√™me respecter des r√©gles de discretion et de respect des √©tudiants.
translated_text: A mythical place to visit if you're ever in Boston! Take the metro (red line) and Harvard is only 4 stations away. Once you're there (opposite my subway stop), you'll be able to move freely around Harvard and soak up the atmosphere. Be aware, however, that you'll need to respect the rules of discretion and respect for students.

title: Must have
translated_text: A great place to walk, dream and think! You walk around and quietly envy the local students! But there is something to aspire to)) must visit if you are in Boston).

title: Plaisant et reposant
text: Petite marche sur la campus, environnement calme et tr√®s beau!  √Ä voir: la statue de John Harvard et la biblioth√®que (de l'ext√©rieur car on  ne peut pas y rentrer sans ID de Harvard.
translated_text: A short walk on campus, a calm and beautiful environment!  Don't miss: the John Harvard statue and the library (from the outside, as you can't get in without a Harvard ID).

title: Harvard √© Harvard...
text:
Harvard n√£o √© clich√™.
Ela √©, sen√£o a mais famosa, uma das mais famosas universidades americanas... e se deixarmos de lado a quest√£o da fama ainda tem a quest√£o hist√≥rica (ela foi fundada em 1636!!), ent√£o... n√£o importa se voc√™ n√£o √© nem um pouquinho NERD (como eu kkk), √© um daqueles lugares que quando voc√™ vai, voc√™ se sente parte da hist√≥ria! (e at√© parece que voc√™ est√° visitanto algu√©m conhecido, de tanto que voc√™ j√° viu o lugar em filmes, seriados, document√°rios....kkk)
E ainda por cima √© um lugar lindo de estar, bom de sentar para ler nos jardins (claro, fui em setembro e os dias s√£o ensolarados e ainda quentes), com uma diversidade incr√≠vel de pessoas e idiomas.
Sem contar o tanto de cultura que voc√™ pode aproveitar, como o museu, a Biblioteca...
At√© mesmo o tour (que parece um pouco turista demais) vale a pena fazer.
Al√©m disso, todo o bairro ao redor √© muito bonito (t√°, j√° adianto que o bairro tem muitos lugares de tributo a Harvard, como lojas de souvenirs, caf√©s, cooperativas, etc... ) mas n√£o deixe de dar uma volta pela redondeza que √© muito up.
translated_text:
Harvard is no clich√©.
It is, if not the most famous, one of the most famous American universities... and if we leave aside the question of fame, there's also the question of history (it was founded in 1636!!), so... it doesn't matter if you're not even a little bit NERD (like me kkk), it's one of those places that when you go, you feel part of history! (and it even feels like you're visiting someone you know, because you've seen the place so much in movies, series, documentaries....kkk)
What's more, it's a beautiful place to be, nice to sit and read in the gardens (of course, I went in September and the days are sunny and still warm), with an incredible diversity of people and languages.
Not to mention all the culture you can enjoy, such as the museum, the library...
Even the tour (which seems a bit too touristy) is worth doing.
What's more, the whole surrounding neighborhood is very beautiful (okay, I'll tell you right now that it has a lot of places that pay tribute to Harvard, such as souvenir stores, caf√©s, cooperatives, etc.... ) but don't forget to take a walk around the neighborhood, which is very up and coming.

title: Local hist√≥rico
text: √â gostoso passear pelos jardins de Harvard e tirar algumas fotos pois esse local esteve presente em diversos filmes e muitos momentos da hist√≥ria.
translated_text: It's nice to wander around the Harvard gardens and take some photos, as this place has been featured in several films and many moments in history.

title: A melhor universidade do mundo!!!
text:
Sem d√∫vidas! Excelente e tradicional
Universidade que busca a atualiza√ß√£o e a melhor acolhida em cada momento! Para√≠so acad√™mico!
translated_text:
No doubt about it! Excellent and traditional
A university that strives to be up-to-date and welcoming at all times! Academic paradise!

title: Investissez pour une visite guid√©e
text: Prenez le tour offert par les √©tudiants. Pour 12$ vous aurez droit √† un tour m√©morable. Notre guide, Andres fut tr√®s dr√¥le et nous a bien renseign√© sur l'universit√©. Faites attention par contre car on nous a charg√© 2 fois sur la carte de credit dans le d√©panneur o√π nous avons achet√© nos billets.
translated_text: Take the student tour. For $12 you'll get a memorable tour. Our guide, Andres, was very funny and told us a lot about the university. Be careful, though, as we were charged twice on our credit card at the convenience store where we bought our tickets.

title: Muito bonito
text: O lugar √© bonito, mas surpreendentemente n√£o √© t√£o grande como muita gente imagina. Infelizmente n√£o tinha disponibilidade para o tour guiado n√≥s dias em que eu estava l√°.
translated_text: The place is beautiful, but surprisingly it's not as big as many people think. Unfortunately, there were no guided tours available on the days I was there.

title: Alt und gediegen
text: Es gibt wenige Universit√§ten auf der Welt, wo mehr Touristen wie Studenten sind; vielleicht noch Oxfort und Cambride, aber bestimmt Havard. Man muss den Flair um sich wehen lassen, um zu erfahren. Alte, besiegen Geb√§ude, die Weite des Harvard Yard, all das muss man erleben. Die Harvard University ist einen Besuch wert; sehr empfehlenswert.
translated_text: There are few universities in the world where there are more tourists than students; perhaps Oxfort and Cambride, but certainly Havard. You have to let the flair waft around you to experience it. Old, defeated buildings, the vastness of Harvard Yard, you have to experience it all. Harvard University is worth a visit; highly recommended.

title: Hermoso lugar para visitar
text: Muy recomendable pasear por Harvard Yard y toda la zona de la Universidad de Harvard. Quisimos visitar la Biblioteca pero no es posible entrar si no eres de Harvard, lo mismo sucede en la Biblioteca de la Facultad de Derecho, donde solo se puede acceder a una peque√±a parte de esta.
translated_text: It is highly recommended to walk around Harvard Yard and the whole area of Harvard University. We wanted to visit the Library but it is not possible to enter if you are not from Harvard, the same happens in the Law School Library, where you can only access a small part of it.

title: Inponente
text: Inmensa e imponente ser√≠an los mejores adjetivos, es una muy buena opci√≥n para visitar y recorrer. No se pueden acceder a todas las instalaciones del campus, hay algunas que son exclusivas para los estudiantes, docentes, etc. No obstante existen algunas exposiciones de libre acceso muy interesantes donde inclusive no hay que pagar nada para el acceso. Caminar por las instalaciones de Harvard realmente es inspirador e imposible de hacerlo con poco tiempo. Recomendado y llevar calzados c√≥modos
translated_text: Immense and imposing would be the best adjectives, it is a very good option to visit and tour. It is not possible to access all the facilities of the campus; there are some that are exclusive for students, teachers, etc. However, there are some very interesting free access exhibitions where you don't even have to pay anything for access. Walking through Harvard's facilities is really inspiring and impossible to do with little time. Recommended and wear comfortable shoes

title: Leuke Hahvahd Tour
text: Een student(e) leidt je rond op de campus en vertelt over de geschiedenis van de Universiteit. Luchtige Tour met wat mopjes. In de trotter stond dat dit gratis was, maar kost nu 12dollar pp. We verschoten maar zijn blij dat we de Tour toch gedaan hebben en het was zeker 12dollar waard! Aanrader!!!
translated_text: A student(s) will show you around campus and tell you about the history of the University. Airy Tour with some jokes. The trotter said this was free but now costs 12dollar pp. We were shocked but glad we did the Tour anyway and it was well worth 12dollar! Highly recommended!!!

title: Visite guid√©e de Hahvahd Pat un √©tudiant gradu√©
text:
Concept int√©ressant de pouvoir avoir une visite du campus guid√©e par un ancien √©tudiant qui vientjuste d'√™tre gradu√©.
Les diff√©rents b√¢timents sont ferm√©s au public, ce qui ne permet pas de sentir l'atmosph√®re de cette universit√© de renom.
Visite d'un peu plus d'une heure √† 12 dollars, plus tip r√©clam√© √† la fin, ce que je trouve dommage.
translated_text:
Interesting concept to have a tour of the campus guided by an alumnus who has just graduated.
The various buildings are closed to the public, so you don't get a feel for the atmosphere of this renowned university.
The tour lasts just over an hour and costs $12, plus a tip at the end, which I think is a shame.

title: Turist p√• Harvard
text: Vakre bygninger, flotte parker. Det m√• v√¶re fantastisk √• v√¶re student i slike omgivelser! Vel verdt et bes√∏k!

title: Un MUST de Boston
text: La Universidad de Harvard se encuentra muy proxima a la ciudad de Boston, y realmente es ideal para ir a pasear un dia. Sus edificios, entornos, y los alumnos por todos lados, componen un clima ideal. Aconsejo ir y caminar por sus calles, y por supuesto comprar alguna remerza, buzo o aunque sea un pin de Harvard. Hay diferentes precios dependiendo de si es el merchandising oficial, o si no lo es.
translated_text: Harvard University is located very close to the city of Boston, and is really ideal for a day trip. Its buildings, surroundings, and students everywhere, make an ideal climate. I recommend going and walking through the streets, and of course buying a Harvard T-shirt, sweatshirt or even a Harvard pin. There are different prices depending on whether it is official merchandising or not.

title: 10ÏõîÏùò ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìú ÎÑàÎ¨¥ Ï¢ãÏïÑÏöî
text:
Î≥¥Ïä§ÌÑ¥ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÏùÄ ÎåÄÌïôÏùÑ Î∞©Î¨∏ÌïòÎäîÎç∞ ÎßéÏùÄ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùÑ Ìï†Ïï†ÌñàÏñ¥Ïöî.
Í∑∏ Ï§ë ÌïòÎ≤ÑÎìúÎåÄÌïôÏùÄ Ï†ïÎßê Î©ãÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûäÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏùÑ Í≤É Í∞ôÏäµÎãàÎã§.
translated_text:
I spent a lot of time visiting universities while sightseeing in Boston.
Among them, Harvard University is really cool and unforgettable.

title: Invita a quedarse
text: Un lugar √∫nico y digno de visitar. El campus universitario es hermoso, muy verde que combina con el resto de la ciudad.
translated_text: A unique place worth visiting. The university campus is beautiful, very green and blends in with the rest of the city.

title: A mais famosa universidade americana !
text: Muita hist√≥ria nessa Universidade, fundada em 1636. Umas das mais importantes do mundo! Vale a pena conhecer o Museu de Hist√≥ria Natural, os pr√©dios centrais e a est√°tua de John Harvard (fundador, que na verdade n√£o √© - sugiro ler sobre as 3 mentiras da est√°tua).
translated_text: A lot of history at this university, founded in 1636. One of the most important in the world! It's worth visiting the Natural History Museum, the central buildings and the statue of John Harvard (founder, who actually isn't - I suggest reading about the statue's 3 lies).

title: Su visita vale la pena
text: No solo es muy bella la universidad, sino que es un paseo recomendado debido a que la zona en la que se encuentra la universidad es realmente maravillosa, toda decorada, prolija, con lugares para comer, tomar un helado, es un bello paseo desde que uno toma el subte y pasa por el rio lleno de veleros, barquitos y gente practicando deportes hasta que llegas al campus y te invade el esp√≠ritu universitario del lugar.
translated_text: Not only is the university very beautiful, but it is also a recommended tour because the area where the university is located is really wonderful, all decorated, neat, with places to eat, have an ice cream, it is a beautiful walk from the moment you take the subway and go through the river full of sailboats, boats and people practicing sports until you reach the campus and you are invaded by the university spirit of the place.

title: –ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥ —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
translated_text: A very interesting historical place, a town of students and teachers. The library building is impressive, and the monument to the student with shiny shoe socks, from the hands of those who want to join.

title: Balade √† Havard
text:
Tr√®s belle visite sur le Campus d'Harvard. Tr√®s agr√©able l'√©t√© √† visiter en famille.
Dommage que nous n'ayons pas pu visiter la biblioth√®que.
translated_text:
Very nice visit to the Harvard Campus. Very pleasant in summer to visit with the family.
Too bad we couldn't visit the library.

title: Cosi cosi
text: Sicuramente se si va a Boston non si pu√≤ perdere questa visita ad una delle pi√π prestigiose universit√† private al mondo. Sinceramente non mi ha particolarmente colpito se non nel business che gli esperti di marketing americani hanno messo in piedi intorno all'ateneo: negozi e cooperative che vendono gadget di tutti i tipi (e anche molto costosi) compresi tour piuttosto scadenti fatti da studenti che ti portano (solo in parte) del campus. Avendo visto le universit√† di Cambridge e Oxford in UK devo dire che qui ti colpisce molto meno
translated_text: Certainly if you go to Boston you cannot miss this visit to one of the most prestigious private universities in the world. Honestly, I was not particularly impressed except in the business that American marketers have set up around the university: stores and cooperatives selling all kinds of gadgets (and very expensive ones at that) including rather shoddy tours given by students who take you (only part of) the campus. Having seen the universities of Cambridge and Oxford in the UK I must say that here it affects you much less

title: Paseo imperdible
text: Es una excelente excursi√≥n. Se llega en subte desde el centro de Boston en aprox 15/20 minutos. Es recomendable hacerlo con un tour, hay variedad, desde tour gratuitos que ofrecen los estudiantes de la universidad hasta "free walking tour". Es una lugar impresionante, con muchisima historia. La ciudad alrededor (Cambridge) es muy pintorezca y hay lindos lugares para comer algo. La universidad en s√≠ es imponente, no se puede entrar a los edificios (salvo uno), pero vale la pena recorrerla y aprender las historias que ofrece.
translated_text: It is an excellent excursion. You can get there by subway from downtown Boston in about 15/20 minutes. It is advisable to do it with a tour, there is a variety, from free tours offered by the students of the university to "free walking tour". It is an impressive place, with a lot of history. The surrounding city (Cambridge) is very picturesque and there are nice places to eat something. The university itself is impressive, you can't enter the buildings (except for one), but it's worth touring it and learning the stories it offers.

title: Des musees a visiter
text: Il faut absolument voir le musee des sciences naturelles. Un seul etage donc pas trop long a visiter. Il ne faut pas rater les fleurs en verre vraiment extraordinaire. Jaibcp aime le musee geologique et sur les changements climatiques. Campus tres grands pas tres bien indique mais les gens se font un plaisir fe nous renseigner.
translated_text: The Natural Science Museum is a must-see. Only one floor, so it doesn't take too long to visit. Don't miss the extraordinary glass flowers. I really like the geology and climate change museums. The campus is very large and not very well signposted, but the people there are happy to help.

title: espacio emotivo, alto, grande
text: Es toda una experiencia, caminar por esta universidad, por lo que significa para el conocimiento de la humanidad, por los que han ense√±ado y estudiado en ella, por su carga hist√≥rica, e incluso, por revivir escenas de filmes de diversas √©pocas y en diversas estaciones. lo recomiendo grandemente.
translated_text: It is quite an experience, walking through this university, for what it means for the knowledge of humanity, for those who have taught and studied in it, for its historical burden, and even for reliving scenes from films of different times and in different seasons. I highly recommend it.

title: Cultura
text: Visita alla storica e mitica universit√† di harvard. Girando per il campus sembra di essere in un film. √à un posto speciale non solo per coloro che riescono a frequentarlo e laurearsi
translated_text: Visit to the historic and legendary harvard university. Walking around the campus feels like being in a movie. It is a special place not only for those who manage to attend it and graduate

title: Il fascino dell'istituzione
text:
Harvard va visitata in quanto e' il simbolo mondiale degli studi universitari.
Come per il MIT consiglio di non perdere tempo e soldi con visite guidate ma di godervi una bella passeggiata nell'austero ma gradevole ambiente, anche perch√© non puoi entrare in nessun edificio.
Siamo capitati fortunatamente il giorno dell'inserimento delle matricole e quindi ..... una sbirciatina siamo riusciti a darla.
translated_text:
Harvard should be visited as it is the world symbol of university studies.
As with MIT I recommend not wasting time and money on guided tours but enjoying a nice walk through the austere but pleasant environment, also because you cannot enter any of the buildings.
We happened to be there fortunately on freshman induction day, so ..... a peek we were able to take.

title: Visita Obligada
text:
Si vas a Boston, tienes dejar un tiempo para visitar la Universidad de Harvard, est√° en Cambridge, pegado a Boston, a unos 8 km del centro de Boston.
Es la famosa universidad, se puede visitar por dentro, y darse un paseo el campus, alrededor de los edificios, ver donde se hacen la foto y tiran al cielo el birrete en la graduacion. En est√° universidad se graduaron algunos de los m√°s importantes presidente de USA.
Es como sale en las peliculas.
translated_text:
If you go to Boston, you have to leave some time to visit Harvard University, it is in Cambridge, next to Boston, about 8 km from downtown Boston.
It is the famous university, you can visit inside, and take a walk around the campus, around the buildings, see where they take the photo and throw the cap to the sky at graduation. Some of the most important presidents of the USA graduated from this university.
It's just like in the movies.

„Ç¢„Ç∑„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Éà„ÅåÊïô„Åà„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç∑„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Éà„ÅÆË≥™„Åå‰∏ãÊâã„Å™ÊïôÊéà„Çà„ÇäÂÑ™„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÄÇ

‰ΩúÂÆ∂„ÅÆÊùë‰∏äÊò•Ê®π„Åï„Çì„Åå‰∏ÄÊôÇÊúü„ÅÑ„Çâ„Åó„Åü„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
translated_text:
Not because it is famous.
I think it is the oldest university in the United States. The campus area is calm.
I know more about the top 100 universities in the U.S. than most counselors, including what kind of students they have, what majors they have, and what their graduation rates are.
I can assure you that Harvard is a great university. I think it is the best in the world.
They have a lot of money for research, and they have the most money in the world, so their tuition is cheap.
Compared to other universities, it is not geeky, not extremely liberal or conservative.
It's not a bunch of spoiled kids screaming like idiots every night, and it's not all studying to death.
It is not mammoth like a state university, although some have pointed out that class sizes are too large and professors don't teach,
The students are all smart, so they don't drop classes.
Even if an assistant teaches, the quality of the assistant is better than a poor professor.
The university is very famous for medicine and law, but it is also strong in Japanese studies.
The writer Haruki Murakami was there for a while.

title: Un honor realizar un curso en Harvad
text: Realic√© un curso de verano en Harvard sobre educaci√≥n "proyec 0". Una experiencia inolvidable y muy enriquecedora conocer gente de tantos sitios.
translated_text: I took a summer course at Harvard on "projec 0" education. It was an unforgettable experience and very enriching to meet people from so many places.

title: –°–æ–ª–∏–¥–Ω–æ
translated_text: Everything in this university has a touch of goodness. Solid red brick buildings, solid monuments to worthy uncles. I happened to study in the neighborhood of the school of business, I note that the students here, too, are mostly exceptionally solid people.

title: Arquitetura e hist√≥ria bem bacana
text: Passeio legal, est√°vamos com um grupo, a guia √† car√°ter explicou um pouco da hist√≥ria e falou sobre as pessoas que j√° passaram por la. Tinha locais para comer nas proximidades (food truck). N√£o conseguimos entrar na biblioteca.
translated_text: We were with a group and the guide, who was in character, explained some of the history and talked about the people who had been there. There were places to eat nearby (food trucks). We couldn't get into the library.

title: Harvard la mythique universit√©
text: A faire l'apr√®s midi c'est ombrag√©, agr√©able. On se prom√®ne, on fl√¢ne, on se repose sur les chaises et on attend que les √©cureuils viennent nous voir. En juillet il n'est pas possible de prendre des visites faites par des √©tudiants dommage. Si vous voulez rentrer dans le b√¢timents il faut prendre une visite guid√©e mais on peut s'en passer.  on trouve des plans du campus sur internet
translated_text: In the afternoon, it's shady and pleasant. You can stroll around, rest on the chairs and wait for the squirrels to come and see you. In July, it's not possible to take student tours, which is a shame. If you want to get inside the buildings, you have to take a guided tour, but that's not necessary. You can find campus maps on the Internet.

title: INTERESANTE
text: Tomamos el walking tour con Zack, estudiante de Psicolog√≠a, y estuvo muy lindo e interesante. Vale la pena el recorrido y conocer los datos que dan. Pasamos despu√©s a la librer√≠a que est√° cerca, que est√° muy bien surtida.
translated_text: We took the walking tour with Zack, a Psychology student, and it was very nice and interesting. It is worth the tour and the information they give. We then went to the nearby bookstore, which is very well stocked.

title: Lindo
text:
Esta Universidad cuenta con visitas guiadas. Es un lugar lleno de historia y es muy interesante sobre todo si eres estudiante.
Lo √∫nico malo que veo en este lugar es que siempre est√° lleno de turistas, a todas horas, entonces pues se debe tener mucha paciencia incluso para tomar fotos.
Se puede incluso hacer un picnic en los jardines de ah√≠ porque tambi√©n tienen mesas y todo para los visitantes.
translated_text:
This university offers guided tours. It is a place full of history and is very interesting especially if you are a student.
The only bad thing I see in this place is that it is always full of tourists, at all hours, so you have to be very patient even to take pictures.
You can even have a picnic in the gardens there because they also have tables and everything for visitors.

title: Visite guid√©e du campus de Harvard
text: Une visite fort int√©ressante, une foule d'anecdotes et notre guide, Zach, un jeune homme des plus sympathiques!
translated_text: A very interesting tour, lots of anecdotes and our guide, Zach, a very likeable young man!

title: Da non perdere
text: Immerso nel verde questo complesso universitario consta di numerosi edifici in tipici mattoncini rossi ed √® immerso nel verde. Si respira l'aria universitaria e delle confraternite viste in numerosi film. Abbiamo visitato la statua di J. Harvard, i campi da football, da hockey da tennis il museo della storia naturale
translated_text: Surrounded by greenery, this university complex consists of several buildings made of typical red bricks and is surrounded by greenery. You can breathe in the university and fraternity air seen in numerous movies. We visited the statue of J. Harvard, the football fields, tennis field hockey the natural history museum

title: Impressionante!
text: A arquitetura da Universidade lembra brinquedo de tijolinhos, tudo muito bem cuidado e bonito! Os pr√©dios s√£o lindos e antigos, maravilhosa!
translated_text: The architecture of the University is reminiscent of a brick toy, everything is very well kept and beautiful! The buildings are beautiful and old, wonderful!

title: Zona universitaria
text: Edificios de 1600. Muy elitista. Coste de los cursos excesivos. Visita de los alrededores interesante. Para ver pero nada m√°s
translated_text: Buildings from 1600. Very elitist. Excessive cost of the courses. Visit of the surroundings interesting. To see but nothing more

title: B√¢timents impressionnants
text: Magnifique architecture pour certains b√¢timents. Je vous sugg√®re de faire un tour guid√© afin de bien comprendre l'histoire et la raison d'√™tre des diff√©rentes infrastructures.
translated_text: Some of the buildings have magnificent architecture. I suggest you take a guided tour to fully understand the history and purpose of the various infrastructures.

title: aucun guide ni acc√®s aux b√¢timents, dommage.
text: Difficile de trouver un guide en fran√ßais...dommage! nous avons donc fait la visite tout seul et nous sommes organis√©s avec un plan en fran√ßais vendu 3$ par le kiosque d'information que nous avons difficilement trouv√©. Nous avons tout de m√™me √©t√© impressionn√© par les installations et aurions aim√© pouvoir rentrer dans les √©difices avec un guide francophone.
translated_text: It was hard to find a French-speaking guide...too bad! So we took the tour on our own and organized ourselves with a French map sold for $3 by the information kiosk, which we found hard to come by. Still, we were impressed by the facilities and would have liked to have been able to enter the buildings with a French-speaking guide.

title: –ì–∞—Ä–≤–∞—Ä–¥
translated_text: I visited this university to familiarize myself with the history of the formation of this great Temple of Science and Education.  Here every leaf of the tree is imbued with the spirit and history of education.

title: Universidade em Cambridge
text: A famosa Universidade de Harvard em Cambrigde e que vale a pena conhecer. Passei a noite mas recomendo conhecer e explorar os pr√©dios pela manh√£.
translated_text: The famous Harvard University in Cambrigde is well worth a visit. I spent the night but I recommend visiting and exploring the buildings in the morning.

title: Sono rimasto deluso
text:
Ho partecipato alla visita organizzata per la presentazione dell'Universita' e devo dire che quale che fosse il loro messaggio, 
 non mi e' arrivato. Prima siamo stati in una grande aula insieme ad altre duecento persone ad ascoltare l'introduzione di una funzionaria dell'istituto e due studenti, poi ci hanno portato in visita ai vari edifici che compongono l'ateneo senza pero' entrare mai all'interno......una vera delusione.....se da questa visita fosse dipesa l'iscrizione ed il pagamento della relativa astronomica retta, mi sarei rivolto altrove. Forse si fanno forti del loro nome e sanno che le persone si iscrivono comunque......dovrebbero pero' andare a vedere come si propongono con maggiore profusione di notizie le altre universita' ed adeguarsi.
translated_text:
I attended the visit organized for the University presentation and I must say that whatever their message was,
 it did not get through to me. First we were in a large lecture hall along with two hundred other people listening to an introduction by an institute official and two students, then they took us on a tour of the various buildings that make up the university without ever going inside......a real disappointment.....if enrollment and payment of the related astronomical tuition had depended on this visit, I would have gone elsewhere. Perhaps they stand by their name and know that people will enroll anyway......they should, however, go and see how other universities pitch themselves with greater profusion and adjust.

title: Entretenido
text: Hicimos el tour de Harvard, nos pareci√≥ super entretenido y con muchos datos interesantes. Nuestro gu√≠a fue BRANSON, estudiante de cine y realmente estuvo espectacular, SUPER RECOMENDABLE!
translated_text: We did the Harvard tour, we found it super entertaining and with lots of interesting facts. Our guide was BRANSON, a film student and he was really spectacular, SUPER RECOMMENDED!

title: Divertido
text:
Al salir justo del metro veras un grupo de estudiantes con sombreros dd Harvard! Tus gu√≠as!!! Jejeje
Adentro del kiosko justo al frente, pagas $10 por una visita guiada, divertida, entretenida y llena de an√©cdotas!!! Vale la pena!!!
translated_text:
As you exit the subway you will see a group of students wearing Harvard hats! Your guides! Hehehe
Inside the kiosk just across the street, you pay $10 for a guided tour, fun, entertaining and full of anecdotes!!!!! It's worth it!!!!

title: Imposible no visitar.
text: Un lugar con historia, si visitar Boston es imposible no visitar este lugar. Cada uno de los campus tiene un arquitectura e historia sin igual.
translated_text: A place with history, if you visit Boston it is impossible not to visit this place. Each of the campuses has an unparalleled architecture and history.

title: Superbe
text:
Il est possible de passer une journ√©e compl√®te √† visiter, fl√¢ner, observer le campus. On peut aussi y passer 2 petites heures √† partir du restaurant Grafton Street.
Il ne faut pas h√©siter √† pousser les portes, √† s'asseoir et profiter d'une certaine qui√©tude et go√ªter l'ambiance.
Les locaux sont tout simplement superbes et le cadre est "hors norme". On comprend pourquoi les √©tudes peuvent co√ªter ce prix !
Cette ou ces "petites" visites sont √† faire imp√©rativement lorsqu'on s√©journe √† Boston. On ne le regrette pas. On revit le film "Social Network".
translated_text:
You can spend a whole day visiting, strolling and observing the campus. You can also spend 2 hours starting from the Grafton Street restaurant.
Don't hesitate to push open the doors, sit back and enjoy the peace and atmosphere.
The premises are simply superb and the setting is "out of the ordinary". It's easy to see why studies can cost so much!
This or these "little" visits are a must when staying in Boston. You won't regret it. We're reliving the "Social Network" movie.

title: Bes√∏k som turist
text: Stort campus med store, gamle, flotte og erverdige bygninger. Du kan tusle rundt p√• egenh√•nd, sette deg p√• en benk/stol i omr√•det eller v√¶re med p√• guidet tur.
translated_text: Large campus with big, old, beautiful and venerable buildings. You can stroll around on your own, sit on a bench/chair in the area or join a guided tour.

title: Î∞©ÌïôÏù¥Îùº Í∑∏ÎûòÏÑúÏù∏ÏßÄ
text: Í∞ÄÏù¥ÎìúÏôÄ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ùÎì§Ïù¥ Ï∫†ÌçºÏä§Î•º Ï†êÎ†πÌñàÎã§. Ïã§ÎÇ¥Îäî Îì§Ïñ¥Í∞à Ïàò ÏóÜÎäîÎìØÌïòÍ≥† Ïñ¥Îîú Í∞ÄÎÇò Ï§ëÍµ≠Ïù∏, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïù∏, ÏùºÎ≥∏Ïù∏ Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÍ∞ùÎì§Ïù¥ Í∞ÅÏûê ÎÇ¥Îäî Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Îì§. Ïñ¥ÎîúÍ∞ÄÎÇò ÏÇ¨ÎûåÎì§. ÌïôÎ¨∏Ïùò ÏöîÎûåÏù¥ ÏïÑÎãàÎùº Í±∞ÎåÄÌïú Í¥ÄÍ¥ëÏãúÏÑ§ Í∞ôÏùÄ Î∂ÑÏúÑÍ∏∞. ÌïôÍ∏∞ Ï§ë ÌïúÏ†ÅÌï† Îïå Îì§Î†§ÏÑú Ï∞®Î∂ÑÌûà ÎëòÎü¨ Î¥êÏïºÌûêÎìØ
translated_text: The campus has been taken over by guides and tourists. It feels like you can't go inside, and there are Chinese, Korean, and Japanese tourists everywhere, speaking their own languages. People everywhere. It feels like a huge tourist facility, not a cradle of learning. It's a place you should visit during the semester when it's quiet.

title: Beperkt beeld
text: Het is moeilijk om een goed beeld te krijgen van harvard university. Met of Zonder rondleiding kom je niet verder dan de buitenkant van de universiteit terwijl juist de binnenzijde van bijvoorbeeld de studentenverblijven, studieruimtes of bibliotheek juist interessant zijn. De groenvoorzieningen zijn mooi en geven een beetje een beeld van hoe het leven op deze universiteit eraan toe gaat.
translated_text: It is difficult to get a good picture of harvard university. With or Without a tour you will not get beyond the outside of the university while the inside of, for example, the student quarters, study rooms or library are interesting. The green areas are beautiful and give a little idea of what life is like at this university.

title: Un must da visitare
text: Se si e' a Boston non si puo' non andare a visitare il campus di Harvard. Gli edifici si vedono solo da fuori,ma anche solo passeggiare per i giardini ha il suo fascino. Immancabile sosta nei negozietti di souvenir all'esterno per l'immancabile ricordino del posto!
translated_text: If you are in Boston, you cannot fail to visit the Harvard campus. The buildings can only be seen from the outside,but even just walking through the gardens has its charm. Unmissable stop at the little souvenir stores outside for the inevitable souvenir of the place!

title: Vale la pena recorrerla
text: Se puede llegar en metro desde el centro de Boston (red Line a Harvard Square).  Una vez all√≠, te dirig√≠s al Harvard Information center en Dunster y Auburn, y te anot√°s para hacer el tour (gratuito )  , conducido por estudiantes de la universidad.  Estos son en ingl√©s, pero pod√©s adquirir una guia impresa , por u$ 3 , donde hay una breve rese√±a de los lugares mas importantes.  El tour dura una hora  aproximadamente, y es muy ameno, y did√°ctico.  Por supuesto, tambi√©n hay tours pagos en tu idioma .
translated_text: You can get there by subway from downtown Boston (Red Line to Harvard Square).  Once there, you go to the Harvard Information Center at Dunster and Auburn, and sign up for a free tour, led by students from the university.  These are in English, but you can purchase a printed guide for $3.00, where there is a brief overview of the most important places.  The tour lasts about an hour, and is very entertaining and educational.  Of course, there are also paid tours in your language.

title: Campus hermoso, lleno de historia. Atr√©vase a conocerlo!
text: Fui en horas de la noche, con amigos. Es un lugar muy seguro, bonito y las personas muy amables. 100% recomendado.
translated_text: I went there at night, with friends. It is a very safe, nice place and the people are very friendly. 100% recommended.

title: Lugar Historico
text: Realmente un gran campus, si te dejas llevar te traslada a una ambiente de muchos a√±os de estudio y aprendizaje; Es interesante recorrerlo y fotografiar detalles
translated_text: Really a great campus, if you let yourself go, you are transported to an environment of many years of study and learning; It is interesting to walk through it and photograph details.

Nice old buildings bring you back to other times. In the church that dominates it we were fortunate at that time to have a concert of baroque music beginning. The choir of students of all nationalities with a perfect performance. The only thing I didn't know is that the girls started attending there very recently.

title: magnifique!
text: Tr√®s int√©ressant, un lieu mythique, o√π l‚Äôon peut acc√©der au campus, et voir tous les b√¢timents! de beaux parcs pour chiller!
translated_text: Very interesting, a mythical place, where you can access the campus and see all the buildings! Beautiful parks for chilling out!

title: Preciosa
text:
La Universidad Harvard es una universidad privada muy prestigiosa ubicada en Cambridge
Es la m√°s antigua de los Estados Unidos.
Tiene como promedio unos 6.700 estudiantes de pregrado y unos 14 500 de postgrado
translated_text:
Harvard University is a very prestigious private university located in Cambridge.
It is the oldest in the United States.
It has an average of about 6,700 undergraduate students and about 14,500 graduate students.

title: Excelente
text: El tour est√° hecho por alumnos. Estar√≠a bueno que lo den en otros idiomas adem√°s de en ingles. La universidad es hermosa.
translated_text: The tour is made by students. It would be nice if they could give it in other languages besides English. The university is beautiful.

title: Passeio imperd√≠vel em Cambridge.
text: Fundada em 1636, √© a universidade mais antiga e uma das melhores dos Estados Unidos. S√£o v√°rios pr√©dios no campus, mas todo mundo quer ir no Harvard College com seus jardins e alojamentos, na Widener Library, imensa biblioteca da universidade com 80 km de estantes, mas  que, infelizmente, s√≥ os alunos e ex-alunos podem entrar, e na est√°tua de seu fundador John Harvard que todos querem pegar o dedo do p√© esquerdo porque d√° sorte (Ele j√° at√© mudou de cor). Ali perto est√° o n√£o menos famoso MIT. Muito bem cuidada e mantida por seus ex-alunos. Passeio imperd√≠vel e obrigat√≥rio.
translated_text: Founded in 1636, it is the oldest and one of the best universities in the United States. There are several buildings on campus, but everyone wants to go to Harvard College with its gardens and residence halls, the Widener Library, the university's immense library with 80 km of shelves, but which, unfortunately, only students and alumni can enter, and the statue of its founder John Harvard that everyone wants to pick up on his left toe because it's lucky (he's even changed color). Nearby is the no less famous MIT. Very well looked after and maintained by its alumni. A must-see.

title: Volver a Harvard siempre es una gran experiencia!!!
text:
Fue una linda experiencia llevar a mi hija a conocer uno de los lugares donde pas√© los mejores momentos de mi vida. Regresar a Harvard luego de tantos a√±os fue emocionante. Hab√≠a estudiado en 1997 y volver 18 a√±os despu√©s fue revivir una etapa muy buena de mi vida. Es un lugar digno de ser visitado por cualquier turista.
Volver a frotar el zapato de John Harvard fue regresar en el tiempo.
translated_text:
It was a nice experience to take my daughter to see one of the places where I spent the best times of my life. Returning to Harvard after so many years was exciting. I had studied there in 1997 and to come back 18 years later was to relive a very good period of my life. It is a place worth visiting for any tourist.
To go back and rub John Harvard's shoe was to go back in time.

title: Pr√©dios antigos
text: √ìtimo passeio, pr√©dios antigos, muito espa√ßo para caminhar muitas √°rvores tudo muito bem conservado.
translated_text: Great walk, old buildings, lots of space to walk, lots of trees, all very well kept.

title: Veramente incredibile
text: Harvard ha un fascino unico! √à il campus per eccellenza, cos√¨ come ognuno di noi pu√≤ immaginarselo. Peccato che si possano visitare solo i giardini, non gli interni.
translated_text: Harvard has a unique charm! It is the quintessential campus as any of us can imagine it. Too bad you can only visit the gardens, not the interior.

title: Harvard es incre√≠ble
text: Siempre hay grupos de extranjeros visitando los esacios abiertos y admirando los edificios, no se puede acceder a los edificios si no se es estudiante y se tiene identificaci√≥n pero vale mucho la pena ver esta maravillosa universidad
translated_text: There are always groups of foreigners visiting the open buildings and admiring the buildings, you can not access the buildings if you are not a student and you have an ID but it is well worth seeing this wonderful university.

title: Harvard....
text: Campus di innegabile prestigio visitato di domenica mattina dopo aver stampato cartina e scaricato mp3 con la descrizione degli edifici direttamente dal sito dell'universit√†. Non ho potuto vedere gli interni ma solo il parco e la statua di John Harvard. La visita √® piuttosto breve e secondo me ci sono campus e college che permettono di visitare molto di pi√π e di comprendere la vita universitaria che vi viene svolta.
translated_text: Campus of undeniable prestige visited on a Sunday morning after printing map and downloading mp3 with description of buildings directly from the university website. I was not able to see the interior but only the grounds and the statue of John Harvard. The visit is rather short and in my opinion there are campuses and colleges that allow one to visit much more and to understand the university life that takes place there.

title: Universidade
text:
A melhor e mais famosa faculdade dos Estados Unidos fica localizada em Cambridge, munic√≠pio vizinho de Boston, e bem perto de seu irm√£o famoso o MIT.
Vale o passeio pelo belo campus e tamb√©m pela loja de souvenirs.
translated_text:
The best and most famous college in the United States is located in Cambridge, next door to Boston, and very close to its famous brother, MIT.
The beautiful campus and the souvenir store are well worth a visit.

title: Imperd√≠vel
text: Passeio imperd√≠vel. Nota-se o contraste entre a valoriza√ß√£o do conhecimento nos EUA e no Brasil. H√° um amor, talvez uma devo√ß√£o por sua Universidade pelos ex-alunos de Havard que pouco vemos no Brasil, o que observamos pelas homenagens prestadas no campus, atrav√©s de benfeitorias por turmas veteranas. O Museu de Arte √© um espet√°culo √† parte: uma cole√ßao impressionista de valor incalcul√°vel!
translated_text: An unmissable visit. You can see the contrast between the appreciation of knowledge in the USA and Brazil. There is a love, perhaps a devotion to their university on the part of Havard alumni that we see very little of in Brazil, which we can see in the tributes paid on campus, through improvements made by senior classes. The Art Museum is a spectacle in itself: an impressionist collection of incalculable value!

title: Una universidad diferente...
text: El campus es muy grande, con un enorme conjunto de edificios. Se respira algo diferente, es estar en la cuna de muchos hombres muy influyentes.
translated_text: The campus is very large, with a huge set of buildings. You breathe something different, it is to be in the cradle of many very influential men.

title: „Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÅÆ„ÅäÂúüÁî£Â±ã
text: Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÅÆÁõÆ„ÅÆÂâç„Å´„ÅÇ„Çã„ÅäÂúüÁî£Â±ã„Åï„Çì„Å´Ë°å„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÈÄ±Êú´„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÅåÔºå„Å®„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇÊ∑∑„Çì„Åß„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Åª„Åó„ÅÑ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„Éâ„Ç∞„ÉÉ„Ç∫„ÅØÂ§ß‰ΩìÊâã„Å´ÂÖ•„Çã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: I went to a souvenir shop right in front of the university. It was a weekend, and it was very crowded. I think you can get most of the Harvard goods you want.

title: Hermosa
text: Divina experiencia poder recorrer la distintas Univerdiades , sus coloridos patios y senderos. una linda experiencia
translated_text: It is a wonderful experience to be able to visit the different Universities, their colorful patios and trails, a beautiful experience.

title: Excelente universidad
text: Emblematica y prestigiosa universidad, espacioso complejo de estudios, un campus universitario excelente. Museo de ciencias naturales con grandes muestras y muy bien expuestas. Meritorio de conocer. No pudimos entrar a la biblioteca debido que tiene acceso exclusivo para estudiantes.
translated_text: Emblematic and prestigious university, spacious study complex, excellent university campus. Museum of natural sciences with great exhibits and very well exposed. Worth seeing. We could not enter the library because it has exclusive access for students.

title: Waouh!!
text:
Ils ont de la chance les √©tudiants. Les lieux sont magnifiques, les b√¢timents et les parcs sont divinement entretenus. On y voit des lapins.
Facile d'y venir en m√©tro depuis Boston.
En mai, j'ai eu la chance d'y aller le jour de la remise des dipl√¥mes : on y voit des √©tudiants en robe noire et avec des chapeaux carres, comme dans les films.
translated_text:
Lucky students. The grounds are magnificent, the buildings and parks divinely maintained. You can even see rabbits.
Easy to get there by subway from Boston.
In May, I was lucky enough to go there on graduation day: you can see students in black dresses and square hats, just like in the movies.

title: Incre√≠ble!
text: Se accede libremente, y uno puede respirar el aire universitario... Caminar entre los parques, ver los edificios. Ofrecen tours guiados por estudiantes, aunque preferimos recorrerlo nosotros mismos a nuestro tiempo, hermosa experiencia.
translated_text: It is freely accessible, and you can breathe the university air... Walk among the parks, see the buildings. They offer tours guided by students, although we prefer to walk through it ourselves at our own time, beautiful experience.

title: Fascinating en ook  'I first heard this from Ric von Schmidt
text:
Lopend over het groene gras van de fantastische campus van Harvard moest ik denken aan een song van Bob Dylan: "Baby, Let Me Follow You Down". Het eerste couplet luidt:

'I first heard this from Ric von Schmidt. He lives in Cambridge.
Ric is a blues guitarplayer. I met him one day on 
The green pastures of the Harvard University.'

Harvard is met het groene gras en de bruine stenen gebouwen een schitterende rustige belevenis in de drukke stad.
translated_text:
Walking across the green grass of Harvard's fantastic campus, I was reminded of a song by Bob Dylan: "Baby, Let Me Follow You Down." The first verse reads:

"I first heard this from Ric von Schmidt. He lives in Cambridge.
Ric is a blues guitar player. I met him one day on
The green pastures of the Harvard University.'

Harvard, with its green grass and brown stone buildings, is a wonderfully peaceful experience in the busy city.

title: Emocionante
text: Foi emocionante conhecer a Harvard University. Fizemos o tour guiado e √© uma imers√£o na hist√≥ria √© um mergulho em uma das universidades mais famosas do mundo.
translated_text: It was exciting to visit Harvard University. We took the guided tour and it was an immersion in the history of one of the world's most famous universities.

Harry Potter's Diner.

It appears that only first-year and summer school students are allowed inside.

I peeked inside through a small small window, and it really was the world of Harry Potter.

If you want to buy Harvard clothing souvenirs, go to Coop. They have a large selection.

Go through the coop bookstore and go outside once.

They also sell Ralph Lauren uniforms and their departmental uniforms!

title: un lugar incomparable y con gran arquitectura
text: es necesario visitarla, no se puedo dejar de ver, cambridge y boston son geniales, es una gran cuidad con la calma necesaria de un pueblo. translated_text: You have to visit it, you can't miss it, Cambridge and Boston are great, it is a great city with the necessary calm of a town. The University, has a dream architecture, do not miss the historical part but especially the area of Harvard Medical School. You can take free tours with previous resignation at Harvard Medical School and MIT, I recommend to visit it also or you can do it alone. Visit their websites.
