title: –°—Ç–∞—Ä–µ–π—à–∏–π –≤—É–∑ –°–®–ê
translated_text: The drive from New York City takes 5 hours. The city of Cambridge is part of the Boston agglomerate and is located 5 km from its center. It is a must-see. Eight US presidents graduated from Harvard University, 75 Nobel Prize winners were associated with it. Entrance to the university campus is free, you can walk around and plunge into the atmosphere of the oldest university, see the territory, academic buildings and student dormitories. Students conduct an hour-long tour of the campus, tell the history of the university, about the mores and customs of Harvard. Even the time here is its own, "Harvard time" - it is shifted by +7 minutes from the time appointed for the lecture.  They will also tell you why the statue of John Harvard is called "the statue of the triple lie". And the Harvard Bridge, which connects Cambridge with the Boston area, is measured in "snoots".

title: Pour le prestige
text: Naturellement pour le prestige il faut visiter Harvard et aussi pour l'architecture, c'est une belle universit√© .
translated_text: Of course, for the prestige, you have to visit Harvard, and also for the architecture, it's a beautiful university.

title: Vale la pena contratar el tour
text: Si bien podes ingresar a verlo en forma individual , anda a la plaza de Harvard Square, y contrat√° x 10 dolares el tour guiado , vale la pena, te cuentan toda la historia, contado por un alumno de la universidad
translated_text: Although you can enter to see it individually, go to Harvard Square, and hire a guided tour for 10 dollars, it is worth it, they tell you the whole story, told by an alumnus of the university.

title: Impressionnant...
text: Situ√© √† Cambridge, on se croirait dans un monde √† part. L'architecture est superbe. On y retrouve des plaques murales et sur pied qui expliquent certains moments d'histoire. Pas n√©cessaire de suivre un guide. √Ä voir.
translated_text: Located in Cambridge, it's like being in a world apart. The architecture is superb. There are wall and floor plaques explaining certain moments in history. No need to follow a guide. Worth seeing.

title: excelente atraccion para disfrutar relajandose con la naturaleza
text: muy prolija, seria y entretenida. se nota que el compromiso de sus estudiantes es muy pero muy consistente. muy lindo recorrido, personal muy amable. lo recomiendo recorrer en un dia de sol, o de oto√±o donde los jardines se llenan de hermosas y muy coloridas hojas.
translated_text: very neat, serious and entertaining. you can see that the commitment of the students is very, very consistent. very nice tour, very friendly staff. i recommend to visit it on a sunny day, or in autumn when the gardens are filled with beautiful and very colorful leaves.

title: La  numero 1 de las universidades del mundo
text:
Un lugar increible donde la gente joven que estudia en ella, va de un lado a otro estudiando y realizando todo tipo de actividades
Un sitio maraviloso si tienes intereses culturales
translated_text:
An incredible place where the young people who study there, go from one place to another studying and doing all kinds of activities.
A wonderful place if you have cultural interests

title: Harvard
text: Belles Histoires sur le campus. Pas aussi grand que dans les films!! B√¢timents historiques typiquement am√©ricains. Belle Ambiance du quartier alentour, √©tudiants. Beaucoup de restos dans le coin.
translated_text: Great Stories on Campus. Not as big as in the movies! Typical American historic buildings. Nice neighborhood atmosphere, students. Lots of restaurants in the area.

title: Se respira sabidur√≠a
text: Un bello recorrido por el campus guiado por uno de sus estudiantes es una de las visitas que no se pueden dejar de hacer en Boston. Muy recomendable
translated_text: A beautiful tour of the campus guided by one of its students is one of the must-do visits in Boston. Highly recommended

title: una visita muy normal
text: a pcos minutos en subte desde el centro de Boston, la verdad no vale tanto el paseo , pero como no es lejos y solo lleva unos minutos recorrer se puede destinar una horita en ir pasear y volver, adentro del complejo solo es pasear por ah√≠ no dejan entrar a ning√∫n lado, es recomndable caminar por las callecitas de los alrededores que son pintorescas.
translated_text: It is a few minutes by subway from the center of Boston, the truth is not worth the walk, but as it is not far and only takes a few minutes to go around you can spend an hour to walk around and back, inside the complex is just walking around there do not let you enter anywhere, it is recommendable to walk through the surrounding streets that are picturesque.

title: Un lugar imprescindible!
text: La universidad es muy cl√°sica, tiene muchos edificios y jardines, as√≠ como mucha historia, las instalaciones son impresionantes, para conocer algo m√°s toma la gu√≠a de los estudiantes, vale la pena, te cuentan sobre la historia y algunas an√©cdotas.
translated_text: The university is very classic, it has many buildings and gardens, as well as a lot of history, the facilities are impressive, to know something more take the students guide, it is worth it, they tell you about the history and some anecdotes.

title: Havard, la plus p...uante universit√© au monde
text: Je ne sais pas si nous sommes tomb√©s un mauvais jour, mais tous le campus sentait le fumier ! Il semblait avoir des travaux ou quelque chose de ce genre l√†. Mais dans ce cas, ils devraient annuler les visites. A cause de √ßa, l'exp√©rience a √©t√© de tr√®s mauvais go√ªt. Ce n'est pas digne de la plus prestigieuse universit√© des USA. Heureusement qu'on est parti de nous m√™me autour du campus √† l'air beaucoup plus respirable. A part √ßa, peu de chose √† voir. Il faut √™tre √©tudiant d'Havard pour pleinement appr√©cier les lieux.
translated_text: I don't know if it was a bad day, but the whole campus smelled like manure! It looked like there was construction going on or something. But in that case, they'd have to cancel the tours. Because of that, the whole experience was in very bad taste. Not worthy of the most prestigious university in the USA. It's a good thing we got out on our own and went around the campus, where the air was much more breathable. Apart from that, there's not much to see. You have to be a Havard student to fully appreciate the place.

title: De paso por Boston.
text: En nuestro tour por la ciudad de Boston paramos a conocer el Campus de Harvard. Valiosa experiencia y gracias a la excelente explicaci√≥n de nuestro gu√≠a aprendimos mucho de la historia de esta prestigios√≠sima Universidad. Visitamos su entorno y nos adentramos en el maravilloso clima que se respira en Harvard.
translated_text: On our tour through the city of Boston we stopped to visit the Harvard Campus. Valuable experience and thanks to the excellent explanation of our guide we learned a lot about the history of this prestigious University. We visited its environment and we got to know the wonderful atmosphere of Harvard.

title: Le mythe d'Harvard
text:
Promenade au milieu d'une des plus prestigieuses universit√©s.
Superbes b√¢timents,en sortant ,passage oblig√© dans la boutique au logo d'Harvard
translated_text:
Walk through one of the most prestigious universities.
Superb buildings, and on the way out, a visit to the Harvard logo store is a must.

title: Impressionnant
text:
J'y √©tais pour la graduation de mon fr√®re, l'universit√©, les b√¢timents sont impressionnants, l'entretien, les jardins, la c√©r√©monie, l'importance qu'ils donnent aux √©tudiants et √† leur bien √™tre.
J'esp√®re que l'un de mes enfants pourra fr√©quenter cette prestigieuse universit√©.
translated_text:
I was there for my brother's graduation, the university, the buildings are impressive, the upkeep, the gardens, the ceremony, the importance they give to the students and their well-being.
I hope one of my children will be able to attend this prestigious university.

title: L'eccellenza delle universit√†
text: La prima universit√† degli USA che insieme al MIT alla Boston University e alle poco distanti Yale e Brown fanno l'eccellenza universitaria di questa nazione. Chi esce da Harvard ha una marcia in pi√π non c'√® dubbio, frutto di anni ed anni di eccellenza.
translated_text: The top university in the U.S., which together with MIT at Boston University and the not-so-distant Yale and Brown make up this nation's university excellence. Those who come out of Harvard have a leg up no doubt, the result of years and years of excellence.

title: Lotado
text: Quem vai √† Boston n√£o pode deixar de visitar a famosa universidade de Harvard, que fica em Cambridge, bairro do outro lado do rio. Apesar do frio o lugar estava cheio de turistas, √© preciso paci√™ncia para tirar fotos nos pontos mais concorridos.
translated_text: If you're going to Boston, you can't miss the famous Harvard University, which is located in Cambridge, just across the river. Despite the cold, the place was full of tourists, so you'll have to be patient to take pictures at the most popular spots.

title: Lindo Campus
text: Bom conhecer com um guia, e existem v√°rios tours a p√© por l√°, sendo que alguns n√£o cobram e voc√™ no final se quiser deixa uma gorjeta! Foi muito interessante e proveitoso!
translated_text: It's good to meet a guide, and there are several walking tours there, some of which don't charge and you leave a tip at the end! It was very interesting and worthwhile!

title: Para ir 1 hora, volviendo del centro
text:
Es un sitio que en menos de 1 hora lo recorres. S√≠, claro que es bonito, pero no merece que vayas all√° especialmente.
Ideal para pasear antes por Boston Common y desde all√≠, en carro, llegar√°s a Harvard Yard en menos de 15 minutos.
translated_text:
It is a place that takes less than 1 hour to visit. Yes, of course it is beautiful, but it is not worth going there especially.
It is ideal to walk first through Boston Common and from there, by car, you will get to Harvard Yard in less than 15 minutes.

title: Imprescindible
text: Si vas a Boston, no se  puede dejar de visitar, pasear y disfrutar de esta Universidad, que aporta tantos hombres ilustres al saber de la humanidad. En metro desde el centro de Boston se llega en 10 minutos. Totalmente recomendable.
translated_text: If you go to Boston, you cannot miss visiting, walking around and enjoying this University, which has contributed so many illustrious men to the knowledge of mankind. By subway from downtown Boston you can get there in 10 minutes. Totally recommended.

title: Gran universidad
text: Qu√© lindo lugar, los jardines espectaculares y hagan la visita guiada que  la hacen los mismos estudiantes!! Donde les explican un mont√≥n de cosas!!!
translated_text: What a beautiful place, the gardens are spectacular and take the guided tour that is done by the students themselves!!!! Where they explain a lot of things!!!!

translated_text:
The gates of the university are shabby compared to Korea, but many people take pictures here because of the fact that the gates are only opened for entrance and graduation ceremonies, and people who want to go to Harvard often visit beforehand.
Especially, there is a story that if you touch your feet to the Harvard statue on campus, you will study well, so it was very impressive to see many people touching their hands and taking pictures here.

The inside doesn't look much different, but the majestic trees and library speak to the history of the place.

„É°„Éá„Ç£„Ç´„É´„Ç≠„É£„É≥„Éë„Çπ„ÇÇÂ†¥ÊâÄ„ÅØÈõ¢„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Ç™„Çπ„Çπ„É°„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text:
Speaking of tourist attractions in Boston, I came to Harvard University.
Take the train and get off at Harvard University Station. It took me a while just to look around the goods at the coop near the station. Somehow, they were selling goods of MIT, which is also a rival school.
The campus is huge, and there are some familiar buildings such as the East Asia Institute. There were many Chinese people who seemed to be students, and it was rather rare to see white students. There were even some squirrels on campus, which made for a peaceful time.
The medical campus is also far away from the campus, but I recommend it.

title: Mucho por descubir

Muchos espacios y mucha informaci√≥n curiosa. Imponente en varios aspectos, vale la pena. La biblioteca es un lugar a visitar
translated_text: Recommended, it is worthwhile to do this experience with a local guide, preferably with students who are characterized with ancient costumes and take the opportunity to narrate the story as best you can not tell who lives the experience. Many spaces and lots of curious information. Imposing in several aspects, it is worth it. The library is a place to visit

title: Impresionante
text: Es EL campus por excelencia, si vas a Boston no pod√©s dejar de ir a conocerlo! realmente impacta el tama√±o y lo hermosa que es. Tengan en cuenta que son varios edificios los que tiene, recomiendo alquilar bicicleta para poder recorrerla en su totalidad.
translated_text: It is THE campus par excellence, if you go to Boston you can't miss it! It really impresses with its size and beauty. Keep in mind that it has several buildings, I recommend renting a bike to tour it in its entirety.

translated_text: I had a chance to visit the campus. Boston architecture dominates here. A campus area in woods and lawns. It is a home of science with a big library.

Almost 20,000 students for 2,500 teachers!
A gigantic campus of red 17th-century buildings, including classrooms, bookstores and dormitories....

Awe-inspiring!

title: A melhor universidade do mundo
text: Campus absolutamente impec√°vel, todas as instala√ß√µes dispon√≠veis s√£o bem cuidadas, de primeiro mundo. Comemora√ß√µes anuais de anivers√°rio de formatura, formaturas novas, tudo bem organizado e muito grande.
translated_text: Absolutely impeccable campus, all the facilities available are well looked after, first world. Annual graduation anniversary celebrations, new graduations, everything well organized and very large.

title: Parece estar dentro de um filme
text: Estar em uma das melhores universidades do mundo √© m√°gico, a gente se sente dentro de um filme, no dia que fui era formatura, tinha 20.000 cadeiras no terreno (sei a quantidade pq estava escrito na placa rs).
translated_text: Being in one of the best universities in the world is magical, you feel like you're in a movie, on the day I went it was graduation, there were 20,000 chairs in the grounds (I know the number because it was written on the plaque lol).

title: Cuna del saber
text: Fue muy hermoso recorrer la universidad sus calles entramos a ver un aula vacia,cuanto orden .Mi esposo toda la vida quiso conocerla,que buen momento en este paseo para recorrerla y ver donde han estudiado presidentes,premios Nobel etc.
translated_text: It was very beautiful to walk through the streets of the university, we entered to see an empty classroom, how much order, my husband wanted to know it all his life, what a good time on this tour to visit it and see where presidents, Nobel laureates, etc. have studied.

title: Incr√≠vel !
text: O local √© lindo, o campus super bem cuidado. Voc√™ pode fazer uma visita guiada ou simplesmente ir circulando pelo local. N√£o √© muito diferente de outras universidades, mas o clima e a hist√≥ria s√£o incriveis !
translated_text: The place is beautiful, the campus superbly maintained. You can take a guided tour or simply wander around. It's not very different from other universities, but the atmosphere and history are incredible!

title: inesquecivel
text: nesse dia fizemos um tour guiado, conhecendo v√°rias √°rea da escola. A experiencia √© forte e o nosso guia um brilhante historiador trouxe todos os detalhes importantes deste a funda√ßao. Visitamos a livraria, o memorial e tamb√©m outros locais no subsolo. nao tem como esquecer!
translated_text: That day we went on a guided tour of various areas of the school. The experience was powerful and our guide, a brilliant historian, gave us all the important details about the founding of the school. We visited the bookshop, the memorial and other places in the basement. You can't forget it!

title: Lindo
text: Nossa um sonho caminhar nesta regi√£o. Tantos pr√©dios, quanta hist√≥ria. Rico de arquitetura e charme. Pode ir voc√™s v√£o gostar.
translated_text: It's a dream to walk around this area. So many buildings, so much history. Rich in architecture and charm. You'll love it.

title: Muy interesante
text:
Se va desde Boston en subte. Uno puede ingresar y recorrer libremente el predio de la Universidad y entrar a algunos edificios, pero para que la visita valga la pena, lo mejor es tomar un tour guiado por estudiantes que son gratis. 
Ellos fueron entrenados para eso y van contando datos realmente interesantes e historias de la universidad que uno no conocer√≠a si recorre por su cuenta. Ademas tienen muy buena onda e informan como se hace para ingresar a la Universidad y las becas que existen.
Lo primero que hay que hacer al llegar en tren a Harvard, es arreglar la visita hay que ir a Information Center de Harvard (son cupos limitados por hora) , que no esta adentro de la Universidad sino afuera, en la esquina de una de las entradas (es todo muy chico as√≠ que es f√°cil encontrar o preguntar).
La visita dura 1 hora aproximadamente. Si tienen que esperar, se pueden recorrer un poco el pueblo que hay unos negocios con cosas y souvenirs muy divertidos y baratos (buena opci√≥n para comprar peque√±os regalos a los amigos o familiares)
translated_text:
You go from Boston by subway. You can enter and walk freely around the university grounds and enter some of the buildings, but to make the visit worthwhile, it is best to take a tour guided by students who are free.
They were trained for that and they tell really interesting facts and stories about the university that you wouldn't know if you went on your own. They are also very cool and inform you on how to get into the university and the scholarships that are available.
The first thing to do when you arrive by train to Harvard, is to arrange the visit to the Information Center of Harvard (there are limited spaces per hour), which is not inside the University but outside, in the corner of one of the entrances (it is very small so it is easy to find or ask).
The visit lasts about 1 hour. If you have to wait, you can walk around the town a little bit and there are some stores with very funny and cheap souvenirs (good option to buy small gifts for friends or family).

title: Souvenir souvenir
text: Il y a 25 ans j'ai eu la chance de passer une ann√©e √† Harvard. Ce lieu est plein d'histoire et il se d√©gage quelque chose que l'on ne peut d√©crire. C est un endroit √† voir si vous √™tes sur Boston et allez faire un tour dans le centre de Cambridge.
translated_text: 25 years ago, I was lucky enough to spend a year at Harvard. This place is full of history and there's something about it that can't be described. It's a must-see if you're in Boston, and a must-see if you're in downtown Cambridge.

title: Curso
text:

Wifi gratis na rua
√â praticamente uma cidade dentro de Boston

translated_text:
Fantastic university and wonderful location
Free wifi on the street
It's practically a city within Boston
Well wooded and organized

title: √çcone de conhecimento
text: Os pr√©dios de Harvard s√£o bonitos e bem cuidados. O campus n√£o √© t√£o majestoso quanto de outras Universidades, mas a atmosfera e o fren√©tico movimento dos estudantes a tornam muito especial
translated_text: Harvard's buildings are beautiful and well-kept. The campus is not as majestic as that of other universities, but the atmosphere and the frenetic movement of the students make it very special

title: Adriana y Julio visitaron BOSTON.
text: El 13 de abril por la tarde y con un sol radiante, visitamos la Universidad de Harvard, llegamos en el Metro, linea roja, se desciende en la estaci√≥n Harvard de la cual salimos por Church Street y encontramos una de las entradas "Johnston Gate"  ante nuestros ojos se presenta un hermoso jard√≠n rodeado de maravillosos edificios y al fondo el "University Hall" con su fachada blanca y a su costado izquierdo (seg√∫n se ingresa) la famosa estatua de John HARVARD . Luego la tantas veces vista explanada donde se realizan las ceremonias de graduaci√≥n. Visitamos tambi√©n "Widmer Library" que es la biblioteca principal de Harvard, donada por la familia Widmer en honor a su hijo Harry Widmer , licenciado en Harvard y fallecido en el naufragio del Titanic. Otros lugares para observar son "Memorial Church" se encuentra en el centro del campus hist√≥rico (se rinde homenaje a los licenciados que murieron en las  guerras mundiales) y "Memorial Hall" se levant√≥ en memoria de los graduados que lucharon por la Uni√≥n en la guerra civil. Al salir el paseo continua por Harvard Squar, √°mbito  de los estudiantes de la Universidad.
translated_text: On April 13 in the afternoon and with a radiant sun, we visited Harvard University, we arrived in the Metro, red line, we got off at the Harvard station from which we left by Church Street and found one of the entrances "Johnston Gate" before our eyes is a beautiful garden surrounded by wonderful buildings and in the background the "University Hall" with its white facade and on the left side (as you enter) the famous statue of John HARVARD. Then the often seen esplanade where the graduation ceremonies are held. We also visited "Widmer Library" which is the main library of Harvard, donated by the Widmer family in honor of their son Harry Widmer, a Harvard graduate who died in the wreck of the Titanic. Other places to observe are "Memorial Church" is located in the center of the historic campus (it pays tribute to the graduates who died in the world wars) and "Memorial Hall" was erected in memory of the graduates who fought for the Union in the Civil War. Upon leaving the campus, the walk continues through Harvard Squar, the University's student area.

title: Perfeita para passeio
text:
Harvard mundiamente conhecida por ser uma das melhores universidades do mundo e passear por seus jardins chega a ser emocionante

Harvard is known worldwide for being one of the best universities in the world and strolling through its gardens can be thrilling
On Sundays you can find some performances
There are also specialized student tours

title: Imperdible
text: La universidad de harvard esta ubicada en Cambridge, MA. Para llegar les recomiendo el subterraneo, la linea rija los dejara alli mismo. La ciudad de Cambridge merece ser recorrida y la universidad de Harvard es un must. Ver sus historicos edificios, pasar por la capillar, recorrer sus parques. Se supone que no se puede, pero si pueden ingresar a ver las clases o cualquier eduficio donde haya un resquisio, no se repriman, valdra la pena. Tambien justifica el tour, esta el gratuito, a la gorra, el que alumnos de Harvard y mas opciones disponibles en Harvard Square. Conocer una de las mejores universidades de USA es una evento en si mismo.
translated_text: Harvard University is located in Cambridge, MA. To get there I recommend the subway, the rail line will drop you off right there. The city of Cambridge deserves to be visited and Harvard University is a must. See its historic buildings, go through the chapel, walk through its parks. You are not supposed to, but if you can get in to see the classrooms or any building where there is a resquisition, don't hold back, it will be worth it. It also justifies the tour, there is the free, capped, Harvard alumni and more options available in Harvard Square. Visiting one of the best universities in the USA is an event in itself.

title: Me encanto
text: Disfrute mucho de este viaje , hicimos un city tour , y vi,os muchos lugares hermosos y encantadores , que ciudad m√°s hermosa, definitivamente volver√≠a, para realmente conocerla m√°s.
translated_text: I really enjoyed this trip, we did a city tour, and I saw many beautiful and charming places, what a beautiful city, I would definitely come back, to really get to know it more.

title: Vivi um sonho
text: Estudei nesta universidade e senti como estar em um filme todo o tempo, o lugar √© lindo demais. Voltarei em breve para continuar os estudos e j√° sinto aquele cheiro √∫nico que s√≥ existe neste lugar.
translated_text: I studied at this university and I felt like I was in a movie all the time, the place is so beautiful. I'll be back soon to continue my studies and I can already smell that unique smell that only exists in this place.

title: De pelicula, conviene el tour
text:
Acceso p√∫blico a pocas cuadras del subte desde el centro de Boston. Son 20 mins de viaje, al bajar esta lleno de locales de comidas, tiendas y el campus.
Se puede recorrer por su cuenta, pero conviene tomar alguno de los tours que se ofrecen en la puerta, es todo a pie y hay que calcular al menos 3 horas de paseo.
translated_text:
Public access to the subway a few blocks from downtown Boston. It is a 20 minute ride, and when you get off the subway it is full of food stores, stores and the campus.
You can walk around on your own, but it is advisable to take one of the tours offered at the door, it is all on foot and you have to calculate at least 3 hours of walking.

title: Gigantische campus
text: Harvard is een gigantische campus die een dorpje op zichzelf lijkt. De campus bestaat uit verschillende gebouwen uit een verschillende stijl. De gebouwen zijn van elkaar gescheiden door parkjes en wandelpaden.
translated_text: Harvard is a giant campus that seems like a village unto itself. The campus consists of several buildings of a different style. The buildings are separated by parks and walkways.

title: Bela arquitetura e um passeio no campus
text: Bem que eu gostaria de estudar la mas fui s√≥ visitar o campus. Os predios s√£o muito bonitos, eu que gosto de arquitetura, fiquei um bom tempo admirando-os. H√° um espa√ßo no centro onde food trucks se reunem e servem comida. Experimente! Muito bom!
translated_text: I would have liked to study there, but I only visited the campus. The buildings are very beautiful, and I like architecture, so I spent a long time admiring them. There's an area in the center where food trucks gather and serve food. Try it! Very good!

title: Maravilloso
text: La universidad de Harvard,una de las mas de 50 universidades de Boston,resume todo lo que uno podria so√±ar como centro de estudio.
translated_text: Harvard University, one of more than 50 universities in Boston, sums up everything one could dream of as a center of study.

text: e' una struttura ampia, che contiene diversi edifici, aule, biblioteca e quant'altro. Belli anche gli spazi verdi interni che prensentano nell'insieme una bella cornice della struttura.
translated_text: is a large facility, containing several buildings, classrooms, library and whatnot. Also beautiful are the interior green spaces, which prensent in the whole a beautiful setting of the facility.

title: visita interesante
text: lugar casi dir√≠a que obligado de ver si visitas la ciudad de Boston.Nosotros por varias razones no pudimos coger una visita guiada,que creo que hacen los mismos estudiantes, pero si que nos dimos una buena caminata por sus jardines y edificios
translated_text: For various reasons we were not able to take a guided tour, which I believe is done by the students themselves, but we did have a good walk through the gardens and buildings.

title: „Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶
text: „Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÅØ8‰∫∫„ÅÆÂ§ßÁµ±È†ò„ÇÑ100‰∫∫‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅÆ„Éé„Éº„Éô„É´Ë≥ûÂèóË≥ûËÄÖ„ÇíËº©Âá∫„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´Âàù„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÂêàË°ÜÂõΩÊù±ÈÉ®„ÅÆÂêçÈñÄÁßÅÁ´ãÂ§ßÂ≠¶8Ê†°„Åã„Çâ„Å™„Çã„Ç¢„Ç§„Éì„Éº„É™„Éº„Ç∞„ÇíÊßãÊàê„Åô„Çã1Ê†°„Åß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂõ†„Åø„Å´„Ç¢„Ç§„Éì„Éº„É™„Éº„Ç∞„Å®„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÇíÊåá„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éè„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÉâÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Ç§„Çß„Éº„É´Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Éó„É™„É≥„Çπ„Éà„É≥Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Éö„É≥„Ç∑„É´„Éô„Éã„Ç¢Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„ÉÄ„Éº„Éà„Éû„ÇπÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Éñ„É©„Ç¶„É≥Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Ç≥„Éº„Éç„É´Â§ßÂ≠¶„ÄÅ„Ç≥„É≠„É≥„Éì„Ç¢Â§ßÂ≠¶„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: Harvard University is the first American university to have produced eight presidents and more than 100 Nobel Prize winners. It is also one of the eight prestigious private universities in the eastern United States that make up the Ivy League. In case you are wondering, the Ivy League refers to the following universities. Harvard University, Yale University, Princeton University, University of Pennsylvania, Dartmouth College, Brown University, Cornell University, and Columbia University.

title: visite au coeur de la mati√©re grise.....
text: visite de l'universit√© de Harvard par l'interm√©diaire du site officiel de l'universit√©.visite gratuite,r√©alis√©e par un √©tudiant, des explications sur le fonctionnement des √©tudes,quelques monuments... le tout en 1 heure.dommage qu on ne p√©n√®tre pas dans les batiments, la visite est interressante mais reste superficielle.a faire malgr√© tout.
translated_text: visit to Harvard university via the university's official website.free visit, conducted by a student, explanations on how studies work, a few monuments... all in 1 hour.too bad we didn't go inside the buildings, the visit was interesting but superficial.worth doing in spite of everything.

title: Harvard'ƒ± ziyaret

title: A RECOIMMANDER

title: Interessante

title: Gigantisch complex van gebouwen
text: Als je Boston zegt, zeg je Harvard. Alleen al op de belangrijkste compound van Harvard staan zoveel gebouwen, dat je hier geruime tijd kunt verblijven.Zo tref je hier naast een enorme bibliotheek ook een kerkje aan. Op het terrein woont ook een aantal van de studenten .Ook buiten de campus zijn er veel schitterende gebouwen, die direct verband houden met Harvard zoals het Sanders theater met de Memorial Hall.
translated_text: When you say Boston, you say Harvard. On Harvard's main compound alone, there are so many buildings that you can spend quite some time here.For example, in addition to a huge library, you will also find a little church. On the compound also live some of the students .Also off campus there are many magnificent buildings, directly related to Harvard such as the Sanders theater with the Memorial Hall.

title: Geh√∂rt irgendwie dazu
text:
√úber den Ruf dieser Universit√§t braucht man hier nicht schreiben - jeder kennt sie. Ob sie wirklich so toll ist, k√∂nnen vermutlich nur die wenigsten bewerten.

translated_text:
There is no need to write about the reputation of this university here - everyone knows it. Whether it is really that great is probably something only very few people can judge.

The campus is clean, beautiful and definitely worth a visit. It makes you feel like you're in an American movie.
Don't forget the traffic jam on campus!
There are many good restaurants in the surrounding area.

title: Otima experiencia
text: Adorei a sensa√ß√£o de estar em Harvard. √® imenso lindo e organizado. S√≥ se informe para quando a universidade estar√° aberta. N√£o lembro o porque mas quando fui estava fechada
translated_text: I loved the feeling of being at Harvard. It's so beautiful and organized. Just make sure you know when the university is open. I can't remember why, but when I went it was closed

text: Transitar por la universidad es un paseo muy agradable en toda √©poca del a√±o. Ahora se observan muchas ardillas trepando por los √°rboles , estudiantes conversando en diferentes idiomas y muchos turistas tomando fotograf√≠as .
translated_text: Walking through the university is a very pleasant walk at any time of the year. Now there are many squirrels climbing trees, students conversing in different languages and many tourists taking pictures.

text: Os pr√©dios s√£o lindos, tudo muito limpo e organizado, mas n√£o s√£o pr√≥ximos, ent√£o √© bom se organizar para conhecer tudo o que quer, se n√£o estiver hospedado nas proximidades.
translated_text: The buildings are beautiful, everything very clean and organized, but they are not close together, so it's good to organize yourself to see everything you want to if you're not staying nearby.

title: Muito legal
text: Essa visita foi muuuito legal! Apenas se informe antes quais sao seus locais de interesse e onde eles estao localizados, pois √© tudo muito grande e nao tem muita sinaliza√ß√£o.
translated_text: This visit was very cool! Just be sure to find out beforehand what your places of interest are and where they are located, because it's all very big and there aren't many signs.

title: una mistica que se trasmite
text: al llegar a esta hermosa universidad y al ver la diversidad de personas de todo el mundo estudiando por todos lados te da ganas de empezar de nuevo, ideal para una visita a una de las mejores universidades

title: excelente!!!
text: No se pierdan la visita a la Universidad de Harvard . No hace falta pagar el tour, nosotros habiamos pagado en la direccion de turismo el tour guiado pero por problkemas de transito perdimos el turno. Inmediatamente nos acercamos a un grupo que estaba recorriendo y era un tour GRATUITO que dan los mismos estudiantes, no se como sera el tour pago , pero este fue interesantisimo , nos conto todos los detalles y pormenores que viven los estudiantes dentro de la universidad .Increible la historia de la Biblioteca . Podria escribir un monton pero voy a dejar la curiosidad sembrada para que vayan. Los estudiantes esperan a diario a los grupos en la salida del subte . ahi mismo hay mapas gratuitos con toda la guia de la Universidad y de la ciudad. No se lo pierdan!!!!
translated_text: Don't miss the visit to Harvard University. There is no need to pay for the tour, we had paid for the guided tour at the tourism office but due to traffic problems we missed our turn. We immediately approached a group that was touring and it was a FREE tour given by the students themselves, I don't know how the paid tour will be, but this was very interesting, they told us all the details and details that the students live inside the university, incredible the history of the Library. I could write a lot but I will leave the curiosity sown for you to go. The students wait daily for the groups at the exit of the subway. There are free maps with all the guide of the University and the city. Don't miss it!!!!

title: Ber√ßo de mentes brilhantes

title: Ber√ßo de cultura
text: Espetacular o campo da Universidade de Harvard , belos jardins , e pr√©dios magn√≠ficos . √ìtima biblioteca e museus .Grandiosa . Muitos Presidentes Americanos l√° estudaram .

translated_text: The university is open to the public, but you can also pay for a more professional tour to get to know the place. There's plenty of space and there are always families there at weekends enjoying a break with their children.

title: como en las peliculas
text: Lo primero que puedo decir es que Hardard University es tal cual se ve en las pel√≠culas. Tuve la oportunidad de recorrer todos sus recovecos, plazas, espacios p√∫blicos, capillas, edificios emblem√°ticos renombrados y concluyo que es un espacio m√°gico, que hace que uno no tenga ganas de irse de aca. Sentarse en un banco y ver la gente pasar no tiene precio. Algo imperdible que no puede dejar de visitarse en Boston!
translated_text: The first thing I can say is that Hardard University is just as it looks in the movies. I had the opportunity to walk through all its nooks and crannies, squares, public spaces, chapels, renowned landmark buildings and I conclude that it is a magical place, which makes you not want to leave here. Sitting on a bench and watching the people go by is priceless. An absolute must-see in Boston!

title: Sinta-se num filme
text: N√£o h√° mto o que fazer em Harvard al√©m de encontrar o John Harvard e tirar algumas fotos no jardim com os tradicionais e famosos pr√©dios de tijolinhos atras. Mas TEM que ir! Tem um clima mto bacana! Se tiver sorte de estar aqui nas √©pocas mais quentes e ensolaradas pode ainda curtir o jardim para uma leitura despreocupada!
translated_text: There's not much to do at Harvard apart from meeting John Harvard and taking some photos in the garden with the traditional and famous brick buildings behind. But you MUST go! It's got a great atmosphere! If you're lucky enough to be here in the warmer, sunnier seasons, you can even enjoy the garden for a leisurely read!

title: Un imperdible en Boston
text: Sin duda Harvard es un lugar que no puedes dejar de visitar en Boston, fu√© una experiencia maravillosa recorrer sus calles sintiendo el ambiente universitario, lo recomiendo absolutamente, puedes llegar caminando o en metro.
translated_text: Undoubtedly Harvard is a place you can not miss in Boston, it was a wonderful experience to walk through its streets feeling the university atmosphere, I absolutely recommend it, you can walk or take the subway.

title: Storica istituzione
text: Vale la pena visitare i giardini calpestati da innumerevoli studenti pieni di ansie e gioie per il loro futuro! Probabilmente anche da qualche premio Nobel! Ambiente da campus universitario americano! In una delle piazzette del Campus c'√® la famosa statua di sir Harvard con un piede pi√π lucido perch√© accarezzato dagli studenti e dai visitatori.
translated_text: It is worth visiting the gardens trodden by countless students full of anxieties and joys for their future! Probably even by some Nobel laureates! American university campus environment! In one of the small squares of the campus is the famous statue of Sir Harvard with a shinier foot because it is stroked by students and visitors.

title: Distinto
text: Nos metimos en la Universidad y la recorrimos todo lo que nos dejaron, obviamente algunos lugares eran solo permitidos a estudiantes.
translated_text: We got into the University and walked around as much as they would let us, obviously some places were only allowed to students.

title: Melhor faculdade do mundo
text: Amei o campus da faculdade, apesar de n√£o termos acesso a varios lugares, como o refeitorio e a biblioteca que s√£o fechado penas para alunos. Vale muito apena conhecer
translated_text: I loved the campus, although we didn't have access to many places, such as the cafeteria and the library, which are closed to students only. It's really worth a visit

title: Da vedere
text: Ne vale la pena gi√† solo per vedere i parchi dell'universit√†, sono enormi, pieni di scoiattoli che corrono qua e l√† sugli alberi. Il tour che abbiamo fatto noi si ha permesso anche di entrare all'interno di alcuni edifici e di ascoltare la storia dell'universit√†. D'obbligo per i maturandi toccare il piede della statua seduta al centro di uno dei parchi!
translated_text: It is worth it just to see the university parks alone; they are huge, full of squirrels running here and there in the trees. The tour we took also allowed ourselves to go inside some of the buildings and hear about the history of the university. A must for mature students to touch the foot of the statue sitting in the middle of one of the parks!

title: La mejor del mundo
text: A s√≥lo 10 minutos de Boston, viajando en el metro,  vale la pena visitar el campus y tratar de curiosear sus instalaciones y, en tiempo de clases, ser testigos de las actividades estudiantiles. Sus edificios son ic√≥nicos y en su vecindad  se encuentran numerosas tiendas que venden indumentaria aleg√≥rica. La mas surtida es la Harvard Cooperative Society (The Coop) situada exactamente frente a Harvard Square,
translated_text: Only 10 minutes away from Boston, traveling by subway, it is worth visiting the campus and trying to browse its facilities and, during class time, witnessing student activities. Its buildings are iconic and in the vicinity are numerous stores selling allegorical clothing. The most well-stocked is the Harvard Cooperative Society (The Coop) located right in front of Harvard Square,

title: W√ºrde auch gerne dort studieren ;)
text: Harvard ist noch eine Spur besser, als man es sich vorstellt. Wir nahmen eine von Studenten gemachte F√ºhrung  - diese w√ºrde ich nur empfehlen, einfach so durchschlendern ist es das sch√∂ne, historische Pl√§tzchen einfach nicht wert. Wirklich interessant, was die Studenten so zu erz√§hlen haben, nat√ºrlich w√§ren ein paar Englisch- Kenntnisse von vorteil, aber ich denke, die sprechen verschiedene Sprachen- unsere sprach auch sehr gut franz√∂sisch.
translated_text: Harvard is even better than you might imagine. We took a guided tour given by students - I would highly recommend this, just strolling through this beautiful, historic place is simply not worth it. Really interesting what the students have to say, of course a little knowledge of English would be an advantage, but I think they speak different languages - ours also spoke very good French.

title: Must go

title: Icono

La m√°s famosa

The most famous
What college student wouldn't want to visit this prestigious university. With limited access for visitors, you can take tours of the campus and free walking tours offered by the locals. You can also sneak into several of its buildings to browse the classrooms and libraries.

translated_text: You can feel the atmosphere of an American university. It was just the season of admission, so there were many families visiting. Unlike Japanese universities, the general public can freely enter the campus, so the plaza inside the campus was full of people who seemed to be tourists, and I was able to interact with them by taking their commemorative photos and having them taken.

title: se pueden visitar algunas areas de la universidad
text: Caminando en tre estudiantes y profesores, se pueden visitar ciertas areas del complejo.  Es un sitio emblematico en Boston.

There was a graduation ceremony on the day, so it was really cool to see the students going to the ceremony. Well worth a visit!

title: A faculdade
text: Campus aberto para a visita√ß√£o. Quem est√° em Boston consegui ir at√© l√° de metro. Regi√£o muito boa para que curte uma agita√ß√£o a noite ( em frente a faculdade h√° diversos bares com um pessoal super jovem).Campus muito bonito com suas famosas paredes de tijolo vermelho.
translated_text: Campus open to visitors. If you're in Boston, you can get there by subway. It's a very good area for those who enjoy a night out (in front of the college there are several bars with very young people).Very beautiful campus with its famous red brick walls.

title: De pel√≠cula
text: Apenas sal√≠s del subte te sent√≠s en una pel√≠cula. Fuera de √©poca, eso s√≠. A pesar de la tecnolog√≠a de avanzada y el status innegable de tama√±an instituci√≥n, la fachada de los edificios y las estructuras hacen que uno se sienta en otra sinton√≠a. Bueno...yo tambi√©n ansiaba mucho conocer este sitio!
translated_text: As soon as you get out of the subway you feel like you are in a movie. Out of time, that's for sure. Despite the advanced technology and the undeniable status of the institution, the facade of the buildings and the structures make you feel in another tune. Well...I was looking forward to seeing this place too!

title: Maravilhosa
text: Visitar Harvard √© uma experi√™ncia maravilhosa! Al√©m de ser uma das faculdades de maior prest√≠gio dos EUA, o campus, que √© espalhado, √© incr√≠vel! As salas de aula, estilo audit√≥rio, as bibliotecas, em especial a da Law School, os alojamentos, as lojas e lanchonetes, nos transportam a cenas s√≥ vistas em filmes. Amei!
translated_text: Visiting Harvard is a wonderful experience! As well as being one of the most prestigious colleges in the USA, the sprawling campus is incredible! The auditorium-style classrooms, the libraries, especially that of the Law School, the residence halls, the stores and cafeterias, transport us to scenes only seen in movies. I loved it!

title: Un lugar lleno de historia
text: Maravillosas instalaciones que te remontan a peliculas de toda la vida! saber que futuros due√±os del mundo estan estudiando ahi es fascinante!!

title: Merece una visita. El campus tiene un aire muy londinense.
text:

Excellent ride. Pronounced contrast with MIT - much more modern.
It is advisable to do it in good weather to make the most of the gardens.

translated_text: It was great to see the university! It's really beautiful and very well organized. With little shops selling Harvard's own products. I loved it.

text: Mooie campus die - op het hart van de campus na - opgaat in de rest van de stad. Erg leuk. Gewoon even heengaan.

title: Havard ist einen Abstecher wert!
text:
Auch wenn man die meisten Geb√§ude als Tourist gar nicht betreten darf, sollte man der altehrw√ºrdigen Havard-University einen Besuch abstatten.

translated_text:
Even if you are not allowed to enter most of the buildings as a tourist, you should pay a visit to the venerable Havard University.
The park alone, in which the old buildings are located, is worth the detour!
We were lucky in that the Medal of Honor recipients were having their annual meeting at Havard when we were there.....

title: –ü—Ä–æ–≥—É–ª–∫–∞

text: Rien que pour dire "je suis all√©e √† Harvard, √ßa vaut le coup de prendre le m√©tro pour entrer sur le campus de cette universit√©. translated_text: Just to say "I've been to Harvard", it's worth taking the metro to enter the Harvard campus. A corner at the entrance is open to singers and musicians who you can listen to (or not) with a distracted ear. So it's an activity just out of curiosity, but the area itself is interesting, with a great bookshop and a nice little restaurant.

√Ä faire si vous passez √† Cambridge!

In the end, it's not very big, but you can feel that everything is steeped in history, from the buildings to the little streets to the park full of squirrels!

A must-see if you're ever in Cambridge!

text: Si vas a Boston y no vas a conocer este centro universitario, no fuiste a Boston. Increible lugar, lleno de estudiantes con universidades majestuosas.

title: Incr√≠vel
text:

N√£o √© poss√≠vel entrar nos pr√©dios da universidade (o acesso s√≥ √© permitido para estudantes de l√°), mas pode-se passear. √â muito legal ver os estudantes praticando esportes, estudando e curtindo a vida nas rep√∫blicas de l√°. A regi√£o vive no clima de Harvard, em todos os lugares vendem-se bon√©s e camisetas com o nome da universidade estampado.
H√° como contratar tours tamb√©m, que duram cerca de uma hora. Quando fui, cheguei tarde, ent√£o n√£o deu. Custam cerca de 10 d√≥lares por pessoa. Mesmo n√£o participando do tour, n√£o senti falta, pois o passeio foi muito interessante.
√â incr√≠vel estar em uma das melhores universidades do mundo!
translated_text:
It was sensational! The campus is very beautiful, well-kept and large. You can't enter the university buildings (access is only allowed to students from there), but you can wander around. It's really cool to see the students playing sports, studying and enjoying life in the residence halls. The area is very much in the Harvard mood, with caps and T-shirts with the university's name emblazoned on them being sold everywhere.
You can also hire tours, which last about an hour. When I went, I arrived late, so I couldn't make it. They cost around 10 dollars per person. Even though I didn't take part in the tour, I didn't miss it as it was very interesting.
It's incredible to be at one of the best universities in the world!

translated_text: On campus, the buildings, students, professors, and Harvard all look great. I recommend going in the fall when the leaves are beautiful.

title: Impresionante
text: Es un lugar maravilloso, lleno de magia, no s√© como explicarlo. Si est√°n en Boston no se lo pierdan, es todo maravilloso

title: Incontournable
text:
On ne peut aller √† Boston sans se rendre sur le campus d'Harvard, tr√®s agr√©able pour se poser un instant et regarder les √©tudiants jouer au frisbee quand on a crapahut√© √† travers toute la ville toute la journ√©e. 
La biblioth√®que est tr√®s belle. Certaines visites avec guides en fran√ßais sont possibles mais payantes; mais on peut tout √† fait se balader √† travers le campus librement du moment que l'on respecte la tranquillit√© des lieux. 
Petit passage √† la boutique de souvenirs de l'autre c√¥t√© de la rue et ensuite on profite des rayons de soleil qui filtrent encore pour prendre un caf√© en terrasse. 
Le quartier est tr√®s dynamique.
translated_text:
You can't go to Boston without visiting the Harvard campus, where you can relax for a while and watch the students play Frisbee after climbing all over the city all day.
The library is beautiful. Some tours with French-speaking guides are available, but you'll have to pay for them. But you're perfectly free to wander around the campus as long as you respect the peace and quiet.
After a quick stop at the souvenir store across the street, we take advantage of the sunshine still filtering through to enjoy a coffee on the terrace.
The area is very lively.

title: sitio obligado
text: LA historia de esta instituci√≥n supera muchas instituciones con mas visitantes al a√±o en el mundo. Los prados son espectaculares y a pesar de que la visit√© de noche el ambiente estudiantil de la zona lo hace muy especial.
translated_text: The history of this institution surpasses many institutions with more visitors per year in the world. The lawns are spectacular and although I visited at night, the student atmosphere of the area makes it very special.

title: Universitas terkemuka di dunia
text: Belum lengkap perjalanan ke USA jika belum mampir ke Universitas Harvard,didirikan sejak 1636 banyak tokoh terkemuka dunia merupakan lulusan Universitas ini.Berjalan berkeliling membayangkan andai anak saya nanti bisa bersekolah di sini ...
translated_text: It's not a complete trip to the USA if you haven't stopped by Harvard University, established since 1636 many of the world's leading figures are graduates of this University. Walking around imagining if my child will be able to go to school here ...

translated_text:
pleasant and interesting if you pay attention to the students who tell you the history (and stories) of Harvard - in exchange for a tip, of course.
a good walk.
definitely worth the effort.

title: De peliculas

translated_text: You could say it should be a must-see for those passing through Boston, MA or passing through New England. The courtyard of the University, where the statue of Harvard is located, is a must for a souvenir photo. The only bad thing is that there are no guided tours in Spanish, since it is a place so visited by people from all over the world and Spanish is one of the main languages.

title: Legend√§rer Ort!
text:
Wir k√∂nnen die F√ºhrung durch Studenten nur empfehlen. Mit Anekdoten von "aktiven" Studenten macht der Gang √ºber den Campus doppelt so viel Spa√ü.

We can only recommend the guided tour by students. With anecdotes from "active" students, walking around the campus is twice as much fun.
At Yale, we were at the wrong time for a tour, but thankfully at Harvard, tours take place every hour!

title: Interessante
text: Carino fare un giro. Si possono visitare solo gli spazi esterni,  non si pu√≤ visitate internamente la struttura. √à possibile anche la visita guidata, noi l'abbiamo fatta, √® carina per capire meglio la storia di questa importante universit√†:preparatevi bene con l'inglese perch√© i ragazzi di Harvard parlano molto veloce, non vi aspettate di vedere gli interni perch√© anche con la visita guidata il giro √® solo all'esterno degli edifici.
translated_text: Nice to take a tour. You can only visit the outdoor spaces, you can't visit inside the facility. Guided tour is also possible, we did it, it is nice to understand more about the history of this important university:be well prepared with English because Harvard guys speak very fast, don't expect to see the interior because even with the guided tour the tour is only outside the buildings.

text:

Ëøë„Åè„Å´„ÅØMIT„ÇÑ„Éê„Éº„ÇØ„É¨„ÉºÈü≥Ê•ΩÂ≠¶Ê†°„Å™„Å©„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text:
We toured Harvard University, where the leaves on the trees have turned color, to get a feel for a well-established university, the world's most difficult university to enter and graduate from.
The annual tuition is something like 8 million yen and up. This one is also top-notch.
Nearby are MIT and the Berkeley School of Music.

title: Fantastica Esperienza
text: Cambridge ospita una delle pi√π importanti Universit√† del mondo, Harvard. Un luogo ricco di storia e cultura. Gli edifici sono recenti ma vale la pena enterare per visitare il luogo dal quale sono usciti grandi premi Nobel. Grazie ad un mio amico che studia l√¨ siamo riusciti ad entrare nella biblioteca e nelle aule studio. Lo studio di Sr. Harvard √© visitabile liberamente. C'√® anche uno shop dove poter acquistare gadget del brand. Consigliato!
translated_text: Cambridge is home to one of the most important universities in the world, Harvard. A place rich in history and culture. The buildings are recent but it is worth entering to visit the place from which great Nobel Prize winners have come. Thanks to a friend of mine who studies there we were able to enter the library and study rooms. Sr. Harvard's study is free to visit. There is also a shop where you can buy gadgets of the brand. Recommended!

title: Cultura e storia
text:
Una tappa a Cambridge per visitare Harvard ci sta.
Passeggiare per i vicoletti dei campus, sostare sulla scalinata della biblioteca , e se si √© fortunato come noi, assistere anche ai festeggiamenti di neo laureati, rende un pomeriggio pi√π soft e disteso rispetto alla citt√†.
Gruppi musicali popolano le piazzette esterne...e numerosi locali sempre pieni.
translated_text:
A stop in Cambridge to visit Harvard fits in.
Strolling the narrow campus alleys, pausing on the steps of the library , and if you are lucky like us, even witnessing the celebrations of recent graduates, makes for a softer, more relaxed afternoon than in the city.
Musical groups populate the small squares outside...and numerous clubs always full.

title: Fort agr√©able  - vaut une longue visite
text: Nous avons visit√© le campus de Harvard en fin de journ√©e un samedi de novembre, alors que la nuit tombait.  En plus d'√™tre embl√©matique de la soci√©t√© am√©ricaine hupp√©e et d'√™tre la r√©f√©rence dans nombre de films am√©ricains c√©l√®bres, ce campus a un charme ind√©niable, par ses vieux b√¢timents patin√©s par le temps,  ses parcs ombrag√©s aux arbres majestueux, par sa faune jeune et anim√©e, et par le quartier environnant tout aussi charmant.  Nous regrettons juste de n'y avoir pas assez consacr√© de temps et de ne pas avoir pu visit√© sa c√©l√®bre biblioth√®que et autres b√¢timents.
translated_text: We visited the Harvard campus late one Saturday in November, just as it was getting dark.  As well as being emblematic of upmarket American society and the setting for a number of famous American films, this campus has an undeniable charm, with its old buildings weathered by time, its shady parks with majestic trees, its young and lively fauna, and its equally charming surrounding neighborhood.  Our only regret is that we didn't spend enough time there, and didn't get to visit its famous library and other buildings.

title: Passeio muito bom
text: Local muito bonito, limpo, organizado, repleto de jovens e com um astral muito bom. Podemos fazer visitas sempre externas. N√£o √© permitido entrar nos pr√©dios. Vale a pena conhecer e tirar uma foto na famosa est√°tua de John Harvard para manter a tradi√ß√£o.
translated_text: The place is very beautiful, clean, organized, full of young people and with a very good atmosphere. We can always visit from outside. You are not allowed inside the buildings. It's worth visiting and taking a photo of the famous statue of John Harvard to maintain the tradition.

title: Traumhafte Studienumgebung
text:
Wundersch√∂ne gesch√ºtzte und gepflegte Anlage und Geb√§ude.
Man f√ºhlt sich wieder jung. Gute offene Abendveranstaltungen.
translated_text:
Beautifully protected and well-kept grounds and buildings.
Makes you feel young again. Good open evening events.

title: Encore plus belle en automne
text: Un lieu mythique √† visiter de pr√©f√©rence guid√© par un √©tudiant qui vous racontera l'histoire de cette prestigieuse universit√© et plein d'autres anecdotes.
translated_text: A mythical place to visit, preferably guided by a student who will tell you the history of this prestigious university and lots of other anecdotes.

title: Ein Ort um ins Schw√§rmen zu geraten
text:
Vielen Jahre haben wir unser immer gew√ºnscht einmal nach Harvard zu kommen.

Dieser Ort ist wirklich etwas Besonders - wandeln auf den Spuren alter Universit√§tsgeschichte.

Wir haben einen kurzen Rundgang √ºber den alten Campus von Harvard gemacht und uns zu diesem Zweck eine Auditor auf das iPhone geladen. 

Es war ein wirklich sehr lobenswertes Ausflug und jeder sollte sich die Zeit f√ºr diese au√üergew√∂hnliche Universit√§t g√∂nnen.
translated_text:
For many years we have always wanted to come to Harvard.

This place is really something special - walking in the footsteps of ancient university history.

We took a short tour of the old Harvard campus and downloaded an Auditor onto our iPhone for this purpose.

It was a really commendable trip and everyone should make time for this extraordinary university.

title: Beautiful campus
text: Un recorrido por estructuras fascinantes, historia y un ambiente tranquilo (hice el recorrido s√°bado).  La experiencia es extraordinaria.
translated_text: A tour of fascinating structures, history and a quiet atmosphere (I did the tour on Saturday).  The experience is extraordinary.

title: unica
text: finalmente realizzo il mio sogno fin da quando sono piccola... posto incantevole, uguale a come si vede nei film. si vede che √® una delle migliori universit√† americane e che √® privata in quanto ogni minomo dettaglio √® curato e ben tenuto. in una parola: incantevole
translated_text: I finally realize my dream since I was a little girl.... enchanting place, the same as you see in the movies. you can see that it is one of the best American universities and that it is private in that every tiny detail is taken care of and well maintained. in a word: enchanting

title: –ì–∞—Ä–≤–∞—Ä–¥-—ç—Ç–æ –ì–∞—Ä–≤–∞—Ä–¥!
translated_text: Harvard is Harvard! To be honest, if I hadn't seen UC Berkeley, Wellesley College and MIT before, I would have been more impressed with Harvard, but that doesn't diminish Harvard's charm. I liked the cute old buildings, the large green space where you can relax and not be rushed anywhere. Compared to MIT, Harvard is less open university, but nevertheless, even here I managed to get to one of some lectures:-) Definitely worth a visit!

title: L'Universit√†
text: Sicuramente uno dei posto pi√π volte abbiamo sentito parlare oppure visto in tanti film. Vederlo dal vivo ed entrare nelle aule fa un effetto strano. Indubbiamente √® un centro storico e culturale del paese. Tanta cultura in mezzo a tanta natura.
translated_text: Definitely one of the place more times we have heard about or seen in many movies. Seeing it live and entering the classrooms has a strange effect. Undoubtedly it is a historical and cultural center of the country. So much culture in the midst of so much nature.

title: Come un luogo della conoscenza pu√≤ essere magico
text:
Il campus si raggiunge facilmente, c'√® la fermata del metr√≤ in Harvard square.
Gli edifici delle varie facolt√† non sono visitabili, ma una passeggiata nei giardini in una bella giornata di sole pu√≤ essere veramente gratificante. Gli edifici in mattoni rossi, i prati curatissimi, gli alberi (rossi in autunno) sono un paesaggio rilassante ed al tempo stesso entusiasmante, pensando che ti trovi in una delle pi√π famose e prestigiose universit√† al mondo. Sembra che qui la storia abbia preso pi√π spessore di quello che gli anni le attribuiscono...
translated_text:
The campus is easily reached; there is a subway stop at Harvard square.
The buildings of the various faculties cannot be visited, but a walk in the gardens on a nice sunny day can be really rewarding. The red brick buildings, manicured lawns, and trees (red in the fall) make for a relaxing yet exciting landscape, thinking that you are at one of the most famous and prestigious universities in the world. It seems that history has taken on more depth here than the years give it credit for....

title: Harvard, che emozione!!!!
text: Abbiamo avuto il grande piacere di vedere l'Universit√† di Harvard durante la nostra escursione giornaliera a Boston. E' una delle pi√π prestigiose in America, e questo lo si capisce facilmente visitandola. √à ben conservata e curata nei minimi dettagli. Gli esterni sono molto belli e vale la pena visitarli se ci si trova a Boston anche solo per un giorno. E' l'universit√† privata pi√π antica e ambita degli Stati Uniti ed √® stata frequentata infatti anche da volti famosi del mondo politico. E' stata un'emozione forte passare nei vialetti di questo famoso polo univeritario, che abbiamo visto tante volte nei film americani e che finalmente abbiamo potuto vedere di perrsona. Comodo da raggiungere dal centro di Boston con la metro.
translated_text: We had the great pleasure of seeing Harvard University during our day trip to Boston. It is one of the most prestigious in America, and this is easily understood by visiting it. It is well preserved and well cared for in every detail. The exteriors are very beautiful and worth visiting if you are in Boston even for a day. It is the oldest and most coveted private university in the United States and has in fact been attended even by famous faces in the political world. It was a powerful thrill to walk through the driveways of this famous university hub, which we have seen so many times in American movies and finally got to see in person. Convenient to reach from downtown Boston by subway.

title: Campus muito bonito
text: O campus e muito bonito. Fica bem pr√≥ximo de Boston. E so pegar a linha vermelha do metr√¥ sentido Alewife. Em caso de visita a Boston vale a visita
translated_text: The campus is very beautiful. It's very close to Boston. Just take the red subway line to Alewife. If you're visiting Boston, it's worth a visit

title: Espectacular
text:
Es como volver al pasado, la universidad es de estilo inglesa y tiene una personalidad √∫nica. Ubicada relativamente cerca del centro de Boston pero para llegar all√° es mejor tomar el metro, l√≠nea roja.
Una visita obligatoria si se visita Boston
translated_text:
It is like going back in time, the university is English style and has a unique personality. Located relatively close to downtown Boston but to get there it is best to take the subway, red line.
A must-see if you visit Boston

title: Visita obligada si uno va a Boston
text: Desde el centro de Boston se llega en menos de media hora. La univeridad se extiende por una zona muy amplia con distintos edificios. Algunos que se pueden visitar. Otros para espiar la vida de los estudiantes en la universidad m√°s famosa de todas.
translated_text: It takes less than half an hour to get there from downtown Boston. The university is spread over a large area with several buildings. Some you can visit. Others to spy on the life of the students at the most famous university of all.

translated_text:
Unlike in Korea, there was no clear distinction between the school and the outside space. As I walked around, I found myself inside the school.
The buildings and gardens are integrated and the whole school is like one big park.
There are a lot of foreign tourists (Western and Eastern) and people from all over the United States come to see the school.
In Korea, the school is literally just a place to study, but here, there is a lot of symbolism (representing the United States) that is added to the place of study.

title: leve seus filhos
text: Visitar uma universidade linda e bem conceituada sempre √© bom para levar filhos adolescentes. O lugar √© lindo e estimulante!!
translated_text: Visiting a beautiful, well-regarded university is always a good idea for taking teenage children. The place is beautiful and stimulating!

title: Hay que vivirlo...
text:
Es una universidad con much√≠sima historia, los edificios son muy bonitos y en los jardines/patios puedes observar muchos estudiantes tomando el sol y jugando.
Definitivamente tienes que visitar este lugar y caminar much√≠simo.
translated_text:
It is a university with a lot of history, the buildings are very beautiful and in the gardens/patios you can see many students sunbathing and playing.
You definitely have to visit this place and walk around a lot.

title: Simplemente hay que verla
text: Lo que vi de esta universidad en concreto fue la parte del Magister del School of Business, que bien vale tu visita, esta un poco apartada del resto de las demas  escuelas de la Universidad, pero es parte de Cambridge, la salas de estudio, la bibilioteca y todo lo que vi es realmente impresionante, es realmente un modelo academico de excelencia que pocos pueden llegar alli,  por lo economico, pero especialmente por lo academico.  Los comedores ( hay mas de uno) parecen restaurantes de primera categoria, y los edificios esta conecyados por tuneles subterraneos para no tener que salir en caso de mal tiempo o mucha nieve.
translated_text: What I saw of this university in particular was the Magister part of the School of Business, which is well worth your visit, it is a little apart from the rest of the other schools of the University, but it is part of Cambridge, the study rooms, the library and everything I saw is really impressive, it is really an academic model of excellence that few can get there, economically, but especially for the academics.  The dining rooms (there are more than one) look like first class restaurants, and the buildings are connected by subway tunnels so you don't have to go out in case of bad weather or heavy snow.

title: Espet√°culo !
text: Fizemos um tour de 1 horas guiado por alunos.  Bel√≠ssimo Campus.  Visita obrigat√≥ria para quem a Boston.  √â um lugar rico em historia e bastante inspirador.
translated_text: We took a 1-hour tour led by students.  Beautiful campus.  A must for anyone visiting Boston.  It's a place rich in history and very inspiring.

title: Emocionante
text: Estar en la Universidad de Harvard fue muy interesante. Decididamente me hubiera gustado estudiar ah√≠.
translated_text: Being at Harvard University was very interesting. I definitely would have liked to study there.

title: Pr√≥ximo do conhecimento
text: Emocionante estar pr√≥ximo do conhecimento desta destacada universidade do mundo onde varios personages passaram por l√° inclusive os criadores do Facebook em fato mais recente.  Tem um passeio guiado por alunos da universidade que contam sua hist√≥ria e descrevem os espa√ßos e pr√©dios principais . N√£o se entra em espa√ßo universit√°rio nenhum mas seu contorno j√° vale a pena .
translated_text: It's a thrill to get to know this world-renowned university, where many people have passed through, including the creators of Facebook in recent years.  There is a guided tour by students from the university who tell its history and describe the main spaces and buildings. You don't go inside any of the university buildings, but it's worth a look.

title: Ehrf√ºrchtiger Campus
text: Spaziergang √ºber den Campus mit John Harvard Statue als Gr√ºnder, leider kein Zugang zur Library, aber eindrucksvolle alte Architektur. Nebenan dann L√§den, wo man passende Hoodies und B√ºcher erwerben kann. Lohnenswert, mit Auto zu P&R und mit T-Linie nach Harvard.
translated_text: Walk across the campus with the John Harvard statue as founder, unfortunately no access to the library, but impressive old architecture. Next door there are stores where you can buy matching hoodies and books. Worthwhile, by car to P&R and by T-line to Harvard.

translated_text: Founded in 1636, it is the oldest university in the United States. I took a campus tour led by a Harvard student. I was overwhelmed by the scale of the campus, which is far removed from the Japanese concept of a university, including the statue of John Harvard, the spacious lawn, and the elaborate colonial-style school buildings. For souvenirs, I recommend the Co-op, which has a wide selection of original goods.

title: Um choque de hist√≥ria e tradi√ß√£o
text: a universidade de harvard te leva a um tour pela historia do proprio Pa√≠s. o clima sempre agrad√°vel, e o Jardim da universidade convidam a uaconchegante e maravilhoso passeio pela. eu ficava encantado e vendo os esquilos passando junto as pessoas.. vale a pena.
translated_text: harvard university takes you on a tour of the history of the country itself. the climate is always pleasant, and the university garden invites you to a cozy and wonderful walk through it. i was enchanted by the squirrels passing by. it's worth it.

title: Emcionada por trilhar o caminhar do Futuro!
text:
Harvard √© M√°gica e encantadora!
Passear pelos jardins de Radcliffe. Respirar a cultura, o passado , o presente nos d√° o que esperar do futuro!
translated_text:
Harvard is magical and enchanting!
Stroll through Radcliffe Gardens. Breathing in the culture, the past, the present gives us something to look forward to in the future!

title: Local muito bonito
text: Recomendado! Arquitetura muito bonita e muitas op√ß√µes para alimenta√ß√£o. Vale muito a pena conhecer esta universidade.
translated_text: Recommended! Beautiful architecture and plenty of food options. This university is well worth a visit.

title: Harvard situata a Cambridge merita una visita anche se si √® a Boston !
text: Eravamo a Boston ma abbiamo deciso di visitare Cambridge che si collega a Boston con dei "bridges" (ponti). translated_text: We were in Boston but decided to visit Cambridge which is connected to Boston by "bridges" (bridges). There is a beautiful air on the most prestigious university campus in the United States ! One can go to the info point and ask for guided tours from the students or buy an illustrated brochure of the various buildings and departments, both with historical and current references.

text: Estuve paseando por el patio y por algunos salones y es realmente linda. Muchas construcciones y esculturas bastante bonitas.

title: Tr√®s jolie

title: Imposible no ir!
text: Visitar Harvard es ir a un lugar emblem√°tico a nivel mundial. Puedes pasar por el campus y tomarte una foto con la estatua de John Harvard.
translated_text: To visit Harvard is to go to a worldwide landmark. You can walk through the campus and have your picture taken with the statue of John Harvard.

title: Juste wow !
text: Quel endroit magnifique !  √Ä visiter sans faute lors de votre visite √† Boston !  Les √©difices sont de toute beaut√© !  Plusieurs varieties d'arbres majestueux !
translated_text: What a magnificent place!  A must-see on your visit to Boston!  Beautiful buildings!  Many varieties of majestic trees!

text: Lieux de l√©gende du savoir, le cadre est superbe. Dans les couleurs d'automne voir tous ses √©tudiants d√©ambulant dans le parc avec ses fameuses chaises multicolores est un r√©gal.
translated_text: A legendary place of learning, the setting is superb. In the autumn colors, to see all these students strolling through the park with its famous multicolored chairs is a treat.

translated_text: Harvard Yard is open to the public during the day, so it's a great place for anyone to stop by. My friends say it's beautiful every time they visit. Be sure to take a photo in front of the statue and the library and stop by Memorial Hall.

title: Universidade dos sonhos
text: A Universidade √© um prato cheio pros academicos ou at√© mesmo pra qualquer um. Existe um tour gratuito e guiado que √© feito pelos proprios alunos. Pra ir no tour n√£o tem como reservar, tem que chegar no centro de informa√ß√µes de Harvard e aguardar, tem turmas de 20 em 20 min pelo que lembro. Vale muito a visita, pode-se entrar em uma das alas e ver o refeitorio, muito parecido com Hogwarts do Harry Potter! Ameei
translated_text: The university is a great place for academics or just about anyone. There is a free guided tour which is run by the students themselves. To go on the tour you can't book, you have to go to the Harvard information center and wait, there are classes every 20 minutes as far as I remember. It's well worth a visit, you can enter one of the wings and see the cafeteria, very similar to Hogwarts from Harry Potter! I loved it
