title: Uha s√• klog man f√∏ler sig
text:
Harvard, et af USA (og verdens) topuniversiteter. Et super flot og historiesk sted et stenkast fra Boston. Der er en helt fantastisk stemning p√• stedet og det er flot bare at g√• rundt. 

Vi havde ikke valgt en guidet tur, og set fortr√∏d vi nok lidt, for dem vi s√•, l√∏d til at v√¶re meget informative. Det er studerende der guider.
translated_text:
Harvard, one of the top universities in the US (and the world). A super beautiful and historic place a stone's throw from Boston. There's a fantastic atmosphere and it's beautiful just to walk around.

We hadn't chosen a guided tour, which we regretted a bit, because the ones we saw seemed to be very informative. The guides are students.

title: muy lindo
text: la universidad de harvard, imposible no recorrerla si vas a boston, tiene un parque muy lindo, aparte que esta al lado de la estaci√≥n de metro
translated_text: harvard university, impossible not to visit it if you go to boston, it has a very nice park, and it is next to the subway station.

title: Cl√°ssico
text: Vale passear e caminhar pelos diversos pr√©dios e todo o campus de uma das universidades mais prestigiadas do mundo. V√°rias livrarias e restaurantes interessantes por perto.
translated_text: It's worth walking around the various buildings and the entire campus of one of the most prestigious universities in the world. Several interesting bookshops and restaurants nearby.

title: –£—é—Ç–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ
translated_text: When you get to the territory of Harvard University, you do not realize that you are in the very place where the future of all mankind is being created. Low brick houses, cozy courtyards, lawns with chairs. Quiet, homey atmosphere. The Harvard Monument and the church. And only the throngs of tourists remind you that this is an iconic place

title: Espetacular !
text: A Harvard University fundada por John Harvard no s√©culo XVII √© um local que inspira o estudo; gosto particularmente do pr√©dio do Departamento de Filosofia!
translated_text: Harvard University, founded by John Harvard in the 17th century, is a place that inspires study; I particularly like the Philosophy Department building!

title: Si vas a Boston no dejes de visitar Harvard University
text: Todos hemos o√≠do hablar de Harvard University y su prestigio, no dejes de visitarla cuando vayas a Boston.  Adem√°s de interesante, bonita y con un ambiente de cultura,  de turistas y de j√≥venes te inspira!!!
translated_text: We have all heard about Harvard University and its prestige, be sure to visit it when you go to Boston.  Besides interesting, beautiful and with an atmosphere of culture, tourists and young people inspires you!!!!!

title: Indispensable si estas en Boston
text: Fuimos en familia, con adolescentes, tomamos un subte desde el centro de Boston y llegamos en 15 minutos, alli tomamos un tour guiado por un ex profesor de historia de Harvard, a la gorra, es decir le dabas lo que querias al finalizar la visita, en total duro una hora aproximadamente, fue interesantisimo, nuestro guia cont√≥ muchas an√©cdotas, fue muy entretenido y educativo, lo recomiendo como experiencia.
translated_text: We went as a family, with teenagers, we took a subway from downtown Boston and arrived in 15 minutes, there we took a tour guided by a former professor of history at Harvard, at the cap, that is to say you gave him what you wanted at the end of the visit, in total lasted about an hour, it was very interesting, our guide told many anecdotes, it was very entertaining and educational, I recommend it as an experience.

title: La famosa universit√†
text: Il posto √® facilmente accessibile con la metro. Il campus √® ben tenuto e si pu√≤ girare liberamente fra i  giardini ma nulla pi√π! Ogni edificio √© accessibile solo dagli studenti o dagli addetti. Si pu√≤ visitare la cappella del campus che √© molto caratteristica e la famosa statua "delle tre bugie" di John Harvard. Vale una visita di un'oretta o poco pi√π.
translated_text: The place is easily accessible by subway. The campus is well maintained and you can walk around freely among the grounds but nothing more! Each building is accessible only by students or staff. One can visit the campus chapel which is very quaint and the famous "three lies" statue of John Harvard. It is worth a visit of an hour or so.

title: –ú–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—å –≥–æ–¥!
translated_text:
An incredible place charged with a learning atmosphere! Harvard is a great place not only to see how students live, but also to read a book in a wonderful park, take a tour with real students and even see their dining hall! It looks just like the dining hall in the famous Harry Potter, by the way!
p.s: don't forget to stop by the gift store! It's very cool!

title: √â Harvard.
text: Dizer o que do sonho de consumo dos amantes do estudo? O local √© lindo, acolhedor e relorta a um filme. √â demais. √â Harvard...
translated_text: What can you say about a study lover's dream? The place is beautiful, welcoming and reminiscent of a movie. It's too much. It's Harvard...

title: me super gusto
text: Me pareci√≥ una visita muy interesante, una vez all√≠ tomamos un tour con una estudiante, con lo cual vimos an√©cdotas muy c√≥micas que solo puede contar quien estuvo/a alli. El lugar es precioso, vale la pena visitarla.
translated_text: I found it a very interesting visit, once there we took a tour with a student, with which we saw very funny anecdotes that only those who were there can tell. The place is beautiful, it is worth a visit.

title: Un giorno nel campus
text: L'Universit√† di Harvard √® una delle pi√π importanti in America, e questo lo si capisce facilmente visitandola. √à ben curata e gestita con un'attenzione quasi maniacale per la sicurezza, infatti sono pochi gli edifici che possono essere visitati dai turisti anche all'interno. Nonostante ci√≤ gli esterni sono molto belli e vale la pena visitarli se ci si trova a Boston per qualche giorno!
translated_text: Harvard University is one of the most important in America, and this is easily understood when visiting it. It is well maintained and run with almost maniacal attention to security, in fact there are few buildings that can be visited by tourists even inside. Nevertheless, the exteriors are very beautiful and worth visiting if you are in Boston for a few days!

title: Harvard
text: Harvard es el lugar m√°s bonito de la tierra, hay que recorrerlo entero e ir a tocar la estatua de Mr Harvard.
translated_text: Harvard is the most beautiful place on earth, you have to walk all over it and go touch the statue of Mr Harvard.

title: "UM PRIVIL√âGIO PARA POUCOS"
text: Qualquer aluno que se forma numa universidade desse padr√£o h√° que ser respeitado. Primeiro porque o tempo de estudo tem que ser integral. E para isso o campus cont√©m in√∫meros pr√©dios de alojamentos. √Ä sombra dos pl√°tanos o ambiente imp√µe respeito e seriedade. O custo anual para o aluno √© de 52.000 mil d√≥lares, valor que privilegia as mais abastadas fam√≠lias do mundo inteiro, mormente as do oriente m√©dio.
translated_text: Any student who graduates from a university of this standard must be respected. First of all, they have to study full-time. And for this the campus contains numerous accommodation buildings. In the shade of the plane trees, the atmosphere commands respect and seriousness. The annual cost for a student is 52,000 dollars, a figure that favors the wealthiest families in the world, especially in the Middle East.

title: Leuk om even te kijken
text: Leuk om eens over het universiteitsterrein te wandelen. Wees wel voorbereid op heel veel toeristen..
translated_text: Nice to take a walk around the university grounds. Be prepared for lots of tourists, though.

title: Lindo campus
text: Puedes acceder por metro directamente, y entras al campus libremente, lleno areas verdes, y los alumnos reunidos en los jardines, Esta el monumento a Harvard que deberas sobar el pie, se notar√° cual es porque est√° lustroso. y fuera de la universidad diversos restaurants de toda etnia.
translated_text: You can access by subway directly, and you enter the campus freely, full of green areas, and students gathered in the gardens, there is the monument to Harvard that you should rub your foot, you will notice which one it is because it is shiny. and outside the university several restaurants of all ethnicities.

translated_text: Since I visited in the summer, there were many sightseeing tour groups. The campus is large, and in addition to the Harvard Yard plaza, there are buildings for various faculties. When we went to the science and mathematics campus at the back of the campus, the number of tourists was smaller and we could have a relaxing time.

title: Sonho dos sonhos!
text: Quem nunca sonhou mandar o filho estudar em Harvard?  Eu part√≠cula ente sonho com a escola de direito. Que tem o campus bem na entrada do complexo, que fica em Cambridge.  A cidade gira praticamente em fun√ß√£o da universidade de Harvard
translated_text: Who hasn't dreamt of sending their child to Harvard?  I often dream about the law school. Its campus is right at the entrance to the complex in Cambridge.  The city practically revolves around Harvard University

title: Excelente lugar
text: La visita a Harvard University hace del viaje a Massachusets una experiencia √∫nica ya que ciertamente tiene una gran historia y se parece a donde estudi√≥ el personaje Harry Potter. Es un buen lugar para tomar fotos muy hermosas y desayunar junto a los profesores y estudiantes de una de las m√°s famosas universidades del mundo. Todos quieren tomarse una foto en la estatua de John Harvard, pero los campus son particularmente hermosos.
translated_text: Visiting Harvard University makes the trip to Massachusetts a unique experience as it certainly has a great history and looks like where the character Harry Potter studied. It is a great place to take beautiful pictures and have breakfast with the professors and students of one of the most famous universities in the world. Everyone wants to take a picture at the statue of John Harvard, but the campuses are particularly beautiful.

title: Interesante
text: Buena visita si vas a Boston... Si bien es una pena que no se pueda entrar en muchos de los lugares de la universidad. Bueno el museo de historia natural, el √∫nico lugar donde se admit√≠an visitas el d√≠a que estuvimos.
translated_text: Good visit if you go to Boston... It's a pity that you can't get into many of the places in the university. Good the natural history museum, the only place where visitors were allowed the day we were there.

title: √â Harvard, dispensa apresenta√ß√µes!
text: Emo√ß√£o de visitar uma das primeiras universidade americana, com pr√©dios hist√≥ricos e a fama de ser uma das melhores universidades do mundo. Ainda tive a sorte de ver a cola√ß√£o de grau dos formandos de direito, com discurso, emo√ß√£o dos pais vendo os filhos se formarem, foi bem legal! Voc√™ pode baixar um aplicativo com o mapa do campus e que tem uma visita virtual com as hist√≥rias dos principais pr√©dios.
translated_text: The thrill of visiting one of the first American universities, with historic buildings and the reputation of being one of the best universities in the world. I was also lucky enough to see the graduation ceremony of the law students, with speeches and the emotion of parents watching their children graduate. You can download an app with a map of the campus and a virtual tour with the stories of the main buildings.

title: Alma acad√™mica
text: O ambiente j√° tem alma acad√™mica, cheio de livrarias, gente deslocada e informal, e os pr√©dios com a cara tradicional da regi√£o de Boston.
translated_text: The environment already has an academic soul, full of bookshops, informal people and buildings with the traditional look of the Boston area.

translated_text: It's one of the best universities in the world, so I visited it, and it's a very small campus, so it's easy to get around, and it's an old campus, so the big trees are really beautiful.

title: Ëá™Áî±„Åß„Ç¢„Ç´„Éá„Éü„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Å™Èõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„Å´„ÅÑ„Åü„Çå„Åæ„Åô
text: „ÅäÂãß„ÇÅ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Éú„Çπ„Éà„É≥„Å∏Ë°å„Å£„Åü„Çâ„Åú„Å≤Ë°å„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ‰∏≠ÂøÉ„ÅÆÂ∫ÉÂ†¥„ÅÆÂë®„Çä„Å´„ÄÅ„Åì„Çå„Åû„Ç¢„É°„É™„Ç´„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ≠¶„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÊÑü„Åò„ÅÆÂª∫Áâ©„ÅåÂ∫É„Åå„Çä„ÄÅÁ¥†Êô¥„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑÈõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„Åì„ÅßÂ≠¶„Å≥„Åü„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„Çè„Åõ„Çã„Å´ÂçÅÂàÜ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÁîüÂçîcoop„ÇÇÂ§ß„Åç„Åè„Å¶„ÅäÂúüÁî£Ë™øÈÅî„ÅØ„Åì„Åì„Åå„ÅäËñ¶„ÇÅ„ÄÇ„ÉÅ„Éß„Ç≥„É¨„Éº„Éà„ÅØÁ©∫Ê∏Ø„Çà„Çä„Åã„Å™„ÇäÂÆâ„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
translated_text: Highly recommended. If you go to Boston, you must go there. The buildings around the central plaza are spread out like an American university, and the atmosphere is wonderful. It is enough to make you want to study here. The Co-op Coop is large and I recommend this place to buy souvenirs. Chocolates were much cheaper than at the airport.

title: Excelente experiencia.
text: Visitamos el √°rea de jardines, biblioteca y dormitorios as√≠ como la capilla y la estatua del Sr. Harvard que "seg√∫n nos cont√≥ el gu√≠a, que si le tocas el zapato tu nivel de inteligencia aumenta, jeje, que se encuentra en uno de los campus de la Universidad de Harvard y la verdad que fue una experiencia √∫nica. Les recomiendo est√° visita.
translated_text: We visited the garden area, library and dormitories as well as the chapel and the statue of Mr. Harvard that "according to what the guide told us, if you touch his shoe your intelligence level increases, hehe, which is located on one of the campuses of Harvard University and the truth was a unique experience. I highly recommend this visit.

title: Una atmosfera estudiantil perfecta
text: Una maravilla de ambiente universitario. Se puede visitar tranquilamente, sus edificios y jardines son maravillosos para pasear y compartir el esp√≠ritu joven de sus estudiantes!
translated_text: A marvel of university atmosphere. You can visit it quietly, its buildings and gardens are wonderful to walk around and share the young spirit of its students!

title: BUENISIMA EXPERIENCIA.
text: Una experiencia maravillosa, pues esta Universidad es una de las m√°s antiguas del mundo. Edificios estupendos.., entre √°rboles y veredas que la circundan. Qu√© me llam√≥ la atenci√≥n? su pulcritud. Tantos estudiantes y todo tan limpio!
translated_text: A wonderful experience, as this University is one of the oldest in the world. Wonderful buildings, among trees and sidewalks that surround it. What struck me? its neatness. So many students and everything so clean!

title: Ben tenuta
text: Avendo l'hotel a Cambridge (Hampton Inn), era d'obbligo passare per Harvard University. CI siamo arrivati con l'autobus 69 che ha il capolinea vicino all'hotel e vicino alla fermata della metro verde (Lechmere). Devo dire che me la immaginavo diversa, ma √® molto bella. Pulitissima e non molro grande, si gira in un'oretta al massimo. Fuori da una delle fermate della metropolitana c'√® un chiosco di studenti dove potete trovare la mappa dell'univerit√† e, se volete, comprare una gita guidata fatta dagli studenti stessi.Noi abbiamo preferito non farla. Vi consiglio anche di non andare nel fine settimana perch√® √® tutto chiuso. Non siamo riusciti ad entrare in nessun edificio.
translated_text: Having the hotel in Cambridge (Hampton Inn), it was a must to go through Harvard University. We got there by bus 69, which has its terminus near the hotel and near the green subway stop (Lechmere). I must say I imagined it differently, but it is very nice. Very clean and not very big, you can get around in an hour at most. Outside one of the subway stops there is a student kiosk where you can find a map of the university and, if you want, buy a guided tour made by the students themselves.We preferred not to do it. I also advise you not to go on weekends because everything is closed. We couldn't get into any of the buildings.

title: Il primo college USA
text:
E' facilmente raggiungibile con la metropolitana dal centro di Boston. Anche una breve visita all'interno del Harvard Yard con i suoi antichi edifici in mattoni rossi e il grande prato ombreggiato dove gli studenti sono soliti leggere o semplicemente chiacchierare merita di essere inclusa nel proprio itinerario.
Per una maglietta o cappellino il negozio si trova nel piccolo centro commerciale da parte a Harvard Square.
translated_text:
It is easily accessible by subway from downtown Boston. Even a short visit inside the Harvard Yard with its old red brick buildings and the large shady lawn where students used to read or just chat is worth including in one's itinerary.
For a T-shirt or cap, the store is located in the small mall off to Harvard Square.

title: Belo lugar
text: N√£o d√° para ficar em Cambridge e n√£o conhecer a mais famosa universidade do mundo! Andei pela Harvard Square, procurei um lugar para almo√ßar. Depois andei na Harvard Yard, que √© um parque muito arborizado e alegre, cheio de estudantes e turistas e fui ao campus, que √© muito imponente!
translated_text: You can't stay in Cambridge and not visit the most famous university in the world! I walked around Harvard Square, looking for a place to have lunch. Then I walked through Harvard Yard, which is a very wooded and cheerful park, full of students and tourists and went to the campus, which is very imposing!

title: Volver a nacer para estudiar en Harvard!
text: Cogimos un tour por toda la Universidad y nos iban contando las experiencias de los que hab√≠an conseguido entrar tanto en  Programas Graduates como en Post graduates. Los objetivos y la filosofia de la Uni. Vale la pena si tienes alg√∫n hijo candidato a estos programas como si tienes en mente hacer alg√∫n Master o el Doctorado.
translated_text: We took a tour of the entire University and were told about the experiences of those who had managed to get into both Graduate and Post Graduate Programs. The objectives and philosophy of the University. It is worthwhile if you have a child who is a candidate for these programs or if you have in mind to do a Master's or PhD.

title: Vale a pena conhecer!!
text: Quem nunca sonhou em estudar em Harvard? √â um belo passeio pelas instala√ß√µes da Universidade, que faz voc√™ viajar e lembrar de muitos filmes que por l√° se passaram. Voc√™ pode fazer o tour sozinho, ou pegar um tour guiado. Vale muito a pena.
translated_text: Who hasn't dreamed of studying at Harvard? It's a beautiful tour of the university's facilities, which takes you on a journey and reminds you of the many films that have been made there. You can do it on your own or take a guided tour. It's well worth it.

title: Era il giorno sbagliato
text: Era il giorno sbagliato: sono passato di domenica ad agosto ed era tutto chiuso. Ho potuto respirare l'aria dei giardini, ma non ci sono nemmeno le indicazioni degli edifici. Un po' deluso
translated_text: It was the wrong day-I passed by on a Sunday in August and everything was closed. I was able to breathe in the air of the gardens, but there were no building signs either. A little disappointed

title: Da hatte ich irgendwie mehr erwartet
text: Wir haben uns den Campus angeschaut und im Endeffekt muss ich sagen, das das halt "nur" ein Campus ist. Die roten Backsteinh√§user sind schon sch√∂n anzusehen, aber dann wirklich herrausragend fand ich das ganze nicht. Klar, hier sitzen sicherlich einige der schlausten K√∂pfe der Welt, aber als Touristenattraktion fand ich das ganze jetzt nicht so dolle. Ich fand pers√∂nlich auch die Architektur die ich gesehen habe (ohne mich da jetzt in ungnade bringen zuwollen) am MIT sch√∂ner. Sollte man aufjedenfall machen den Trip nach Harvard, vielleicht auch mit einer Gratis Rundtour verbinden, aber man sollte eventuell nicht zu viel erwarten!
translated_text: We had a look at the campus and in the end I have to say that it's "just" a campus. The red brick buildings are nice to look at, but I didn't find the whole thing really outstanding. Sure, some of the smartest people in the world are certainly based here, but as a tourist attraction I didn't find it all that great. Personally, I also found the architecture I saw (without wanting to disgrace myself) at MIT more beautiful. You should definitely make the trip to Harvard, maybe combine it with a free tour, but you shouldn't expect too much!

title: L'Universit√†
text: Avevamo 2 giorni per visitare Boston, e come si fa a non dedicare almeno 2 ore (anche di sera) di fare un salto a Cambridge a visitare l'universit√† piu importante e famosa del mondo. Quello che stupisce, come questa universit√† sia un piccolo paesino all'interno di Cambridge, che poi alla fine occupa quasi tutto Cambridge. Se avete poco tempo, visitate la parte storica, cambridge street, e la parte della loro movida in harvard square.
translated_text: We had 2 days to visit Boston, and how can you not devote at least 2 hours (even in the evening) to pop into Cambridge to visit the most important and famous university in the world. What is amazing, how this university is a small town within Cambridge, which then eventually occupies almost all of Cambridge. If you have little time, visit the historic part, cambridge street, and the part of their nightlife in harvard square.

title: Lindo
text: Lindo para curtir e aproveitar um lindo dia de sol.... gramado muito bom e gostoso para descansar ... admirar a beleza da arquitetura
translated_text: Beautiful to enjoy a sunny day.... very nice lawn to relax on ... admire the beauty of the architecture

title: Bel posto
text: Visitato a piedi e' un bel posto anche da vedere. Durante l'estate e' ovviamente vuoto, cosi' lo si aprezza di piu'.
translated_text: Visited on foot, it's a nice place to see, too. During the summer it's obviously empty, so you open it up more.

title: Il sogno di ogni studente
text: Facilmente raggiungibile da Boston con la metro (linea rossa), il campus di una delle universit√† pi√π famose al mondo √® sicuramente un'attrazione di grande interesse. Gi√† da un giro all'esterno tra i tipici edifici di mattoni rossi √® possibile percepire l'atmosfera del luogo. Tutto √® pulito, ordinato e curato. Ad orari stabiliti √® possibile effettuare tour guidati gratuiti del campus, tuttavia anche una semplice passeggiata vale la pena.
translated_text: Easily accessible from Boston by subway (red line), the campus of one of the world's most famous universities is definitely a highlight. Already from a tour outside among the typical red brick buildings, one can feel the atmosphere of the place. Everything is clean, neat and tidy. Free guided tours of the campus are available at designated times, however, even a simple walk is worthwhile.

title: Linda visita!
text: Hay que visitar los alrededores sin dudas! Lamentablemente no se puede ingresar sin pagar un tour porque te solicitan un Harvard ID pero pudimos recorrer bastante.
translated_text: You should definitely visit the surrounding area! Unfortunately you can't enter without paying for a tour because they ask for a Harvard ID but we were able to walk around quite a bit.

title: Que lugar interesante!
text: Impresionante! Los edificios historicos,el entorno, sus jardines, la historia, definitivamente, un imperdible de Boston
translated_text: Impressive! The historic buildings, the surroundings, the gardens, the history, definitely a must-see in Boston.

title: Excelente Visita si estas en Boston
text: Un lugar emblematico. No habia gente porque estaban en receso, pero pudimos recorrer todo. La biblioteca es hermosa y el campus de dormis y deportes es imponente.
translated_text: An emblematic place. It was not crowded because they were on break, but we were able to tour everything. The library is beautiful and the dorms and sports campus is impressive.

title: Quel cadre d'√©tudes !
text:
Universit√© historique qui se doit d'√™tre visit√©e
Un parcours seul n'apporte pas grand chose, sauf avec un bon guide de voyage
Nous avons opt√© pour la visite guid√©e par les √©tudiants de Harvard, ce qui offre une autre perspective bien s√ªr
translated_text:
Historic university well worth a visit
A tour on its own doesn't add up to much, except with a good travel guide
We opted for the Harvard student-guided tour, which offers a different perspective, of course.

title: A faire
text: Tres bonne visite guidee par les etudiants mais notre groupe etait beaucoup trop important ce qui n a pas permis d etre tres efficace et de poser des questions.
translated_text: Very good guided tour by the students, but our group was far too large, which made it difficult to be very efficient and ask questions.

title: H√§rligt, men utom r√§ckh√•ll...

translated_text: As a professional, and therefore a party to the case, it is quite amazing to soak up the academic environment, while having access to hardly anything. The libraries and most buildings are only open to students and Harvard staff, which is understandable, as they probably want to preserve the exclusivity of the place. But for a visitor it might not be as much fun, even the guided tours don't allow you to get very close (it's not that fun to listen to someone telling you how nice it is inside, when you just get to stand on the stairs outside.) title: Visita guiada
text:
Conocer una de las universidades mas prestigiosas fue sin duda una experiencia inolvidable, y hacerlo con mis hijos estudiantes universitarios fue un oportunidad valiosa para que abran sus mentes y ampl√≠en sus metas.

translated_text:
Visiting one of the most prestigious universities was undoubtedly an unforgettable experience, and doing it with my children who are university students was a valuable opportunity for them to open their minds and expand their goals.

The Harvard student who was our guide on the tour of the university did a very good job of giving information about the history and architecture of the university, adding anecdotes and everyday details in a very illustrative and entertaining way.

title: Hermoso
text: Se respira el conocimiento... Aunque hab√≠a nevado mucho, si vas preparado se puede pasear f√°cilmente... es un lugar hermoso

translated_text: For any university student it's a fantastic place, full of life, culture, knowledge...lots of legends too, I've always dreamed of visiting this university!

title: Harvard, dans les universit√©s les plus prestigieuses au monde ! Vaut le d√©tour !!
text: Visite qui vaut la peine ! Vous pouvez passer une heure ou deux √† marcher sur le campus. Nous avions pris une visite guid√©e par un historien qui √©tait tr√®s int√©ressante √† un petit kiosque d'information touristique tout pr√®s de l'entr√©e principale du campus. Je recommande fortement la visite du campus !
translated_text: Worth a visit! You can spend an hour or two walking around the campus. We had taken a guided tour by a historian which was very interesting at a small tourist information booth right by the main entrance to the campus. I highly recommend the campus tour!

title: Agr√©able
text: Essayer les food truck ca vaut vraiment la peine ! L'ambiance de Harvard est agr√©able et beaucoup de petite boutiques ou de restaurant dans Cambridge.
translated_text: Try the food trucks, they're really worth it! Harvard has a pleasant atmosphere, with lots of little stores and restaurants in Cambridge.

title: Visita m√°s que obligada.Emocionante !!!
text:
Est√° situada en Cambridge, al otro lado del rio Charles.
Fue emocionate nuestra visita a esta prestigiosa Universidad, ejemplo en el mundo. Entramos por Church Street, donde se encuentra una de las entradas a la Harvard Yard, Johnston Gate.
Visitamos Old Yard, un jard√≠n rodeado de preciosos edificios, y al fondo un edificio blanco, University Hall, y la famosa estatua de John Harvard, fundador de la universidad. 
Al otro lado del University Hall vimos una explanada llamada  Tercentenary Theatre, donde se realizan todas las ceremonias de graduaci√≥n de Harvard. All√≠ cerca nos encontramos con Widener Library y Memorial Church.
Tambi√©n vimos la facultad de Ciencias de Harvard y el Memorial Hall. Los edificios est√°n maravillosamente conservados en medio de parques fabulosos !!!!
En resumen, no te la pierdas !!!
translated_text:
It is located in Cambridge, on the other side of the Charles River.
Our visit to this prestigious University, an example in the world, was exciting. We entered through Church Street, where one of the entrances to the Harvard Yard, Johnston Gate, is located.
We visited Old Yard, a garden surrounded by beautiful buildings, and in the background a white building, University Hall, and the famous statue of John Harvard, founder of the university.
On the other side of University Hall we saw an esplanade called Tercentenary Theatre, where all Harvard graduation ceremonies are held. Nearby we found Widener Library and Memorial Church.
We also saw the Harvard Science faculty and Memorial Hall. The buildings are beautifully preserved in the midst of fabulous parks !!!!
In short, don't miss it !!!!

title: Imposible no ir!
text:

HAY Q CONOCERLA! VALE LA PENA...fui caminando desde el MIT
translated_text:
So different from the Argentine customs, such an important and renowned university, the famous campus!
IT IS WORTH KNOWING! IT'S WORTH IT...I walked there from MIT.

title: Imperd√≠vel
text: Quem vai a Boston tem que ir a Harvard. Apesar de de ficar em outra cidade, √© fac√≠limo chegar l√° de metr√¥. O campus √© agradabil√≠ssimo e h√° o imperd√≠vel Museu de Hist√≥ria Natural.
translated_text: Anyone who goes to Boston has to go to Harvard. Although it's in another city, it's easy to get there by subway. The campus is very pleasant and there's the unmissable Natural History Museum.

title: –ó–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–µ–π –Ω–∞—É–∫–∏
translated_text: Harvard University is a member of the elite American "Ivy League" and it is the oldest and most prestigious among them. The year of its founding is 1636! Seven US presidents have graduated from it, including the current one. The student campus is located in a huge park and all is drowned in greenery. A very large territory, one of the attractions is a sculpture of John Harvard, whose shoe is rubbed to a golden shine by groups of photographers near its foot. The university is located in the town of Cambridge, filled with a quiet old-world charm.

title: Anos e anos
text: Que podemos dizer de uma das Universidades mais prestigiosas do mundo, eu adorei estar.D√° vontade de voltar a estudar...
translated_text: What can we say about one of the most prestigious universities in the world, I loved it there, it makes me want to go back and study?

title: Demais!!!!
text: A Harvard University tem um ar brit√¢nico. Foi a primeira sede da Universidade. Incr√≠vel como a faculdade pensa no bem estar do aluno e investe nisso. Interessante salientar que no primeiro ano do curso, o aluno √© obrigado a ficar no campus da faculdade. Depois deste primeiro ano, pode alugar algum lugar ou ir morar em outro local. Simplesmente maravilhoso.
translated_text: Harvard University has a British air. It was the university's first headquarters. It's incredible how much the university thinks about the student's well-being and invests in it. It's interesting to note that in the first year of the course, students are obliged to stay on campus. After the first year, they can rent a place or move elsewhere. Simply wonderful.

title: Maior universidade de Massachussets
text: Em Boston encontram-se faculdades em toda parte, mas o campus mais importante da regi√£o fica na cidade de Cambridge. Ap√≥s atravessar a ponte tem in√≠cio o extenso campus de Harvard. S√£o dezenas de edif√≠cios normalmente de tijolos no estilo vitoriano cercados de jardins. A Faculdade de Direito, um dos mais bonitos, segue o estilo neocl√°ssico. H√° um tour guiado organizado pela Universidade ou por conta pelo aplicativo Harvard Yard Tour.
translated_text: Colleges are everywhere in Boston, but the most important campus in the region is in the city of Cambridge. After crossing the bridge, the extensive Harvard campus begins. There are dozens of Victorian-style brick buildings surrounded by gardens. The Law School, one of the most beautiful, follows the neoclassical style. There is a guided tour organized by the University or on your own via the Harvard Yard Tour app.

title: Harvard is must
text: ŒòŒ± œÄœÅŒµœÄŒµŒπ ŒΩŒ± ŒµœÄŒπœÉŒ∫ŒµœÜŒ∏ŒµŒØœÑŒµ ŒπœÉœâœÇ Œ≥ŒΩœâœÉœÑœåœÑŒµœÅŒø œÄŒ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒ∑ŒºŒπŒø œÑŒøœÖ Œ∫œåœÉŒºŒøœÖ. Œ§Œø campus Œ≤œÅŒØœÉŒ∫ŒµœÑŒ±Œπ œÉœÑŒ∑ŒΩ œÄŒµœÅŒπŒøœáŒÆ œÑŒøœÖ Cambridge , ŒºŒµ Œ∫ŒªŒ±œÉœÉŒπŒ∫œå œÉœÑœÖŒª Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒøŒªœÖ œÄœÅŒ¨œÉŒπŒΩŒø. ŒòŒ± Œ∑œÑŒ±ŒΩ Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒø ŒΩŒ± Œ≠œáŒµœÑŒµ Œ∫Œ¨œÄŒøŒπŒø œÉœÖŒΩŒøŒ¥Œø ŒÆ Œ≤ŒπŒ≤ŒªŒØŒø ŒºŒ±Œ∂Œπ œÉŒ±œÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒΩŒ± œÉŒ±œÇ Œ±ŒΩŒ¨œÄœÑœÖŒæŒ∑ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ ŒπœÉœÑŒøœÅŒØŒ± œÑŒøœÖ œÄŒ±ŒΩŒµœÄŒπœÉœÑŒ∑ŒºŒØŒøœÖ
translated_text: You should visit perhaps the most famous university in the world. The campus is located in the Cambridge area, with a classic style and a lot of greenery. It would be good to have a guide or book with you to help you develop the history of the university.

title: Una piccola e prestigiosa citt√† del sapere
text:
Harvard √® facilmente raggiungibile dal centro di Boston con vari mezzi pubblici. Nel nostro caso, essendo in quattro, la scelta pi√π ragionevole √® stata il taxi, che ci ha fruttato anche una bella chiacchierata con un giovane tassista etiope.
Abbiamo affrontato la visita approfittando dei tour informativi generali guidati dagli studenti (in inglese, dove la principale difficolt√† di comprensione sta nel fatto che le descrizioni sono snocciolate all'aperto e subiscono quindi tutti i disturbi ambientali dovuti al traffico, agli onnipresenti lavori in corso, ecc., ma rimangono sufficientemente fruibili e ricchi di aneddoti e informazioni), il che ci ha permesso di apprezzare la notevole estensione del campus e l'atmosfera di relax che ne domina il parco.
Purtroppo le strutture non sono visitabili all'interno, tuttavia l'Harvard Yard ha un sapore architettonicamente molto tradizionale.
Giusti per fare qualche confronto, a fronte delle nostre domande abbiamo capito che si tratta di corsi che hanno un costo paragonabile alle pi√π prestigiose universit√† italiane e anche il percorso accademico e l'impostazione dei corsi √® abbastanza in linea con la nostra. La differenza pi√π evidente rimane proprio la vita nel campus, che √® la formula largamente preferita di frequenza e per molti ragazzi rappresenta anche il distacco dalla famiglia (no bamboccioni ...).
Se siete interessati al merchandising, al di l√† del piccolo store attiguo all'information center, segnalo la presenza di un bellissimo negozio (Harvard Coop) con uno sterminato assortimento e prezzi in linea, quindi non popolari.
translated_text:
Harvard is easily accessible from downtown Boston by various public transportation. In our case, there being four of us, the most reasonable choice was the cab, which also earned us a nice chat with a young Ethiopian taxi driver.
We approached the visit by taking advantage of the general student-led informational tours (in English, where the main difficulty in understanding lies in the fact that the descriptions are pitted outdoors and thus suffer all the environmental disturbances due to traffic, ubiquitous construction work, etc., but remain sufficiently usable and rich in anecdotes and information), which allowed us to appreciate the considerable extent of the campus and the relaxed atmosphere that dominates its grounds.
Unfortunately, the facilities cannot be visited inside, yet the Harvard Yard has an architecturally very traditional flavor.
Just to make some comparisons, in the face of our questions we realized that these are courses that are comparable in cost to the most prestigious Italian universities, and the academic path and course setting is also quite in line with ours. The most obvious difference remains just the campus life, which is the widely preferred formula of attendance and for many young people also represents detachment from the family (no bamboozling ...).
If you are interested in merchandising, beyond the small store adjacent to the information center, I point out the presence of a beautiful store (Harvard Coop) with an endless assortment and prices in line, so not popular.

title: Si viajas con tus hijos no puede faltar, le grabaras una meta en el cerebro referencial.

title: Elegancia
text: Los edificios muestran la arquitectura de rasgos britanicos, los edificios estan muy bien cuidados, puedes caminar por los parques interiores, pasear por algunos pasillos, ver la estatua del fundador (aunque dicen que la imagen representada no es exactamente la del fundador) y comprar souvenirs en las tiendas del sector

title: Geen tour in de zomer, jammer!

title: Trip
text: Pekne miesto na prech√°dzku. Ale tro≈°ku probl√©m s parkovan√≠m. Z parku a budov d√Ωcha neopakovateƒæn√° atmosf√©ra.

title: √âcole prestigieuse

title: Vida universitaria
text: Visitar Harvard y recorrer sus jardines es algo obligatorio para cualquier universitario y para aquellos que ya pasaron por esa fase. The number of students of different nationalities in such a lively environment as the gardens is something I had never seen in the universities of my country.

title: Lugar lindo!
text: Pense em um lugar maravilhoso, acolhedor e tranquilo. Boston √© uma cidade muito bonita e aconchegante. Visitar Harvard foi um sonho realizado. Amei. A √©poca que fui favoreceu bastante. Estava tudo muito florido e encantador. Indico!

text: Poco m√°s que decir, como latino fui con la idea de la universidad de nuestra regi√≥n, nada m√°s alejado de la realidad, m√°s que una universidad es un ciudad dentro de Cambridge, aulas, edificios, residencias, bares, caf√©s, restaurantes, tiendas y todo lo normal de una ciudad en un "campus" universitario. title: emozionante
text:

title: juste WAOUH
text:

translated_text:
a magnificent place, with a natural, soothing charm that's just as astonishing. We visited the Harvard site with our guide, and a young woman who welcomed us and gave us explanations about the park (clear, simplified explanations in English, suitable for all levels of English).

title: visita que no hay que perderse.!!

title: –ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥–æ–∫ –Ω–∞—É–∫–∏
translated_text: The Harvard University campus has a very relaxed and friendly atmosphere that encourages socializing and makes you want to learn something. title: Fant√°stico
text: reflexo de uma cultura que preza pela educa√ß√£o de alt√≠ssima qualidade, influencia inglesa, daqui sa√≠ram 8 presidentes americanos , 56 bilion√°rios e 156 pr√™mios Nobel .. title: Harvard University

text: SI respira un'aria di austerit√† e sapere passeggiando fra gli edifici vittoriani di Harvard Yard, il principale fra i campus che compongono l'istituzione universitaria pi√π antica degli Stati Uniti (1636) e una delle pi√π prestigiose al mondo. title: Imperd√≠vel

text: Si vas a Boston, no pod√©s dejar de visitar Harvard. El campus es hermoso, tanto por su arquitectura como por su vegetaci√≥n. Es tan hermoso que hasta te dan ganas de estar estudiando!  Ten√©s la opci√≥n de hacer o no hacer una visita guiada.

title: Ë¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÇÇÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô
text: „ÅÑ„Å§Ë°å„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇÂ§ßÂ§â‰∫∫„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇË¶≥ÂÖâÂÆ¢„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åã„Çâ„Åß„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇÈäÖÂÉè„ÅÆÂ∑¶Ë∂≥„ÅØÊ≤¢Â±±„ÅÆ‰∫∫„ÅåËß¶„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÁ£®„Åã„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÉÅ„É£„Éº„É´„Ç∫Â∑ùÊ≤ø„ÅÑ„ÅÆÂØÆ„ÇíË¶ã„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®„ÄÅÁïôÂ≠¶„Åó„Å¶„Åì„Åì„Å´‰Ωè„Çì„Åß„Åø„Åü„Åã„Å£„Åü„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô
translated_text: It is always very crowded. It is probably because there are many tourists. The left foot of the statue is polished because many people touch it. Looking at the dorms along the Charles River, I wish I could have studied abroad and lived here!

title: COMO EN LAS PELICULAS
text: es una visita muy interesantes tienes un gran campo con los jardines de la univiersidad, lo mas testacado es recorrerla y recrearte en la visi√≥n de las casas de las hermandades, tiene un magnifico museo donde est√° el primer computador, padre de los actuales ordenadores, en fin recomiendo perderse en un largo paseo y aprobechar para hacer compras en los centros comerciales ya que es mas barato a pesar de la enorme subida del dolar.
translated_text: is a very interesting visit you have a large field with the gardens of the university, the most interesting is to walk around and recreate yourself in the vision of the houses of the sororities, has a magnificent museum where is the first computer, father of today's computers, in short I recommend getting lost in a long walk and aprobechar to shop in shopping malls as it is cheaper despite the huge rise in the dollar.

title: Un sue√±o hecho realidad.. conocer la Universidad de Harvard
text: En mi quinto viaje a Nueva York, decid√≠ hacer un alto y tomar un destino por dos dias a Boston y conocer la Universidad de Harvard y el MIT... Soy egresada de la Universidad Cat√≥lica Andr√©s Bello de Venezuela y jubilada como personal Administrativo de una Universidad p√∫blica.. Universidad Nacional Abierta.. Hice mi recorrido de 4 horas desde la ciudad de Nueva York para llegar a Boston... una ciudad hermosa, sobria, elegante, edificaciones bajas de tama√±o, sin marquesinas, el contraste con NY... Tom√© un taxi y llegue a Harvard... un campus sencillo, pocos estudiantes pues se acercaba la semana santa, peque√±os edificios o mas bien casas al estilo ingl√©s que se ordenaban por salones de clases... las bicicletas en un aparcadero especial, los salones de clases con pizarras normales de tiza , ninguna nueva tecnolog√≠a para esas fases del aprendizaje..pero s√≥lo saber que es la d√©cima mejor universidad del mundo  te hacer sentir que mas all√° de una edificaci√≥n sencilla hay inteligencia, talento, estudio, capacidad, dedicaci√≥n.... Tom√© el metro en la estaci√≥n de la Universidad de Harvard sin antes pasar y comprar hermosos recuerdos con el emblema de la universidad y tomarme un caf√© con el mas rico dulce que jam√°s com√≠ en mesas  con profesores y estudiantes de Harvard...
translated_text: On my fifth trip to New York, I decided to make a stop and take a two-day destination to Boston and visit Harvard University and MIT... I am a graduate of the Universidad Catolica Andres Bello in Venezuela and retired as administrative staff of a public university... National Open University... I made my 4 hour drive from New York City to Boston.... a beautiful city, sober, elegant, low sized buildings, without canopies, the contrast with NY... I took a cab and arrived at Harvard... a simple campus, few students because Easter was approaching, small buildings or rather English style houses that were arranged by classrooms... the bicycles in a special parking lot, the classrooms with normal chalk boards, no new technology for those phases of learning...but just knowing that it is the tenth best university in the world makes you feel that beyond a simple building there is intelligence, talent, study, capacity, dedication .... I took the subway at the Harvard University station without first passing by and buying beautiful souvenirs with the emblem of the university and having a coffee with the most delicious candy I ever ate at tables with professors and students of Harvard...

No percurso h√° v√°rias lojas onde √© poss√≠vel comprar as mais variadas lembrancinhas, moletons, camisas, etc.
translated_text: If you're going to Boston, it's well worth visiting the Harvard campus. It's difficult to walk around all the buildings, but it's essential to go to the statue of the founder (it's said that picking up his left foot brings good luck to those who want to study there, so it's a no-brainer!). Along the way there are several stores where you can buy the most varied souvenirs, sweatshirts, shirts, etc.

title: Sehenswert
text:

title: HARVARD
text: Recorrer todos los edificios de la Universidad qe son un patrimonio historico, estar en los jardines sentados con los estudiantes en sus pausas, comer en los carritos donde estan ese crisol de razas estudiando, ingresar a un edificio donde se dictaban clases de danza ....

title: Campus

title: Un sue√±o cumplido

text: Bonita area para caminar no necesita pagar un tour para ver las diferentes areas. Pare a comprar recordatorias en el Harvard souvenier , ahi variedad a buenoa precios

title: Un cl√°sico que hay que ver.
text:
Es un lugar para conocer. El d√≠a que fuimos hac√≠a much√≠simo fr√≠o y como ya hab√≠amos hecho el tour en MIT, en este lugar hicimos el tour nosotros mismos pero recomiendo hacer el tour gratuito que ellos te ofrecen ya que de lo contrario no se puede apreciar en su totalidad.

translated_text:
It is a place to visit. The day we went it was freezing cold and since we had already done the tour at MIT, we did the tour ourselves but I recommend taking the free tour they offer otherwise you can't see it in its entirety.
Regardless, the buildings are amazing. Very imposing. In winter choose a day that is not windy and cloudy to enjoy more.

text: Wer nach Boston oder Cambridge kommt, sollte einen Besuch des Gel√§ndes der weltber√ºhmten Universit√§t nicht verpassen. Zum besonderen Erlebnis wird der Besuch, wenn man an einer der kostenlosen F√ºhrungen durch die Studenten teilnimmt. Infos findet man auf der Homepage.
translated_text: Anyone coming to Boston or Cambridge should not miss a visit to the grounds of the world-famous university. The visit becomes a special experience if you take part in one of the free guided tours led by the students. Information can be found on the homepage.

title: La migliore universit√† del mondo
text: E' veramente un tempio della conoscenza. Girare tra i vecchi edifici del Campus √® un vero piacere.  Ho pranzato all'Harvard Club: uno spettacolo!  √® un luogo emozionante!!
translated_text: It is truly a temple of knowledge. Wandering around the old buildings on campus is a real pleasure.  I had lunch at the Harvard Club: a sight!!! it is an exciting place!!!

title: Ah√≠ quiero estudiar
text: Puedes entrar a la Universidad caminando como cualquier otro estudiante, el campus tiene de todo, la biblioteca se ve complet√≠sima, los edificios por dentro son hermosos, me cole en un aula de clase y se ve que tienen la ultima tecnolog√≠a para dar clases. Quien vio Harry Potter se dara cuenta rapido que ahi esta uno de los edificios.

Whoever saw Harry Potter will quickly realize that this is one of the buildings.

title: √Ä voir
text: Vraiment un petit quelque chose de sp√©cial que de visit√© cette Universit√© plus grande que nature. Super!

title: Universidad Clasica

title: VALE A PENA VISITAR
text: Lugar de muitas informa√ß√µes culturais e hist√≥rias, curiosidades,  tradi√ß√µes e beleza arquitetonica, cercado por lugares maravilhosos de se conhecer.
translated_text: A place with a wealth of cultural information and stories, curiosities, traditions and architectural beauty, surrounded by wonderful places to visit.

title: Siempre perfecta

title: Neve, muita neve
text: Vale demais a pena conhecer a universidade. Fui a trabalho, ent√£o n√£o pude passear muito, enfrentei muita neve, fui justamente no per√≠odo das 3 maiores nevascas entre janeiro e fevereiro. Mas, apesar disso, ver a organiza√ß√£o da cidade para manter tudo em ordem j√° vale demais a pena! Visitei a HGSE (faculdade de educa√ß√£o).
translated_text: The university is well worth a visit. I went for work, so I couldn't do much sightseeing, I faced a lot of snow, I went just during the period of the 3 biggest snowfalls between January and February. But, despite this, seeing how organized the city is to keep everything in order is worth it! I visited the HGSE (College of Education).

title: Muy recomendable!
text: Es preferible visitarlo en verano que en invierno! porque en invierno realmente hay muy pocas personas y no se disfruta tanto. En cambio en verano los estudiantes de Harvard estudian en el c√©sped, hay gente tocando m√∫sica y en general existe un ambiente m√°s relajado y de buena onda! es el coraz√≥n de Havard. Lo recomiendo!
translated_text: It is better to visit in summer than in winter! because in winter there are very few people and it is not as enjoyable. But in the summer, Harvard students study on the lawn, there are people playing music and in general there is a more relaxed atmosphere and a good vibe! I highly recommend it!

title: Visita obligada!
text: A pesar que pens√© que era mucho m√°s grande, es ideal para recorrer en verano, ya que lo hice durante invierno en una actividad y el fr√≠o era insoportable. Ademas existen muchos lugares dentro de la Universidad que es solo para estudiantes con tarjeta, por lo tanto solo es posible visitar su exterior. A√∫n as√≠ es Harvard :)
translated_text: Although I thought it was much bigger, it is ideal to visit in summer, since I did it in winter during an activity and the cold was unbearable. There are also many places inside the University that are only for students with a card, so it is only possible to visit the outside. Still it is Harvard :)

title: Exactamente como uno se lo imagina
text: Harvard y Cambridge son como una villa de Navidad. Es un lugar cl√°sico que tiene edificios de piedra por todas partes y peque√±os locales con tiendas, bares y restaurantes. Es un must en Boston.

title: IMPONENTE
text:
Ya nada mas que su nombre inspira admiraci√≥n y prestigio. Universidad emplazada en un lugar de ensue√±o, arbolado, con un excelente entorno.
Lindos jardines y lugares aleda√±os.
translated_text:
Its name alone inspires admiration and prestige. The university is located in a dreamlike, wooded place, with an excellent environment.
Beautiful gardens and surrounding areas.

title: Un paseo por otra universidad
text: Si vas a Cambridge esta es una de las universidades que debes visitar junto con el MIT, en lo particular no me resulta muy atractivo pero aunque sea por saciar la curiosidad de conocer el campus y sus jardines de una de las universidades mas famosas. Ver√°n muy variados edificios. Es mas aprovechable con un guia que le cuente las historias del lugar.
translated_text: If you go to Cambridge this is one of the universities that you must visit along with MIT, in particular I do not find it very attractive but if only to satisfy the curiosity to know the campus and its gardens of one of the most famous universities. You will see a variety of buildings. It is more profitable with a guide who will tell you the stories of the place.

title: Buena Visita
text: Fui sin espectativas y me encontre con un lugar increible, con una arquitectura de pelicula. Es hermoso recorrer esas callesitas internas observando a tu alrededor, la mezcla de razas y culturas. me Gusto mucho.
translated_text: I went without expectations and I found an incredible place, with an architecture like a movie. It is beautiful to walk through those little streets observing around you, the mix of races and cultures. I liked it very much.

title: Nerd !!
text: Me senti dentro do seriado "The Big Bang Theory" e me encontraria com o Sheldon a qualquer momento. O campus √© lindo, limpo e organizado. N√£o poderia ser diferente. Adorei muito tudo. Recomendo a visita se estiver passeando por Boston.
translated_text: I felt like I was in "The Big Bang Theory" and would meet Sheldon at any moment. The campus is beautiful, clean and organized. It couldn't be any different. I really loved everything. I recommend a visit if you're visiting Boston.

title: A famosa harvard
text: Harvard √© famosa no mundo todo, mas n√£o tivemos aquela impress√£o dos filmes na visita. Estava muito frio, ent√£o n√£o tinha ningu√©m no campos. Ent√£o n√£o tinha muito para ver (j√° que os pr√©dios s√£o restritos para que √© da harvard). Vale a visita para conhecer.
translated_text: Harvard is famous all over the world, but we didn't get that impression from the movies on our visit. It was very cold, so there was no one on the grounds. So there wasn't much to see (since the buildings are restricted to Harvard students). It's worth a visit.

title: Nada de mais
text: N√£o achei nada de mais. Acho que foi pelo fato de que visitamos no inverno. N√£o tinha ningu√©m no campus por causa do frio. Perguntamos o que poder√≠amos ver para uma pessoa que trabalha l√° e ela nos disse q l√° so tem salas de aula, dormit√≥rios e bibliotecas (onde s√≥ tem acesso que estuda ou trabalha na universidade) e que turistas s√≥ tem acesso aos museus. Assim, fomos visitar o museu de artes de harvard.
translated_text: I didn't think it was a big deal. I think it was because we visited in winter. There was no one on campus because of the cold. We asked a person who works there what we could see and she told us that there are only classrooms, dormitories and libraries (where only those who study or work at the university have access) and that tourists only have access to the museums. So we went to visit the Harvard Art Museum.

title: Sonho de estudante!
text: Foi muito bom conhecer Harvady University al√©m de ser a universidade mais rica √© a melhor do mundo! Tudo muito lindo e perfeito.

title: Indispensavel
text: Diferente das universidades brasileiras, excelente visita para entrar em um filme e ver como √© a realidade de um aluno que estuda por l√°.

title: Imperd√≠vel
text:
Maravilhoso, lindo - campus, arborizado e respiramos paz, onde √© poss√≠vel parar e ler ou s√≥ pensar na vida! rs.
Dizem que se voc√™ tocar no p√© esquerdo de John Harvard, ter√° mais intelig√™ncia.... a tinta j√° est√° at√© gasta! ... e claro que tinha que tocar tamb√©m!
translated_text:
Wonderful, beautiful - campus, wooded and peaceful, where you can stop and read or just think about life! lol.
They say that if you touch John Harvard's left foot, you'll have more intelligence.... the ink is already worn off! ... and of course I had to touch it too!

title: Visita mais que necess√°ria
text: A faculdade √© literalmente um sonho de lugar para estudar! As constru√ß√µes s√£o antigas e muito bonitas! O passeio pelo campus faz com que voc√™ tenha vontade de estudar novamente!
translated_text: The college is literally a dream of a place to study! The buildings are old and beautiful! The tour of the campus makes you want to study again!

title: tranquilo
text: lugar muito tranquilo para caminhadas  e tirar boas fotografias. procure os guias para explicarem sobre a universidade.

title: Demais!
text: O campus √© muito bonito, arborizado e bem constru√≠do, estilo ingl√™s e com vistas muitos bonitas. H√° parques, bancos e locais para leitura...um dos campus mais bonitos que j√° fui.
translated_text: The campus is very beautiful, wooded and well built, English style and with very nice views. There are parks, benches and places to read...one of the most beautiful campuses I've ever been to.

title: Linda!
text: N√£o d√° nem pra acreditar quando voc√™ entra l√°! De tantas vezes que vi Harvard nos filmes, n√£o imaginava que seria t√£o linda. O mais legal √© que o passeio √© bem aberto, existem visitas guiadas e voc√™ pode esfregar a m√£o no p√© esquerdo da est√°tua de John Harvard (fundador). DIzem que d√° sorte! Existem in√∫meras lojas com os uniformes da universidade, eu comprei um moleton lindo para mim!
translated_text: You can't believe it when you walk in! Having seen Harvard so many times in movies, I had no idea it would be so beautiful. The cool thing is that the tour is wide open, there are guided tours and you can rub your hand on the left foot of the statue of John Harvard (founder). They say it's good luck! There are lots of stores selling university uniforms, and I bought myself a lovely sweatshirt!

title: –•–æ—Ç–µ–ª–∞ –±—ã —è —Ç–∞–º —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è
translated_text: All the faculty buildings are different, but they look harmonious together. The space is arranged for people - well-groomed lawns with brightly colored chairs, free WIFI, it is forbidden to ride bicycles on the territory, only to walk. Monument to John Harvard with a rubbed foot - supposedly helps in studying

title: Imperd√≠vel!
text:
Lugar lindo. 
Separe pelo menos uma hora para conhecer o campus.
N√£o h√° tours oficiais, mas sempre tem estudantes que fornecem tours gratuitos.
translated_text:
Beautiful place.
Take at least an hour to explore the campus.
There are no official tours, but there are always students who provide free tours.

title: Local muito bonito
text: Local muito bonito e que respira conhecimento. Fui no inverno, embora n√£o esteja com aquele gramado verde e muitas folhas nas √°rvores, mesmo assim √© muito bonito. Tem a est√°tua de John Harvard. Vale a pena conhecer.
translated_text: A very beautiful place that breathes knowledge. I went in winter, and although it doesn't have that green grass and lots of leaves on the trees, it's still very beautiful. There's a statue of John Harvard. It's worth a visit.

title: Visita imperdivel
text: Visitar o campus de Harvard foi um dos principais motivos pelos quais escolhi Boston como um dos meus destinos de f√©rias. O campus e os pr√©dios s√£o muito bonitos e conservados. Sentir a energia de l√° √© show!
translated_text: Visiting the Harvard campus was one of the main reasons I chose Boston as one of my vacation destinations. The campus and the buildings are very beautiful and well maintained. Feeling the energy there is amazing!

title: Separe um tempo e v√°!
text: Esse passeio √© obrigat√≥rio! Cheque os hor√°rios do tour guiado e esteja pontualmente no local combinado. O passeio √© gratuito e o guia √© um pr√≥prio estudante da universidade. Ele conta a hist√≥ria de Harvard e de cada cantinho da universidade e deixa sempre aberto para fazermos perguntas e tirarmos nossas d√∫vidas. O passeio dura 50 minutos e vale a pena! O √∫nico ponto negativo √© que n√£o temos acesso a local algum da universidade, apenas passamos na frente mas n√£o podemos entrar nos pr√©dios.
translated_text: This tour is a must! Check the times of the guided tour and be there on time. The tour is free and the guide is a student from the university. He tells us about the history of Harvard and every corner of the university and always leaves it open for us to ask questions. The tour lasts 50 minutes and is well worth it! The only downside is that we don't have access to any part of the university, we just pass in front but can't enter the buildings.

title: Agrad√°vel passeio
text:
Sim, todo mundo j√° deve ter pensado o qu√£o legal deve ser estudar l√°.
Mas, se voc√™ n√£o √© um g√™nio, aproveite para visitar o lugar, cen√°rio de v√°rios filmes, e onde mts celebridades realmente importantes estudaram. √â muito agr√°vel caminhar pelo campus. No outono vc pode fazer essa caminhada com um copo de caf√© bem quentinho na m√£o. √â um lugar onde qualquer pessoa que v√° a Boston deveria conhecer.
translated_text:
Yes, everyone has probably thought about how cool it must be to study there.
But if you're not a genius, take the opportunity to visit the place, which has been the setting for several films and where many important celebrities have studied. It's very pleasant to walk around the campus. In the fall you can do this with a warm cup of coffee in your hand. It's a place that anyone going to Boston should visit.

title: D√° vontade de ser estudante de novo
text: √â um lugar muito charmoso, cheio de hist√≥ria e lugares com significado e charme. Reserve algumas horas e se quiser visitar alguns dos museus, pelo menos uma tarde. O Museu de Hist√≥ria Natural de Harvard, apesar de n√£o ser enorme, √© muito rico e interessante. Passeio imperd√≠vel.
translated_text: It's a very charming place, full of history and places with meaning and charm. Set aside a few hours and if you want to visit some of the museums, at least an afternoon. The Harvard Museum of Natural History, although not huge, is very rich and interesting. An unmissable visit.

title: Interessante e bacana no fall
text:
As arvores com suas folhas caindo muito legal.
E tocar na bota de ouro do John Harvard para dar sorte na sabedoria, muito bacana.
translated_text:
The trees with their falling leaves, very cool.
And touching John Harvard's golden boot for good luck in wisdom, very cool.

title: lindo lindo lindo sonho de qualquer um
text: quem nao pensou em estudar em Harvard??? Nossa, muito legal conhecer la, os predios antigos, os jardins do complexo fora que estavamos no outono entao tenho fotos maravilhosad de la, presenciamos alunos indo de la pra ca, alguns usavam calcas escrito "harvard"
translated_text: who hasn't thought about studying at Harvard? Wow, it was really cool to see it, the old buildings, the gardens of the complex and we were in the fall so I have wonderful photos of it, we witnessed students going from there to there, some wore pants with "harvard" written on them.

title: Hay que ir
text:
Un lugar espectacular, los edificios son impresionantes, el campus es inmenso y los alrededores son muy lindos. Destaco el memorial de Harvard a los ex-alumnos combatientes que es impresionante, adosado al comedor que es lo mas parecido a Hogwarts que he visto.
Hay varios atractivos en la zona y un tour por la universidad propocionado por los propios alumnos.
translated_text:
A spectacular place, the buildings are impressive, the campus is huge and the surroundings are very nice. I highlight the Harvard memorial to the former student combatants which is impressive, attached to the dining hall which is the closest thing to Hogwarts I've seen.
There are several attractions in the area and a tour of the university provided by the students themselves.

title: Historia, Arquitectura y Educaci√≥n.
text:
Hermosa Universidad, famosa mundialmente por la calidad de su educaci√≥n, ofrece un precioso entorno arquitect√≥nico y de √°res verdes, que hacen de su visita una actividad muy agradable e interesante.

Se ofrecen all√≠ en ocasiones, conciertos de m√∫sica cl√°sica o presentaciones art√≠sticas, de forma gratuita.

Se puede recorrer sus dependencias libremente.
translated_text:
Beautiful University, world famous for the quality of its education, offers a beautiful architectural environment and green areas, which make your visit a very pleasant and interesting activity.

Occasionally, classical music concerts or artistic presentations are offered there, free of charge.

You are free to walk around the premises.

title: Impec√°vel
text: Tive a felicidade de ficar hospedada no campus como aluna, mas mesmo como visitante, vale cada minuto. Impec√°veis jardins, arquitetura deslumbrante (inclusive o moderno Tata Hall) e a vista do Charles River de tirar o f√¥lego. Sensacional.
translated_text: I was fortunate enough to stay on campus as a student, but even as a visitor, it's worth every minute. Impeccable gardens, stunning architecture (including the modern Tata Hall) and a breathtaking view of the Charles River. Sensational.

title: Buen paseo
text: Hay unas visitas guiadas que dan los estudiantes sobre el campus. Son bastante interesantesy le dan un poco mas de significado al lugar que uno visita. Hay que preinscribirse online. Vale la pena. Son gratis.
translated_text: There are some guided tours given by the students about the campus. They are quite interesting and give a little more meaning to the place you are visiting. You have to pre-register online. It's worth it. They are free.

title: Um banho de hist√≥ria
text: Pode-se visitar a maioria dos locais sozinho mas recomendo fortemente fazer um tour guiado. Pr√©dios antigos ainda usados como refeit√≥rio ou alojamento dos estudantes. O p√°tio interno estava lindo com as cores do outono. N√£o deixe de bater fotos na est√°tua de John Harvard e pegar nos p√©s de bronze. Voc√™ pode sentir o clima da faculdade no ar. Acesso f√°cil pelo metro. Diversas op√ß√µes de restaurantes por perto.
translated_text: You can visit most of the sites on your own, but I strongly recommend taking a guided tour. Old buildings still used as cafeterias or student accommodation. The inner courtyard was beautiful with the fall colors. Be sure to take pictures of the statue of John Harvard and pick up the bronze feet. You can feel the college atmosphere in the air. Easy access by subway. Lots of restaurants nearby.

title: Excelente para os amantes da √°rea de sa√∫de
text: A localiza√ß√£o da Harvard Medical School √© excelente pois em seu desenvolvimento cercou-se de varias unidades hospitalares tamb√©m de alto n√≠vel cient√≠fico. O ambiente para estudos de graduados e de p√≥s graduados na √°rea de sa√∫de √© seguramente um dos melhores do mundo. Vale a pena visitar o local e o museu da hist√≥ria da medicina.
translated_text: Harvard Medical School's location is excellent, as during its development it was surrounded by a number of hospitals that were also of a high scientific standard. The environment for undergraduates and postgraduates in the health field is certainly one of the best in the world. It is well worth visiting the site and the museum of the history of medicine.

title: Un lugar que inspira querer aprender
text:
El principal motivo por el que decidimos ir fue la fama que tiene la universidad. Ademas que uno tiene visto los edificios por diferentes pel√≠culas o series, y como est√°bamos en Boston, nos tomamos un colectivo y llegamos r√°pidamente.
El lugar tiene algo especial que mas all√° de la organizaci√≥n de los edificios en los parques que son hermosos, genera ganas de aprender. Nos metimos en una clase por curiosidad y por un momento formamos parte de los estudiantes en la vor√°gine de cambio de clases.
Es un recorrido interesante, quiz√°s mas personal, quien sienta inter√©s por la educaci√≥n debe ir necesariamente, de lo contrario no se si es un gran plan, especialmente teniendo en cuenta la gran variedad de actividades que ofrece Boston.
translated_text:
The main reason we decided to go was the fame of the university. Besides the fact that one has seen the buildings in different movies or series, and since we were in Boston, we took a bus and arrived quickly.
The place has something special that beyond the organization of the buildings in the parks, which are beautiful, generates the desire to learn. We got into a class out of curiosity and for a moment we were part of the students in the maelstrom of changing classes.
It is an interesting tour, perhaps more personal, whoever is interested in education must necessarily go, otherwise I do not know if it is a great plan, especially considering the wide variety of activities offered by Boston.

title: Belo Campus
text: Com muita hist√≥ria, vale muito a pena fazer um tour com um guia (estudante da pr√≥pria universidade). O guia faz um passeio pelo campus, contando a hist√≥ria de cada pr√©dio. Muito interessante!
translated_text: With a lot of history, it's well worth taking a tour with a guide (a student from the university itself). The guide takes you around the campus, telling you about the history of each building. Very interesting!

title: Lindo!
text: Harvard tem um ambiente muito agrad√°vel com seus pr√©dios de tijolo vermelho. Os raios durante o por do sol entre esses pr√©dios e a igreja deixa um visual muito elegante a visita. Lembre-se de tirar a cl√°ssica foto segurando o p√© de John Harvard!
translated_text: Harvard has a very pleasant atmosphere with its red brick buildings. The rays during sunset between these buildings and the church give the visit a very elegant look. Remember to take the classic photo holding John Harvard's foot!

title: Harvard University
text: Como um grande amante da Ci√™ncia, fui conhecer Harvard, o eterno sonho acad√™mico. Muito embora n√£o seja o meu, convenhamos, √© a melhor universidade do mundo e este titulo devemos ponderar. √â um lugar oponente, cercado de um clima "frio" no ar. a impress√£o que da √© que as pessoas conseguem, por osmose, receber fluidos das cabe√ßas pensantes que j√° passaram por ali. Um lugar que vale a pena visitar, mas √© claro, vale a pena caso seja um amante como eu. Abra√ßo
translated_text: As a great lover of science, I went to Harvard, the eternal academic dream. Although it's not my dream, let's face it, it's the best university in the world, and that's a title we should consider. It's an opposing place, surrounded by a "cold" climate in the air. The impression is that people can, by osmosis, receive fluids from the thinking heads that have already passed through there. A place worth visiting, but of course, it's worth it if you're a lover like me. Cheers

title: '' Apaixonante!''!!!
text:
Boston √© a cidade dos sonhos.
√â voc√™ ir, e n√£o quer mais parar de ir.
Harvard √© encantador, viciante!
Morei l√°, e morro de saudades quando lembro.
Tranquilidade para estudos, reunir os amigos.
A Biblioteca √© gigante!
translated_text:
Boston is the city of dreams.
You go there and you don't want to stop.
Harvard is enchanting, addictive!
I lived there, and I miss it when I think back.
Peace and quiet for studying, meeting up with friends.
The library is huge!

title: Muy buen paseo...
text: Fuimos sin reservas y sin tiempo. Era invierno y hac√≠a fr√≠o. No esperaba mucho, sin embargo estacionamos y salimos a caminar por entre esos edificios y parques hermosos. Nos encanto la tranquilidad del lugar y el √°mbito propicio para el estudio. Recorrimos un mont√≥n. Y escuchamos muchas an√©cdotas que alumnos cuentan de distintos lugares o monumentos.
translated_text: We went without reservations and without time. It was winter and cold. We didn't expect much, but we parked and went for a walk among those beautiful buildings and parks. We loved the tranquility of the place and the environment conducive to study. We walked around a lot. And we listened to many anecdotes that students told about different places or monuments.

title: Faculdade dos sonhos
text:
O campus √© enorme 
Estrutura √© sensacional 
Localiza√ß√£o idem
Sem sombra de d√∫vida √© a faculdade dos sonhos de qualquer ser humano
translated_text:
The campus is huge
Structure is sensational
Location idem
Without a shadow of a doubt, it is the college of every human being's dreams

title: Cerca de Boston
text: Tomando la red line del Metro se llega a la estaci√≥n Harvard.Interesante recorrer el campus,los barrios cercano,atravesar el r√≠o Charles para continuar viendo las otras escuelas de la Universidad.
translated_text: Taking the Metro line to the Harvard station, it is interesting to tour the campus, the nearby neighborhoods, cross the Charles River and continue on to see the other schools of the University.

title: Muy buen tour!
text: Hice el tour que guian los propios estudiantes de la universidad. me encanto!! Es muy distinto visitar un lugar sin que nadie te cuente la trastienda y anecdotas que pasaron alli!. Muy buena onda los chicos que guian. Altamente recomendable!
translated_text: I did the tour guided by the students of the university. I loved it! It is very different to visit a place without anyone telling you the behind the scenes and anecdotes that happened there. Very good vibes from the guys who guide. Highly recommended!

translated_text:
The campus had a calm and academic atmosphere. Is it my imagination or does everyone walking around look smart? (lol) I am sure everyone is studying hard inside, but there were squirrels playing in the garden, which made me feel relaxed. There was a theater, a church, and many interesting things to see. The Harvard statue was very popular and there was a line to take a picture.
You can purchase a guide map in Japanese at the Harvard University Tourist Information Center. I don't remember the price, but I think it was $1-$2. The map is just a sheet of paper, but the explanations are quite easy to understand, and we had a lot of fun just going around by ourselves following the indicated route. I recommend it. Be careful, it is not the same as the tourist information center of the city. It is located at the entrance just to the left of Cafe Au Bon Pain and just behind COOP.

text:

From someone who has been to several American universities,
The campus is small and there are no distinctive historical buildings,

title: –ú–µ—Å—Ç–æ, –≥–¥–µ —á—Ç—É—Ç —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏
translated_text: Harvard is very interesting to visit its grand library and learn the story of Harry Elkins Widener, a Harvard graduate, millionaire and bibliophile who died on the Titanic in 1912. His mother built this library in Harry's memory, donating the family's entire collection of antiquarian books to the university. A portrait of Harry Elkins still hangs at the entrance to the building, and the memorial room contains photographs and documents related to the history of the Widener family.

translated_text: Not the university, of course, but the university museum with the Busch Reisinger and Fogg collection. The jewels of art hanging and standing there are fantastic. You can't help but be amazed. The renovation by Renzo Piano is very successful. Not to be missed.

title: A voir au moins une fois dans sa vie !
text:

translated_text:

Tal como disse sobre o MIT, Harvard, apesar da sua import√¢ncia no mundo do conhecimento e do ensino, n√£o √© nada de extraordin√°rio. Muito melhor que o MIT mas mesmo assim n√£o √© magn√≠fico.

As I said about MIT, Harvard, despite its importance in the world of knowledge and teaching, is nothing extraordinary. Much better than MIT, but still not magnificent.
The physical space of the university campus is enormous and is made up of numerous buildings, not all of which are magnificent or imposing enough.
The Natural History Museum is superb and has magnificent collections. It costs 12 dollars per person.
There is a subway from downtown Boston to MIT and on to downtown Harvard.
Perhaps for university students, the student atmosphere adds another "warmth" and another "attraction" to the university space. For a mere tourist, it may be difficult to capture or feel the spirit that the campus certainly conveys.
The university's central buildings are very beautiful and interesting.
A must-see.

title: Excelente
text: Como todos falaram, para ir a Boston √© imprescind√≠vel que se v√° a Harvard. Lugar muito legal, de linda arquitetura e alto astral. Rende belas fotos, achamos lindo ir no outono.

In my opinion, you can't go to Boston and not visit the university.

translated_text: Unlike the shining atmosphere of famous West Coast universities such as Stanford University, I think it is a place with a calm and mature American atmosphere. I like that kind of atmosphere around Harvard University, so I always go here when I travel to Boston or Cambridge. I walk around the campus (where it is allowed), buy souvenirs at COOP, and have dinner at one of the restaurants in the area. It's a nice way to spend time.

title: A voir!
text:
C'est un bel endroit plein d'histoire, o√π de nombreux films ont √©t√© tourn√©s. Le quartier √©tudiant de Cambridge aux alentours est super sympa, j'ai ador√© m'y balader, faire les magasins, les restaus tr√®s √©tudiants.

It's a beautiful place full of history, where many films have been shot. The surrounding Cambridge student district is really nice, and I loved walking around, shopping and eating in the student restaurants.
Great atmosphere!

title: Fa venire voglia di studiare
text: Passeggiare in questa universit√†, vedere tutti con la felpa con la scritta Harward, prendere un caff√® nel cortile, tutta questa atmosfera fa venire voglia di prendersi una laurea in questo paradiso

title: Passeggiata per Harvard
text: Suggestiva passeggiata all'interno del campus... ricorda i film ed una atmosfera stupenda. La zona limitrofa e' piena di vita. Sicuramente da visitare ma si consiglia di andare con i mezzi o se si vuole andare in macchina solo la domenica in quanto non ci sono parcheggi.
translated_text: Suggestive walk through the campus.... reminiscent of movies and a wonderful atmosphere. The surrounding area is full of life. Definitely worth visiting but recommended to go by vehicle or if you want to go by car only on Sundays as there is no parking.

title: Excelente universidad
text: Una universidad excelente , fui por una semana a un curso parte de la maestr√≠a , la verdad las clases muy interesantes . As an attraction it is a university with a classic style very nice to walk around. There are bookstores, restaurants and also a large souvenir store where you can buy everything with the name of Harvard, a unique experience.

title: Indrukwekkend
text: Zowel de universiteit als het gebied er omheen is erg de moeite waard. Prachtige gebouwen die historie uitademen. Indrukwekkend als je bedenkt wie hier allemaal gestudeerd en gewerkt hebben. Parkeren is erg duur!
translated_text: Both the university and the area around it are very worthwhile. Beautiful buildings that exude history. Impressive when you consider who all studied and worked here. Parking is very expensive!

title: –ì–∞—Ä–≤–∞—Ä–¥!
